oVka rojuna uxayaM laMdanulo treVPAlGar skveruvaxxa janaM guMpulu guMpulugA mUgivunnAru. 
vAru oVka viciwra jaMwuvu vaMka cUswunnAru. 
A jaMwuvu vArini anni viXAlA AkarRiMciMxi. 
A jaMwuvu meVdavaraku maniRi. 
wala mAwraM gurrapu wala. 
jUlU, nikkina ceVvulU, sagaM kanabaduwunna wiragali rAlYlalA palYla jaMta. 
moVgAna mAwraM boVttU uMxi. 
axi niluvuboVttu. 
A jaMwuvuku wakkina avayavAlu annI manuRyulavi. 
reVMdu cewulU, reVMdu kAlYlU, kAlYlaki kadiyAlU unnAyi. 
avi baMgArapuvo iwwadivo weVliyaxu kAnI raMgu mAwraM pasupupaccana. 
vAtini kadiyAlu anataMkannA aMxeVlu anavaccu. 
kAlYla vrelYlaku rawnAlawo cesina meVtteVlu unnAyi. 
cewula paxi vrelYlakU paxi rawnaputuMgarAlu unnAyi. 
maNikattulayaMxu siMhawalAtapu murugulu unnAyi. 
xaMdalayaMxu bAjubaMxulU, BujammIxa BujakIrwulu unnAyi. 
Sirassuna kirItaM uMxi. 
I jaMwuvu caccipoyinaxo, mUrCalo uMxo weVliyaxu. 
ixi jaMwuvo manuRyudo weVliyaxu. 
oVkavelYa I jaMwuvu nixrapowoMxemo! oVwwigili paMdukuMxi. 
A jaMwuvu pattubatta kattukoVni uMxi. 
veVdalpEna jarI galYla uwwarIyaM cirigipoyi kriMxa padivuMxi. 
A jaMwuvu reVMdu cewulaveVnakA poVdugEna reVMdu peVxxa gAyAlu unnAyi. 
A gAyAlanuMdi ixivaraku eVMwa neVwwuru kArinaxo weVliyaxu gAnI koVMwa neVwwuru BUmimIxa gaddakatti uMxi. 
A neVwwuruwo koVMceVM xUraMlo padivunna jarI uwwarIyaM wadisivuMxi. 
vesavikAlaM EnA laMdanulo rAwrilYlu koVxxigA maMcu kuruswUne uMtuMxi ganuka A maMcuki neVwwuru pravahiMcadaM mAnesiMxalle uMxi. 
A jaMwuvu xeha parimANaM cAlA peVxxaxi. 
manuRyulu sAmAnyaMgA Exu Aru adugulu uMdavaccu. 
A jaMwuvu eVnimixi adugulu uMdi uMtuMxi. 
xAni eVxururoVmmu mana bAreVdaMwa uMtuMxi. 
manuRyulu aMxarU xAnni xUrAnnuMdi cUdataM moVxalupeVttAru. 
proVxxeVkkinakoVxxI janaM eVkkuvagA mUgAru. 
janaM aneka viXAlugA ceVppukovadaM moVxalupeVttAru. 
oVka grIku BARApaMdiwudu" grIku hIro XIsiyas minitAr anu oVka eVxxu moVgaM jaMwuvunu caMpAdu; ixigUdA atlAMtixe" annAdu. 
APrikA, xakRiNa ameVrikA adavulalo bahu viXAlEna jaMwuvulanu jUci vAtilo koVnniMtini laMdanu ` jU' ku patti weVccina oVka goVppa vetagAdu itlannAdu. 
" SarIraM maniRixi, moVgaM gurrAnixEna oVka jaMwuvu APrikAloni adavulalona eVkkado uMxani nenu vinnAnu. 
kAnI nenu nammalexu" ani ayyo! I jaMwuvu nAku xoVriki uMte laMdanu jUki xInni wIsukuvacce BAgyaM nAku galigexi. 
ituvaMti jaMwuvunu weVccAnani nAku pIrejI iccevAlYlu. 
ippudo A lABaM poyiMxi kaxA" ani bikkamoVgaM veSAdu. 
kaxalakuMdA meVxalakuMdA padivunna A mqgaM xaggaraku koVMxaru pillalu sAhasiMci pobowe wallulu vAlYlanu veVnakki lAgAru. 
" ixi mqgame Ewe, xIniki battalu eVkkadanuMci vaccinAyi? 
xIniki nagalu eVkkadavi" ani koVMxaru praSnaveSAru. 
koVMxaru nijame annAru. 
mqgaM kAkapowe mari emitI ani praSna puttiMxi. 
mari koVMxaru annAru kaxA" ixi wappakuMdA mqgame. 
xInini e ameVrikA xeSasWudo, e PreVMci xeSasWudo APrikA adavullono eVkkado pattukunnAdu. 
kAnI xAnini eroplenumIxa vAlYla xeSAniki wIsukupowUMte I jaMwuvu kriMxapadivuMtuMxi. 
A kriMxapadataMlo caccipoyivuMdavaccu. 
appudu wala pagiliMxemo! A neVwwuru atlA kAruwoMxi" annAru. 
mari oVkadu" Ewe mari xAniki I battalu eVkkadivi? 
oVka guddapIlika kattukoVni iMkoVka guddapIlika pEna vesukovadaM emiti? 
ivi emi xuswulu? 
vesukoVnnaco lAgU kotU vesukoVMxuru kAnI gudda mukkalu eVvaru kattukoVMtAru? 
" annAdu. 
mariyoVkawanu" hiMxUxeSamulo itlAge kattukoVMtAruta" annAdu. 
maroVka Xvani itlA vinipiMciMxi. 
" hiMxUxeSaMlo I mqgAnni eVvalYlo peVMcivuMtAru. 
" iMglIRuwanaM aMwA moVgaMlo uttipade oVkadu" hiMxUxeSaMlo manuRyule mqgAlu AyeVnu. 
vAlYlu mqgAlanu peVMcataM eVMxuku annAdu. 
aMxarU navvAru. 
maroVkadu annAdu" hiMxUxeSaMlonivAlYlu eVppudU APrikA adavullo gAnI xakRiNa ameVrikA adavullo gAnI vetaku poru, vAlYlu itlA povatAniki gavarnameVMtu oVppukoxu. 
aMxucewa I mqgAnni vAlYlu pattukoVnnaxI abaxXame, vAlYla xeSaMlo peVMcinaxI abaxXame" annAdu. 
" Ewe hiMxUxeSasWulakumalle I mqgaM oVMtina battalu eVMxuku uMdAli" anna praSna vacciMxi. 
xAniki oVka buxXimaMwudu samAXAnaM ceVppAdu. 
I mqgAnni pattukoVnna vetagAdu koVnnAlYlu hiMxUxeSaMlo uMdivuMtAdu. 
awadu PyAnsIki I mqgAniki xuswulu vesi uMtAdani samAXAnaM kuxiriMxi. 
aMxarU awanni mikkili aBinaMxiMcadaM moVxalupeVttAru. 
oVkavelYa A mqgaM nixrapowoMxemo, kekalaku leswe eM apAyaM jaruguwuMxo ani koVMxaru janAnni kekalu veVyyavaxxani ceVppadaM moVxalupeVttAru. 
maroVkadu" Ewe I mqgaM oVMtiniMdA inni nagalu eVkkadanuMci vaswAyi, A nagalu cAlA KarIxu kalave" annAdu. 
A mAta eVvarU vinipiMcukolexu; janaM cese roVxa eVkkuva EpoyiMxi. 
mqgaM caccipoyiMxani koVMxarU, brawike uMxani koVMxarU; prawivAlYlakI mqgaM leswe eM apAyaM jaruguwuMxo ani Bayame kAnI I viMwa vaxalipeVtti eVvarU poleru. 
rodlamIxa trAPikku eVkkadixakkada AgipoyiMxi. 
janaM aMxarU cuttukoVnadame kAnI maroVkati jarugalexu. 
iMwalo I vArwa laMdanu laMdanaMwA weVlisipoyiMxi. 
peVxxa peVxxa dyUkulU, lArdumeyarU, ArcibiRappU, aMxarU vaccAru. 
skAtlaMduyArduvAru aMwA oVwwigillAru. 
polIsuvAlYlanu RUt ceseMxuku wayArugA wupAkulawo jaMwuvu cuttU iruvaxi gajAla xUraMlo nilcuMdabeVtti, meyarU marikoVMxaru goVppavArU, jaMwuvu xaggaraku nadicAru. 
vAri cewulalo kanureVppapAtulo preli jaMwuvunu xagXaM ceyagala piswolYlu guripeVtti unnAyi. 
janAnni polIsuvAru eVkkadivAlYlanakkade pAraxrolAru. 
ixivarake janaM A jaMwuvuku iMwakannA xaggaragA veVlYliMxi. 
janaMlo koVMxaru piswolYlu lekuMdAne iMwaku pUrvaM A jaMwuvuku cAlA xaggaragA veVlYli sarvamU pariSIliMcAru. 
ayinA vAru aXikArulu kanaka, aXikArulu ceyAlsina paxXawigA ceswunnArani anukovAli. 
peVxxalu aMxarU piswolYlawo wayArugA nilcuMte oVka gumAswA vacci jaMwuvunu pariSIliMcAdu. 
jaMwuvu cacciMxo brawikiMxo weVlisikovadAniki goVppa dAktarlakosaM kaburaMpiMcAru. 
goVppa inupa goVlusulu weVppiMci jaMwuvuki kAlYlU, cewulU kattiveSAru. 
jaMwuvu oVkavelYa lecinA, emI ceVyyalexu. 
waruvAwa dAktarlu vacci parIkRiMcAru. 
vAlYlu reVMdu prakkalA reVMdu gaMtalu parIkRa cesi I jaMwuvu cAvalexu brawikivuMxani ceVppatAniki vIlulexu. 
ucCvASaniSvAsAlu AdataM lexu. 
hqxayaMlo spaMxana lexu. 
ayinA hArtu ` pOMdugA' uMxi. 
nAdi AdataMlexu. 
kAnI neVwwuru callabadalexu. 
I jaMwuvuyoVkka SarIrawawvAniki I mana vExya sUwrAlakU saMbaMXaM lexalle uMxi. 
I jaMwuvu kalYebaraM, lokaMlo uMde jaMwuvula kalYebaramulavaMtixi kAxu. 
ixi I lokaMlo jaMwuvu kAxu ani wIrmAniMcAru. 
I wIrmAnaM A notA I nota poVkki janasAmAnyaMlo hAsyaM puttiMciMxi. 
jaMwu SAswravewwa ayyi, APrikAnuMci aneka viMwa mqgAlanu laMdanu jUku weVccina mistaru dikeVnsanu dAktarlanu aMxarinI parihasiMcAdu. 
wAnu Ewe oVkka nimuRaMlo A jaMwu wawvaM weVliyacesevANNi annAdu. 
jaMwuvunu sarvaxA parIkRiMcAru. 
jaMwuvu cewula veVnuka unna reVMdu peVxxa poVdugEna gAyAlu eVMxuku ayinavo weVliyalexu. 
" exo vimAnaM mIxanuMci I jaMwuvu kiMxapadivuMdAli" anna viRayaM mattuku nirXAraNagA weliMxi. 
" axi rAwri pUta eVppudo jarigivuMdAli; I jaMwuvu vimAnaMnuMdi kriMxaku xUkabowU reVMdu cewulU veVnakki vesi exo paxunEna vaswuvunu pattukoVni uMdAli; appudu I reVMdu cewula veVnuka kosukoVnipoyivuMtuMxi" ani niScayaM ceSAru. 
" I jaMwuvu atlA padivuMte xIniki xehaMmIxa mareVkkadA xeVbba wagalalexu AyeVnu! aMwa eVwwunuMci padivuMte eVtlA wagalakuMdA uMtuMxi" annAru. 
A jaMwuvu oVMtimIxinuMci nagalu annI wISAru. 
avi oVka jAbiwA vrAsi polIsuvAri AXInaMlo uMcAru. 
dAktarlu A jaMwuvu gAyamulaku kattukatti maMxuvesAru. 
eVMwasepatikI A jaMwuvu kaxalalexU meVxalalexU. 
xAnipEna unna batta parIkRiMcAru. 
aMwati sukumAramEna vaswraM e xeSaMlo neSAro weVliyaxu. 
dakkAmajilinlu ani ceVppukuMtAru. 
avi EnA aMwa sannaMgA uMtAyo lexo! A vaswrAniki pEgA jarI. 
A jarI soVgasu ceVppadAniki vIlulexu. 
aMcu saMxeVkAlapu gulAbI raMguwo neSAru. 
A vaswraM AScaryaMgA uMxi. 
I jaMwuvunu vaMxa maMxi manuRyulu pattukoVni oVka peVxxa motAruvAn mIxiki eVkkiMcAru. 
xInini polIsu steRanuku wIsukoVni veVlYlAlano, mqga praxarSanaSAlaku wIsukuveVlYlAlano weVliyalexu. 
jU aXikAri jaMwuvu wanaxi annAdu. 
meyaru jaMwuvu melkoVnna waruvAwa xAni guNagaNAlanubatti gAnI emI nirNayiMcatAniki vIlulexannAdu. 
skAtlaMduyArdulo paxi gajAla poVdugU, paxi gajAla veVdalpU paxihenu adugula eVwwuna baliRtamEna inupa bonu kattAru. 
cuttU vaMxa maMxi polIsuvArini guMdlu xattiMcina piswolYlawo kApalApeVttAru. 
appatiki proVxxukUkiMxi. 
paxi maMxi dAktarlu A jaMwuvu cuttU kUrcunnAru. 
jaMwuvu oVkavelYa lecinaco AhAraM emitani vicAraNa sAgiMxi. 
ulavalU gaddI roVtteVlU sArAsIsAlU annI wayArugA uMcAru. 
jaMwuvu melkoVnavaleVnani cUswunnAru. 
jaMwuvu A waruvAwa paxihenu rojulaku kaxalataM moVxalupeVttiMxi. 
innAlYlu A mqgAnni cUsetaMxuku iMglaMdu nAlugu vEpulanuMdI, yUrapulonuMdI janaM wIrWa prajagA vacci cUsipowunnAru. 
kroVwwagA vacce janAniki laMdan hotalYlu cAlataM lexu. 
janaMwo UraMwA kitakitalAdipowoMxi. 
itlA uMdagA, A mqgaM atU, itU kaxiliMxi. 
kaxiliMxanna vArwa kannu mUsi kannu weVricetappatiki laMdan laMdan aMwA weVlisipoyiMxi. 
inupa paMjaraM cuttU rivAlvarulU eVnimixi bArula wupAkulU puccukoVni sEnikulu nilcunnAru. 
A mqgaM vIpumIxa gAyAlu dAktarlu kattu kattinA mAnane lexu. 
jaMwuvuku meVlakuva vacciMxi. 
cewulu cAci, kAlYlu nikkiMci, nIlgi, atU itU prakkalaku xoVrli jaMwuvu kannu weVraciMxi. 
veVMtane cuttU sEnikulu marI jAgrawwapaddAru. 
A jaMwuvu kalYlu weVraci wana cuttU cUsiMxi. 
AScaryapoyinattu atU itU cUsiMxi. 
leci kUrcuMxi. 
eVgiri oVka gaMwuvesi nilcuMxi. 
` kim gaxomhi' ani oVka peVxxa arapu ariciMxi. 
I arapu xaggara unnavAlYlaki suvyakwaMgA vinipiMcalexu. 
gurraM sakiliMcinatle unnaxi. 
kAnI ParlAMgu xUraMlo unnavAlYlaki akRarAlu vispaRtaMgA vinipiMcinAyi. 
kAnI axi BARa ani eVvariki weVlusu? 
BARe Ewe emi BARo? 
ayinA, I jaMwuvuku BARa emi weVlusu. 
axi BARa kAvaccunanna Uhe eVvarikI polexu. 
xUrAniki A arapulo akRarAlavale vinipiMcinavAlYlaki koVMwa AScaryaMvesiMxi. 
appatiki pagalu reVMdu jAmulu ayinaxi. 
mqgaM wana cuttU inupa paMjaraM uMdataM cUsi oVka peVxxa sakiliMwa sakiliMciMxi. 
axi navvinatlu unnaxi. 
kAnI malYlI xAni kalYlallo oVka viXamEna xuHKaM gocariMciMxi. 
aMwatiwo A jaMwuvu nela padi bAXacewa koVttukuMtunnattugA oVka arapu ariciMxi. 
A arapu xUrAna unnavAlYlaki* ` aho me aXaNNawwaiM kimaxxi kim samAxikto' annatlugA vinipiMciMxi. 
xaggara unna polIsulu, sEnikulu, gurraM ciwra ciwraMgA sakiliswoMxani anukunnAru. 
aMxulo koVMxaru peVxxalu xIni wawvaM I mAwraMwo weVliyalexu anukunnAru. 
malYlI koVMwasepatiki jaMwuvu leci, kUrcunna janAnni cUswe, ippatiki koVMwa AScaryaM waggiMxi. 
iMwalo akkada unna aXikArulu AhAraM weVcci jaMwuvuki xaggaragA woSAru. 
jaMwuvu AhArAnni cUsiMxi. 
roVtteVlU, ulavalU, baMgAlYAxuMpalU ivannI cUswe jaMwuvuku avi emito weVliyalexu. 
iMwalo Palamulu koVnni weVcci xAnimuMxara peVttAru. 
jaMwuvu vAtivaMka cUdataMwone avi paMdlu ani weVlisikoVnnatlu koVMwa aBinayaM cesiMxi. 
A paMdlu cewwo puccukoVMxi. 
aMxarU wiMtuMxi anukoVnnAru. 
kAnI axi paMdu wuMci atU itU cUsi malYlI pakkane peVttiMxi. 
paxihenu rojulabatti wiMdi lexe xIniki, paMdu winaxemabbA ani koVMxarU; aMwa mqgAniki Akali wIrAlaMte A paMdlu emi cAluwuMxani koVMxarU; ciwraMgA uMxi, gurraM paMdlu winataM emiti ani koVMxarU. 
koVMwa sepu jaMwuvu AlociMciMxi. 
inupa paMjaraM bayata unna oVkAyanaku cewiwo xaggaraku rammani sEga cesiMxi. 
jaMwuvu vAdu xaggaraku rAgA sakiliMciMxi. 
A Xvani xUrapuvAlYlaku* ` koNu wumaM' annatlu vinipiMciMxi. 
xIniwo A jaMwuvu exo mAtAduwuMxani aMxarU grahiMcanAraMBiMciri kAnI emi mAtlAduwunnaxi ane viRayaM atluMdagA ixi mAtlAduta emi? 
anu AScaryame eVkkuva ayipoyiMxi. 
wAnu ceVppinaxi vAniki weVliyalexani jaMwuvuku weVlisiMxi. 
axi emanukoVnnaxo, reVMdu cewulawo neVwwimIxa nIlYlu posukoVnnatlu sEgaceyadaM moVxalupeVttiMxi. 
eVvarikI emI weVliyalexu. 
koVMwasepatiki, cUdavaccinavAlYlallo oVka hiMxU xeSasWudu unnAdu. 
awadu annAdu gaxA" snAnaM ceVyyAlanemo" ani. 
I mAta kramaMgA meyaru ceVvula paddaxi. 
A saMgawi nijame annatlu weVlisiMxi. 
A jaMwuvucewa snAnaM ceyiMcadaM eVtlA? 
eVnni nIlYlu weVswe saripowAyi. 
jaMwuvunu kAlYlaku cewulaku saMkeVlalu katti Wemsu naxixaggariki wIsukupoxAM annAru koVMxaru. 
" axi cAlA apAyakaraM. 
xArilo jaMwuvu manuRyulamIxa padi caMpavaccu" ani marikoVMxaru annAru. 
itlA kAxani iMdlu Arputaku upayogiMce goVttAlu weVcci pEpulonuMdi jaMwuvumIxa nIlYlu vaxalipeVttAru. 
jaMwuvu pEnuMci kriMxaku wadisipoyiMxi. 
bonulo kriMxa aMwA buraxa ayiMxi. 
appudu jaMwuvu wanapEna unna uwwarIyaM piMdi wuducukuMxi. 
A uwwarIyaM kattukoVni, kattu Xovawi piMdi inupa katakatAlaku AragattiMxi. 
ixi aMwA cUswunna janaM oVdduvirigipowunnAru. 
vAlYla AScaryAniki aMwUpoVMwU lexu. 
kriMxa aMwA buraxa kAvadaM mUlaMgA kUrcotAniki vIlu lexu annatlu jaMwuvu sEgacesiMxi. 
xAnni grahiMci oVka peVxxa balla wIsukoVni vacci A lopaliki aMxiMcAru. 
jaMwuvu A balla vesukoVni xAnimIxa bAsipItagA kUrcuMdi mukku mUsukoVni XyAnaM ceyadaM moVxalupeVttiMxi. 
cuttupatlanunnavAlYlaki xIni wawvaM emI weVliyalexu. 
gaMtasepatiki malYlI kalYlu weVriciMxi. 
leci nilcuMxi. 
Arina batta kattukoVMxi. 
wAnu kattukoVnna uwwarIyaM wadigA uMte axi AresiMxi. 
paMdlu cUpiMci itlAMtivi wIsukoVni rammu ani sEgacesiMxi. 
veVMtane meyaru manuRyulni paMpiMci oVka watteVdu paMdlu weVppiMcAdu. 
ceVMbu kAvAlani sEgacesiMxi. 
A xeSaMlo ceVMbulu eVkkadivi! oVka glAsu weVcci iccAru. 
A glAsu wIsukoVni mqgaM paMdlamIxa nIlYlu calli exo goVNukkuMtU cewulu paMdlamIxa wippi A watteVdu paMdlU wiMxi. 
nIlYlu kAvaleVnu ani ceyi cUpiMciMxi. 
malYlI goVttaMlonuMci vaxalipeVttAru. 
A nIlYlu kadupArA wrAgiMxi. 
waruvAwa A ballamIxa kUrcuni vAlYlavaMka parakAyiMci nAlugu vEpulA cUsiMxi. 
koVMwasepatiki malYlI navviMxi. 
ippatiki janAniki A mqgaM itlA navvuwuMxani weVlisiMxi. 
mqgaM katakatAlavaMka cUpiMci ivi eVMxuku annatlu praSniMciMxi. 
aMxarU AScaryapoyinAru. 
koVMxaru annAru gaxA" ixi mqgaM kAxu manuRyude, walakAya mAwraM gurrapu walakAyagAnI, manaM KaMdAlannI kanipeVttAmu gAnI ilAMti manuRyulu e KaMdaMlo uMtAro, A KaMdAnni kanipeVttalexu. 
kanuka awanu mAtlAde BARa emito kanukkuni xAnni vAlYlaxi e xeSamo kanukkuMxAM. 
A manuRyudu jaMwuvu kAxu. 
cAlA nAgarikawa galigina jAwilA kUdA unnaxi. 
atuvaMtivAdi cuttU inupa paMjaraM eVMxuku? 
wIsiveswe bAgA uMtuMxi" annAru. 
aXikArulu mAwraM" inupa paMjaraM wIsiveyadAniki vIlu lexu. 
ixi jaMwuvu kAxu ani nammakaM eVtlAgu? 
janaMmIxa padi virucukoVni wiMte eVllAgu" annAru. 
inupa paMjaraM wIsiveyalexu. 
cuttU unna aXikArulu _iMglIRu iMglIRulo A jaMwuvuwo cAlA viRayAlu ceVppAru. 
A BARa A jaMwuvuki weVliyalexani weVlusukoVni PreVMci, jarmanI itAliyanu, raRyanu BARalannI oVkaxAni waruvAwa oVkatigA mAtlAdi vinipiMcAru. 
A jaMwuvuku emI weVliyalexu. 
oVka nIgronu pilipiMci vAdi BARa mAtlAdiMcAru. 
I mAtalu annI vini A jaMwuvu parihasiMcinatlugA navvadaM moVxalupeVttiMxi. 
aMxarU emI weVliyaka UrukunnAru. 
oVkarixxaru mAwraM I jaMwuvu mana BARalu vini parihasiswU unnaxi ani manassulo anukunnAru. 
koVMwasepatiki*' kim maesuxam kim ixam' anna mAtalu xUrAniki vinapadettu malYlI sakiliMciMxi. 
ippatiki aMxarikI A jaMwuvu mAtlAduwunnaxi ani weVlisiMxi. 
wama BARalu emI xAniki weVliyakapovadaM mUlaMgA emi ceVyyavaleVno weVliyalexu. 
kAnI A mqgaMlo oVka viSeRaM kanipiMciMxi. 
woVNakaxu, beVNakaxu wana cuttupatla unna janAnni nirAxaraNagA cUswuMxi. 
iMwasepU sEnikulu cuttU wupAkulu wayArugA peVttukoVni kUrcunnAru. 
A jaMwuvu kannu ippudu oVka wupAkimIxa paddaxi. 
eVMxucewa anagA A jaMwuvu inupa paMjarAnni aMtukoVni nilcunnaxi. 
A veVnuka unna sEnikudu Bayapadi nAlugu adugulu veVnukaku vesi wupAki eVwwi pattukoVnnAdu. 
appude A jaMwuvu veVnukaku wiragadaM watasWiMciMxi. 
axi cUsi vAdi BayaM cUsi axi exo mAraNa sAXanaM ani weVlisikoVMxi. 
xAnivaMka sABiprAyaMgA cUsiMxi. 
vAnini wana cewiki immani adigiMxi. 
vAdu ivvalexu. 
aMxarU AScaryapoyi cUSAru. 
ippatiki proVxxu kruMkiMxi. 
janaM eVvari xArina vAru veVlYlipowunnAru. 
oVka polIsu inaspeVktaru koVduku eVnimixi eMdlavAdu, wana viMwa kosaM cewilo unna byAt peVtti A mqgAnni veVnukanuMci poVdicAdu. 
mqgaM veVnakaku wirigi cUsiMxi. 
vAdu xUraMgA parigeVwwAdu. 
vANNi pattukotAniki mqgaM wana ceyi inupa katakatAllonuMci cAciMxi. 
vAdu aMxalexu gAnI, oVka sEnikudu cewiki aMxinAdu. 
vAni cewiloni wupAki mqgaM lAgukoVMxi. 
veVMtane janaM eVkkadivAlYlu akkadaku pAripoyinAru. 
polIsulu sEnikulukUdA pAripowU uMdagA meyaru vAlYlani AjFalo nilabeVttAdu. 
A mqgaM wupAkini wIsikoVni xAnini pariSIliMcadaM moVxalupeVttiMxi. 
A jaMwuvu cewilo cikkina wupAki malYlI wIsukovadaM eVtlAgA ani aXikArulu aMxarU vicAriMcAru. 
vIlYlu vicAriMcetappudu A jaMwuvu wupAkini atu wippi itu wippi pariSIliMcadaM moVxalupeVttiMxi. 
e samayaMlo xAni ceyi triggaru( gurraM) mIxa paduwuMxo, eVppudu wupAki preluwuMxo eVvariki, xeVbba waguluwuMxonani aMxarU BayapadataM moVxalupeVttAru. 
meyaru AjFAbalaM kAkapowe sAmAnya sEnikulu aMxarU ixivarake pAripoyevAlYlu. 
aMxulo oVka peVxxa inspeVktaru oVka upAyaM AlociMcAdu. 
oVka Ura kukkanu weVppiMci xAnini A jaMwuvu cUswUvuMdagA wupAkiwo pelcAdu. 
axi caccipoyiMxi. 
ika wupAkulannI jaMwuvuvepu bArupeVttiMci, wupAki bayata padeswAvA, kAlcamannAvA annattugA saMjFaceSAdu. 
lopala unna jaMwuvu wupAkivaMka sABiprAyaMgA cUsiMxi. 
kukkanu wupAkiwo caMpinavAdu koVwwa wUtA malYlI aMxulo peVttadaM cUsiMxi. 
mari emi AlociMcukuMxo! wupAki bayataku iccesiMxi. 
wupAki aMxipuccukunevANNi wupAki madamawo wosiMxi kAbolu, vAdu veVllakila paddAdu. 
rAwri pUta weVllavArlu A mqgaM kalYlu mUsukoVni XyAnaM ceVyyadaM moVxalupeVttiMxi. 
rojU rAwrilYlu A mqgaM kappukoVneMxuku reVMdu goVMgalYlu vIlYle bonulo padeSAru. 
innAlYlu A goVMgalYlu eVkkada vesinavi akkade uMdevi. 
A mqgaM goVMgalYi wIsi kappukuMxi. 
ikkada itlA uMdagA4( jaMwupraxarSanaSAla) aXikAri I mqgAnni wana12 ku paMpiMcAlani meyaruku arjI peVttAdu. 
aXikArulu aMxariwo poyi ceVppAdu. 
kAnI meyaruku I mqgAnni vaxalipeVttadaM iRtaM lexu. 
xIni mUlaMgA vAlYlixxarikI I manassullo vEmanasyAlu erpaddAyi. 
jU aXikAri oVka viRayaM AlociMcAdu. 
aMxarU nixra powuMdagA mqgAnni motAru lArImIxa vesukuni jUki wIsukoVni veVlYaxAM ani. 
A rAwre awanu wagina prayawnAlu annI erpAtu ceSAdu. 
akkada kApalA unna polIsuvAlYlaku koVMxariki evevo ASalu peVtti wanu mqgAnni wIsuku veVlYuwU uMte vAlYlu emI mAtlAdakuMdA uMdetattu ceSAdu. 
kAnI awani manassulo BayaMgAne uMxi. 
atlAMti pani jaragadaM asaMBavaM. 
meyaru sarvAXikAri. 
xInivalla jU aXikAriki uxyogaMkUdA povaccu. 
ayinappatikI A xeSIyulaku unna viMwa koVxxI itlAMti kAryaM walapeVttAdu. 
A rojuna rAwri reVMdu jAmula velYa iravE maMxi manuRyulu, oVka lArI vacci inupa paMjaraM xaggara nilcAru. 
appudu koVxxigA Xvani jarigiMxi. 
sarigA A samayaMlone A viMwa mqgaM nixrapowunnaxallA leci AvaliMci, peVxxagA sakiliMciMxi. 
A mrowaku cuttupatla nixrapowunna sEnikulaMxarU lecAru. 
inspeVktarlu lecAru. 
jU aXikAri iMka mqgAnni wIsukoVni veVlYladaM padaxani exo panimIxa vaccinatlugA natiMci lArI wolukoVni veVlYlAdu. 
marnAdu weVllavAriMxi. 
A mqgaM malYlI snAnaM ceVyyAlannatlu aBinayiMciMxi. 
pEpulonuMci nIlYlu vaxalipeVttadAniki malYlI prayawnaM ceSAru. 
mqgaM alA vaxxani cewiwo sEgacesiMxi. 
mari eVlA snAnaM ceswuMxI? 
iMwalo A mqgaM exo aduguwUvunnatlugA ariciMxi. 
axi xUrAna unnavAlYlaki itlA vinipiMciMxi' pucCassam, axxivAewWaNaxI!' I mAtaki akkada unnavAriki eVvvarikI arWaM weVliyalexu. 
sarigA A samayaMlo meyaru xAni arapu mAtalavaleV vinipiMcetaMwa xUraMlo unnAdu. 
Ayanaku axi oVka BARavaleV vinipiMciMxi. 
AScarya poyinAdu. 
A veVnukati xinamallA Ayana mqgAniki xaggaragAne uMdataM mUlaMgA A mqgaM arupulu arupulavaleV vinabaddAyi. 
ixi emi BARa ayyivuMtuMxi? 
ixi jaMwuvu kAxu. 
e xeSaM maniRo kAvaleV. 
e xeSaMlonU itlAMti manuRyulu lerani jAgraPI, hiRtarIlu ceVbuwunnAyi. 
meyaru akkade nilcunnAdu. 
malYlI mqgaM mAtlAdiwe viMxAM ani. 
malYlI mqgaM ariciMxi. 
" pucCassam axXivA ewWaNaxI" anu akRarAlu meyaruki vispaRtaMgA vinipiMcinAyi. 
appatikappude koVMceVM proVxxeVkkadaM mUlaMgA janaM guMpulE cUdavaswunnAru. 
aMxulo oVkAyana laMdanu yUnivarsitIlo saMskqwa paMdiwudu. 
Ayana iMglIRuvAde. 
AyanakI paxihenu rojulanuMcI itlAMti mqgaM xoVrikiMxani ceVbuwUne unnAru. 
kAnI Ayana viSvasiMcalexu. 
itlAMti viRayAlu sAmAnya janaM namminaMwagA paMdiwulu nammaru kaxA! A mqgaM ninna melkoVnnaxanI, axi mAtlAduwunnaxanI kUdA ceVppAru. 
ceVbiwe I viMwa cUxxAmani inni nAlYlaku Ayana bayaluxerivaccAdu. 
vacci meyaru nilcunna cota nilcunnAdu. 
I mAtalu Ayana ceVvina kUdA paddAyi. 
Ayana A Xvani vini meyaruwo mAtlAdAdu. 
" ixi saMskqwaM kAxugAni, saMskqwamalle uMxi. 
saMskqwaMlonuMci puttina BARalu cAlA unnAyi. 
vAtini prAkqwaM, pESAci moVxalEna perlawo piluswAru. 
I BARa vAtilo exo ayyivuMtuMxi. 
nA xaggara prAkqwa BARala dikRanarI uMxi. 
axi wIsukoVni vaswAnu. 
ayinA jaMwuvuki prAkqwaM vaswe saMskqwaMkUdA koVMwa weVlisevuMtuMxi" ani wAnu inupa paMjaraM xaggiriki veVlYlAdu. 
veVlYli A mqgAnni cUsi ceyi wrippuwU praSniMcAdu. 
* ` kImAwWa' ani, A jaMwuvu I mAtalu viMtUne ceVvulu rikkiMci, kanulu peVxxavi cesi cewulu cAci peVxxagA sakiliMciMxi. 
A paMdiwudiki A mAtalu emI weVliyalexu. 
awadu marala marala adigAdu. 
adigiwe mqgaM exo ceVbuwuMxi. 
awaniki A saMgawi weVliyalexu. 
koVMwasepatiki xaggara uMte vinapadaxU, weVliyaxU, xUraMgA uMte weVluswuMxani vAlYlaMxarU grahiMcAru. 
A jaMwuvu goVMwuka peVxxaxi ganuka xaggara unnavAlYlaki peVxxa mowa valeV mAwrame vinabaduwunnaxi. 
xUraMgA poyinakoVxxI A Xvani palacabadi vinabaduwuMxi, A paMdiwudu xUraMgA poyi malYlI vinnAdu. 
akRarAlu bAgA vinapaddAyi. 
" awrasamIpe aswivAkAcinnaxI, snAwumicCAmi" anu mAtalu vispasRtaMgA vinipiMcinAyi. 
kAnI iMxulo oVka ibbaMxi vacciMxi. 
A mqgaM ane mAtalu vinavaleVnaMte vaMxa gajAla xUraM povAli. 
xAniwo mAtlAdAlaMte xaggaraku rAvadaM ixi ASakyaMgA kanipiMciMxi. 
paMdiwudu meyaruwo ceVppAdu. 
" Ayana snAnaM ceyavaleVnata. 
prakkana exEnA naxi uMxA ani aduguwunnAdu" I mAtalu vinetappatiki meyaru guMdeV gubelumannaxi. 
I mqgAnni wIsukuveVlYladaM eVtlA? 
snAnaM ceyiMcadaM eVtlA? 
snAnaM ceyiswe ixi naxilonuMci malYlI vaswuMxo rAxonani Alocana moVxalupeVttAru. 
aXikArulaMxarU kUrcuMdi Alocana ceSAru. 
A jaMwuvunu naxiki wIsukupoyi snAnaM ceyiMcavaccunA kUdaxA ani, asalu snAnaM ceyiMcadaM eVtlA anna praSna puttiMxi. 
axi eVtlAgo waruvAwa vicArixxAmu. 
moVttamoVxata naxiki wIsukuveVlYlavaccunA annAru. 
oVkAyana. 
snAnaMceyiswe wappu emi unnaxi? 
axi exo uRNa xeSAlalo uMde mqgamalle unnaxi annAdu maroVkAyana. 
mqgaM emiti? 
saMskqwaM mAtlAduwUvuMtenu. 
saMskqwaBARa goVppa BARa anI, A BARalo cAlA goVppa puswakAlu unnAyi anI ceVbuwAru. 
A BARa mAtlAduwUvunnaxi mqgaM eVlA avuwuMxi annAdu. 
maroVkAyana" axi mqgamo, manuRyudo weVliyadAniki vIlulekuMdA uMxi. 
wala cUswe mqgaM, mAta cUswe manuRyudu. 
saMskqwaBARa mAtlAduwUvuMte goVppa nAgarikawa kala jAwi prANi anukovalasivaswuMxi. 
nijAniki awani oVMtimIxa nagalU, battalU cUswe nAgarikawa unnatle woswuMxi. 
A mqgAnni snAnaM ceVyyanivvaccu" annAdu. 
iMkoVka inaspeVktaru annAdu. 
axi saMskqwamo kAxo, I paMdiwudu atlA anukoVnnAdemo! ayinA mAtlAde BARanibatti mAtlAdevAlYla nAgarikawa nirNayaM eVtlA avuwuMxi? 
nAgarikamEna BARa mAtlAduwU hqxayaMlo manuRyulu rAkRasulu kAvaccu. 
I mqgAnni manaM naxiki wIsukuveVdiwe xArilo ixi manuRyulni caMpuwuMxemo? 
pEgA iMxulo iMko ibbaMxi, hippopoVtomas ane jAwi nItigurrAlu unnAyi. 
ixi A jAwilo iMko gurramemo? 
manaM nItilo xiganivvadamuwote iMka munigi manaku kanabadakuMdA povaccu. 
waruvAwa manaM KExulo peVttamani mana prakAraM ceyavaccu, kanaka naxiki wIsukuveVlYlakuMdataM maMcixi. 
" awani vAxana aMxarikI nacciMxi. 
nijamenaMte, nijamenannAru. 
oVkavelYa ixi poyi hipopoVtamas jAwilo kaliswe manuRyula jFAnAniki eVMwo lopaM! mana aMxaraM APrikA, AstreliyA, xakRiNa ameVrikAlalo unna parama rahasyAnni kanukkoVni jFAnaM rAsi poSAmu. 
I mqgAnniguriMci pariSoXana ceVyyakamuMxu xInni cewulonuMci jAraviducukorAxu. 
ani nirNayaM ceSAru. 
I nirNayaM A mqgaMwo ceVbiwe mqgaM kopiswuMxemo anukoVnnAru. 
aMxucewa malYlI oVka Alocana ceSAru. 
mqgAniki I viRayame ceVppavaxxu. 
I cuttupatla naxi lexani ceVbiwe saripowuMxi annAru. 
A paMdiwudicewa A mqgaMwo A viRayame ceVppiMcAru. 
I mAta ceVppataMwote muKaM xuKaMgA peVttiMxi. 
koVMwa AlociMcinatlu kanabaddaxi. 
appatike proVxxeVkkadaM mUlaMgA pEpugoVttAlawone mqgaM snAnaM ceyiMcAru. 
axi malYlI kalYlu mUsuku koVMwasepu XyAnaM cesiMxi. 
wattawo paMdlu weVccAru. 
AragiMciMxi. 
I mqgaM mAtlAduwuMxi ani, A BARa saMskqwaM ani snAnaM ceswegAni BojanaM ceVyyaxu ani, BojanaM ceVyyakamuMxu exo XyAnaM ceswuMxi ani I vArwa xeSaxeSAlaku vyApiMciMxi. 
yUrapulo gaggolu puttiMxi. 
jarmanInuMci saMskqwa paMdiwulu oVka rElu patteMwa maMxi bayaluxeri laMdanuku vaccAru. 
janaM mqgAnni cUseMxuku vIlu lekapovadaM mUlaMgA vere peVxxa illu kattiMcAru. 
A iMtiloki samqxXigA gAli vaccetattu ceSAru. 
A ilYlu peVxxa eVwwEna sWalaMmIxa kattiMcAru. 
iMtiki godalu levu. 
cuttU baliRTamEna inupa katakatAlu peVttiMcAru. 
A iMti cuttU peVxxa kAlYI sWalaM uMxi. 
A kAlYI sWalaM cuttU eVwwEna goda. 
I mqgAnni I inupa paMjaraMlonuMci cakrAlu peVttina maroVka peVxxa inupa paMjaraMloki pattiMci, aMxulonuMci A iMtloki praveSa peVttiMcAru. 
A iMtlo A mqgAniki anni vIlulu erparacAru. 
oVka peVxxa gaxilo oVka peVxxa maMcaM vesi xAnimIxa reVMdu mUdu parupulu veSAru. 
xilYlu peVttAru. 
xAniprakkane snAnAla gaxi. 
lAvugA XAra vacce peVxxa pEpu peVtti akkada wuvvAlYlu, sabbubilYlalU amarcAru. 
muMxara sAvadilo nAlugu Exu kurcIlu, reVMdu padakakurcIlU, reVMdu sAmAnyapuvi annI A jaMwuvu parimANAniki waginatlu ceyiMcAru. 
I prayawnaM aMwA jarigetappatiki reVMdu neVlalu pattiMxi. 
iMkoVka sAmAnu gaxi. 
A gaxilo jaMwuvu AhAraM uMcAru. 
akkada gaMpallo aneka rakAla paMdlu niluvaboSAru. 
jaMwuvu eVppudu Akali ayiwe appudu veVlYladamU winadamU, I reVMdu neVlallo awaniki maMcinIlYlu wrAgutaku ceVMbu oVkati kAvaleVnu ani vAriki weVlisinaxi. 
aMxucewa mUdu nAlugu ceVMbulu kUdA A iMtilo uMcAru. 
awanu XariMcutaku awani parimANaM anusariMci reVMdu sUtlu kuttiMcAru. 
I reVMdu neVlalu gadicetappatiki awani bonuloki manuRyulu rAvadaM povadaM sAgiMcAru. 
reVMdu neVlalu ayyetappatiki oVka vaMxa maMxi xittEna saMskqwa paMdiwulu jarmanI xeSasWulu, PreVMcivAru, _iMglIRu iMglIRuvAru A mqgAnni vaxalipeVtti povadaM lexu. 
eVppudU awani cuttU ceri uMtAru. 
Ayanawo prasaMgiswU uMtAru. 
A mAtalu annI wama BARalaloki warjumAlu cesi wama pawrikalaku paMpiswU uMtAru. 
awaniwo mAtlAdataM kaRtaMgA uMdataM cewa Ayana muKAniki oVka yaMwraM cerci peVttAru. 
mAtlAdetappudu A mqgaM I yaMwrAnni notiki awani notlonuMci vaccina Xvani aMwA A yaMwraM pogu cesi A Xvanini waggiMci bayataku pUrvaM aracinatlu kAkuMdA mAtalavaleV vinipiswuMxi. 
A jaMwuvuwo I yaMwraM yoVkka upayogaM paMdiwulu ixani ceVppAru. 
A jaMwuvu aMgIkariMci xIniki oVppukunnaxi. 
koVxxi rojullo I manuRyulu mAtlAde mAtalu A jaMwuvuki sariggA vinipiMcadaM lexu ani weVlisiMxi. 
aMxucewa Xvanini viswariMpa cese yaMwrAla xaggara manuRyulu mAtlAduwAru. 
moVxati rojullo A jaMwuvuki I yUrapiyanulu mAtlAde saMskqwaM weVlisiMxi kAxu. 
kAnI kramaMgA alavAtu padi vAlYla mAtalu ippudu grahiswoMxi. 
vAlYlu' aswikala' anavalasi vaswe' a akRaraM' eV' valeV ucCariMci ` sa' nu ` RA' cesi ` lA' nu ` lA' gA ucCariswAru. 
xIrGaM unna cota hrasvamU, hrasvaM unna cota xIrGamU ucCariswAru. 
` nArAyaNa anutaku ` nArayanA' aMtAru. 
moVxati rojullo jaMwuvuki I uccAraNa weVliyataM kaRtamEnaxi. 
kAnI kramaMgA ixi oVkamoswaru prAkqwaM ani arWaM cesukovadaM moVxalupeVttiMxi. 
ippudu jaMwuvunu pUrvAnikimalle aMxarU vacci cUdatAniki vIlu lexu. 
xInni tikkeVttU, veVlA, reVMdU peVttAru. 
xoVddilonuMci oVkasAri cUci veVlYlipowe koVMwa, inupa katakatAla xAkA veVlYli koVMwasepu cUdavaleVnu aMte marikoVMwa eVkkuva. 
poyi xAniwo mAtlAdavaleVnu aMte paxi pOMdlu ceVlliMcavaleV. 
I rIwigA rojuku RumAru vaMxa pOMdlu AxAyaM weluwoMxi. 
koVMxaru oVka viRayaM kanipeVttAru. 
A jaMwuvu nixre poxu ani, AhAraM mAwraM rojuku oVkkasAri proVxxunne snAnaM cesi wiMtuMxi ani, nixrapoyinatlu maMcaM mIxa padukuMtuMxi. 
axi cese ceRtalu cAlA viparIwaMgA unnAyi. 
axi Sirassu nelana uMci kAlYlu pEki eVwwi koVnni gaMtalu atle uMtuMxi. 
oVkkoVkkappudu eVdamakAli madama AsanaM kriMxinuMci kudikAli madama sarigA xAni pEna peVtti Upiri pIlci bigabatti atle uMtuMxi. 
itlA reVMdu mUdu gaMtala axe panigA uMtuMxi. 
appudu eVvaru mAtlAdiMcI emI lABaM lexu. 
paMdiwulu xAniwo cesina prasaMgAlu koVnni pawrikalalo pracuriMpabaddAyi iMxu vrAyabaduwunnAyi. 
prawi pawrikalo kUdA I rojullo I prasaMgAlu lekuMdA uMdavu. 
yUrapu moVwwammIxa anni xeSAllo56' gurrapu maniRi' ani awani boVmmalu veyadaM, awanini guriMci viMwagA vrAyadaM, paMdiwulu awaniwo cesina prasaMgAlu vivariMci muxriMcataM prawi pawrikA ceswunnaxi. 
janaM eVgabadi avi caxuvuwunnAru. 
roju rojukI I rakarakAla vArwalu xeSammIxa prabalinE. 
paMdiwulu: mIxi e xeSaM? 
gurrapumaniRi: nAku weVliyaxu. 
paM: mIru eVvaru? 
gu: nAku weVliyaxu. 
paM: ikkadiki eVtlA vaccAru? 
gu: nAku A saMgawulu emI weVliyadaM lexu. 
exo jFApakaM unnatle uMxi gAnI, annI maracipoyAnu. 
paM: mI peru emiti? 
gu: Az, Az, jFApakaM vaswoMxi. 
hAz haz pUrwigA jFApakaM rAvataM lexu. 
paM: mIku saMskqwaM eVtlA vaccunu? 
gu: eVlA vaccexi emiti? 
xAnaMwata axe vaccu. 
paM: mI xeSaMlo aMxarU saMskqwame mAtlAdawArA? 
gu: Az! mAtlAdawAru ane anipiswoMxi. 
kAnI mA xeSaM exo jFApakaM rAvadaM lexu. 
paM: mI jAwi( xanawion) emiti? 
gurrapu maniRi AlociMci xIniki samAXAnaM ceVppa lexu. 
maroVka rojuna paMdiwulu itlu praSniMcAru. 
paM: mIru mI xeSaMlo laMdanu anna peru vinnArA? 
aMwalo oVka jarmanu paMdiwudu" mIru beVrlinu peru vinnArA? 
ani adigAdu. 
oVka PreVMci Ayana" pyAris" peru vinnArA" ani adigAdu. 
gurrapu maniRi vAlYla vaMka AScaryapoyi cUsAdu. 
iMwalo oVka paMdiwudu mI ` peru hAhA hUhU? 
' annAdu. 
aMwalo gurrapu maniRi AScaryapoyinatlu noru AvuliMci, kaMdlu peVxxavi cesi, leci nIdi voVdalu aMwA virucukuni aMwalo xuHKaM poVMxinatlu kanabaddAdu. 
awani noti veVMta" aXa kiM" ani yaMwraM lekuMdA vaccina mAta peVxxa urumuvaleV vinipiMciMxi. 
appatinuMci paMdiwulu mAwraM awanini hAhA hU hU ani ceVppataM moVxalupeVttAru. 
axi peVxxa peru avadaM vAlYlu xAnni hAhU ani klupwaparicAru. 
nI peru hAhA hUhe kaxA? 
ani adigina paMdiwuNNi cUci wakkina vAlYlu aMxarU AScaryapoyinAru. 
Iyanaku eVtlA weVlisiMxA ani. 
Ayana hiMxU xeSaMlo muxriMpabadda saMskqwalipi SabxamaMjarini cUci weVlusukunnAdu. 
xAni prakkana ixi oVka gaMXarvuni peru ani kUdA unnaxi. 
gaMXarvudu aMte axi oVka jAwi maniRi anukunnAdu. 
aMwakanna eVkkuva pariSoXana ceVyya lexu. 
I saMgawi Ayana wakkina pariSoXakulawo ceVppagA vAlYlu koVMwa sepu AlociMci gaMXarvudu anagA xevayoniH ani uMduta cewa, xevayoni anagA xevawalakanna koVMceVM wakkuva vAlYlu ganuka asalu xevawale leru anna prabala viSvAsaMlo I sixXAMwAnni nirAkariMcAru. 
kAnI vIdi AkAraM, mAtalU cUswe A puswakAllo gaMXarvulanu guriMci ceVppinavi annI saripowunnAyi. 
paMdiwulu aMxarU rahasya samAveSAlu ceSAru. 
iMxulo I viRayaM aMxaru paMdiwulakU poVkkanIya lexu. 
koVMwa maMxi peVxxa peVxxa paMdiwulu mAwrame pogupadi I vyakwi oVka gaMXarvudu anI, hiMxuvulu viSvasiMce xevawalalo vIdu oVka jAwivAdu anI weVliyaceyavaccunA ane viRayAnni guriMci vicAriMcAru. 
I viRayaM weVliya ceswe cAlA naRtAlu unnAyi anI walaMcAru. 
veVMtane I saMgawi gavarnameVMtu cewulloki veVlYlipoyiMxi. 
paMdiwulu aMxarU gumigUdi aMxarU kUdA I rahasyaM bayataku ceVppamani pramANAlu ceSAru. 
kAMtarubarI ArcibiRappu I viRayaM weVliyakUdaxu anna rahasya saBaku agrasenAXipawi ayinAdu. 
vAlYla uxxeSaM kUdA I viRayAnni samagraMgA pariSoXana cesi axi nijamEwe lokAniki weVliya ceyavaccunu ani I oVkavelYa I vyakwi gaMXarvudu kAdu emo! vqWAgA iwadu gaMXarvudu ani pracuriswe anavasaramEna viSvAsAlu prabaliMcinavAlYlaM kAvaccunu ani vAlYlu aMxarU UrukoVnnAru. 
paMdiwulani I viRayaM mIxa pariSoXiMcavalasiMxi ani AjFApiMcAru. 
vAlYlu sare annAru. 
iwadu gaMXarvudu kAdu aneVMxuku oVka prabala hewuvu unnaxi. 
gaMXarvulaku reVkkalu uMtAyi. 
vAlYlu AkASAna eVguruwAru. 
vAlYlu goVppa aMxagAlYlu. 
iwani yaMxu I viRayAlu pattataM lexu. 
iMxucewa vAlYlu aMxarU gaMXarvudu kAxu ane wIrmAniMcAru. 
pEgA axi asaMBavamEna viRayaM. 
jarmanIlo oVka peVxxa BARA SAswravewwa unnAdu. 
Ayana gurraM mAtlAduwuMxi anna appatinuMcI peVxxa saMxeha paddAdu. 
PrAnsulo maroVka paSu SAswravewwa unnAdu. 
AyanA gurraM mAtlAduwoMxi aMte saMxehaM paddAdu. 
ixxarikI A viRayaMlo viSvAsaM leka poyiMxi. 
eVtlA uMtuMxi? 
ixxarU goVppa SAswravewwalu. 
moVxati Ayana manuRyulu ucCariMce SabxAlu ucCariMcadAniki manuRyuni muKa avayavamulu oVka prawyeka lakRaNaMwo sqRtiMpabaddAyi ganuka, I SabXAlaku ucCariMcabadawAyi. 
xaMwyamulaku, wAlYavyamulaku, A avayavAla parimANaM manuRyulaku unnatle uMdAli, lekapowe A Xvani ucCariMcabadaxu. 
ane viSvAsaM Ayanaki gattigA uMxi. 
Ayana maroVka goVppa BARA SAswravewwawo itlA annAdu. 
" cUdaMdI! oVkadiki peVxavulu lAvEwe, nAluka koVsa lAvEwe, xavadalu lAvEwe vAlYlu ucCAraNa muxxugA uMtuMxi. 
A lAvu eVkkuva Ewe A Xvani palakaxu. 
aMxukane kaxA? 
paSuvulu manaM ucCariMcinatlu ucCariMcalevu. 
pEgA manuRyuni kaMTaXvani aMxe oVka mArxavaM uMxi. 
jaMwuvula goVMwu bilYAlu kaTinamEna Xvanini puttiMceMxuku paniki vaswAyi. 
SabxarUpaMgA vacce Xvanulaku A kaMTabilYAlu paniki rAvu. 
" annAdu. 
Ayana iMkA itlA annAdu. 
" A gurraM Xvani xUrAniki mAtalalle vinabaduwuMxi anI, xaggaraku peVxxa mowagA vinabaduwuMxi ani pawrikalalo caxivAmu kaxA xaggaraku mowagA vinabadataM mAwrame nijamE uMtuMxi. 
wakkinaxi manavAlYlu kalpiMci uMtAru. 
" anagA A reVMdo paMdiwudu mari" pawrakalalo prasaMgAlu prakatiswunnAru? 
" annAdu. 
moVxati Ayana" axaMwA kalpana anukovalasi vaswuMxi. 
" annAdu. 
paSu SAswravewwa kUdA viSvasiMcalexu. 
Ayana paSuvulayoVkka meVxalYlu cAlA pariSilIMcAdu. 
A meVxadulalo manuRya jFAnAniki saMbaMXiMcina aNuvulu emI kanupiMcalexu. 
manuRya jAwi meVxadu veru, paSu jAwi meVxadu veru. 
I reVMtikI saMbaMXaM lexu. 
paSuvula walalo manuRyuni meVxadu uMdaxu. 
" nenu aneka vAnaramula meVxadulu gUdA pariSIliMcAnu. 
vAti meVxalYlu manuRyula meVxaduki koVMceVM xaggaragA uMtAyi. 
suppleness( meVwwaxanamu) vAni meVxadulo kUdA uMxi. 
gurrapu walalo atti jFAnaM gala meVxadu peVttutaku vIlu lexu. 
xAni walalo meVxadu uMde sWalaM yoVkka parimANAnikI, manuRyuni walalo meVxadu uMde praxeSa parimANAnikI kUdA saMbaMXaM lexu. 
mIru cUda rAxu? 
manuRyuni wala iMwa dippa kalaxi. 
gurrapu walaku atuvaMtappudu. 
manuRyuni walakU iwara paSuvula walaku cAlA BexaM unnaxi. 
manuRyuni Sirassu mIxa veVMtrukalu moVluswAyi. 
vqxXi poVMxuwAyi. 
I veVMtrukalu moVlucutaku wagina Sakwi maniRi Sirassulo uMxi. 
axi koVMwa varaku awani meVxadu svaBAvaM kUdAnu. 
paSuvulaku wala mIxa veVMtrukalu uMdavu. 
gurrAnikI, siMhAnikI unnA axi jUlu kAnI veVMtrukalu kAvu. 
A jUlu meVda mIxa uMtuMxi. 
eVnni viXAlu AlociMcinA ixi asaMBavamEna viRayaM. 
" ixi paSu SAswravewwa yoVkka vAxana. 
I iruvurU laMdanu bayaluxerAru BARA SAswravewwa laMdanu muMxara cerAdu. 
paMdiwulanu aMxarini kalusukunnAdu. 
aMxulo paMdiwulu cAlA maMxi BARA SAswravewwalu kUdAnu. 
vAru Iyana ceVppina mAtalu oVppukunnAru. 
aByaMwara prayawnamu, bAhya prayawnaM reVMdU jarigiwe gAni SabxocCAraNa jarugaxu. 
aMxulo spqRta, IRawspqRtAlU ixi manuRya jFAnamuwo kUdina vyavahAraM. 
I hAhA hUhUki unnaxi gurrapu walakAya. 
I viRayaM vicAriMca valasiMxe annAru. 
BARAvewwa: mIru cAlA rojulu A mqgaMwo( paMdiwulu ikkada ` mqgaMwo' anavaxxu. 
Ayanawo anavalasiMxi annAru) sare Ayanawo mAtlAdAru kaxA! mIru xUraMgA nuMcoVni mAtlAdAru? 
xaggaragA veVlYli mAtlAdAru? 
mAtlAdiwe A mqgaM kAxu. 
Ayana xaMwamulugAni nAluka gAni cUsArA? 
avi eVtlA unnAyi? 
paMdiwulu: memu cUdalexu. 
Ayana noti nuMci vacceXvani peVxxaxigA rAvadaM mUlaMgA A peVxxa Xvaniwo mAku A akRarAlu vispaRtaMgA vinipiMcalexu. 
kAbatti memu Ayana notiki Xvani waggiMce yaMwrAlu peVttAmu. 
aMxucewa, Ayana yaMwraMlo mAtlAduwAdu ganuka, memu Ayana xaMwAlu, jihvA pariSIliMcadaM eVppudU padalexu. 
BARAvewwa: mari Ayana AvaliMcagA EnA eVppudU mIru cUdalexu? 
paMdi: memu cUdalexu. 
Ayana reVMdu mUdu sArlu AvaliMcAdu. 
A AvaliMcataM Ayana nilcunna appude jarigiMxi. 
Ayana eVnimixi adugula eVwwu maniRi. 
memu wala eVwwinA Ayana noru kanipiMcalexu. 
BARA: nA uxxeSaMlo ixaMwA exo oVkammikagA uMxi. 
e xeSaMlo EnA, eVnimixi adugula poVdugu maniRi uMte uMdavaccu. 
atuvaMtivi ippudu prapaMcaMlo eVnni ciwrAlu jaragataM lexu. 
? 
ixI atlAge jarigiwe vAdu exo yaMwraMwo cesina gurrapu walakAya vaMtixi amarcukoVni vaccAdu emo! mIru xaggaraku veVlYli eVppudu EnA pariSIliMci cUsArA? 
paMdi: cUdalexu. 
xaggaragA veVdiwe emi apAyaM jaruguwuMxi ani aMxarU anadaM moVxalu peVttAru. 
mAku mAwraM A BayaM kalugalexu. 
BARA: vaccina waruvAwa Ayanavalla eVvarikannA apakAraM jarigiMxA? 
paMdi: emI jaragalexu. 
BARA: mIru Ayana inupa katakatAlloki poyi eVppudu kUrcunnAru? 
paMdi: kUrcunnAmu. 
appudU Ayana mAku emI apAyaM ceyalexu. 
BARA: ayiwe, sAXuvu annamAta. 
Ayana valla apakAraM emi SaMkiMcanakkaralexu. 
manaM poxAM Ayana xaggaraku. 
veVlYli noru weVravamaMxAmu. 
appudu parIkRixxAmu. 
paMdi: atlA anadaM maryAxa kAxu. 
BARA: mI mAta nAku cAlA koVwwagA unnaxi. 
oVka peVxxa maniRini guriMci mAtlAdinatlugA mAtlAduwunnAru. 
ixi ciwraMgA uMxi. 
pEgA ixi SAswrIyamEna viRayaM. 
Ayanaki mIru naccaceVppaMdi. 
SAswra viRayikamEna oVka yaXArXaM weVlusukoneVMxuku jFAnaM kala sarva jaMwuvulu pAtu padavalasiMxi kaxA? 
mari Ayana xaMwamulu, wAlYuvulu moVxalEnavi gurrapuvi valeV uMdi Ayana yitlA mAtlAdagaligiwe, manaM lokaMlo unna sarva jaMwuvula cewA manuRyulu mAtlAde BARanu mAtlAdiMca vaccunu kaxA! paMdi: nijame kAnI manaM I viRayaM SAswraM anI, ixi yaXArXaM koVraku pariSoXana anI anukuMtunnAM AyanakUdA atlA anukovaxxu! Ayana muKaM manaM pariSIliMcavaleVnaMte Ayanni paduko anAli. 
noru weVravu anAli. 
Ayanaku axi agOravaM anipiMcavaccu. 
moVnna oVka viRayaMlo cUcAnu. 
Ayana cewilo nuMci exo vaswuvu nenu wIsukunnAnu. 
appudu Ayana kopaMgA cUsAdu, adakkuMdA wIsukoVnnAnu ani. 
axi maryAxa lakRaNaMgA lexu ani. 
atuvaMtivAdu ilA ceVyyamaMte oVppukodu. 
BARA: ayiwe Ayanaku kloroPAraM moVxalEna vaswuvulu evEnA ippiMci Ayanni nixra puccAli. 
appudu gAnI mana pariSoXanaku vIlu uMdaxu. 
paMdi: mana ORaXAlu Ayana SarIraM mIxa eVMwa varaku pani ceswAyi axi saMxehAgraswamEna viRayaM. 
eVMxukaMte, Ayana cewula kriMxa veVnuka BAgAna reVMdu poVdugAti gAyAlu unnAyi. 
avi mAnupuxAM ani Ayana nixrapoyina moVxati paxihenu rojullo maMxulu veSArata. 
avi neVmmaxiMcalexu. 
Ayana melukoVnna waruvAwa A maMxulu eVvarU veVyyalexu. 
A puMdlu atlAge unnAyi. 
Ayana paMdlu wiMtAde kAnI; eVMxuku wiMtAdo weVliyaxu. 
Ayana SarIraM eVppudU malavisarjana ceVyyaxu. 
Ayanni moVttamoVxati rojuna vIXilo padi uMdagA cUsinappudu vExyulu Ayana hqxayAnni, nAdini parIkRa ceSArata, vAniyaMxu manuRyulakumalle spaMxanaM eVkkadA kanipiMcalexata. 
kloroPAraM eVkkiMcadAnikEnA vIlu eVlA uMxi? 
Ayana A goVttaM mukkuxaggara peVttukovaleV kaxA! poyi adigiwe oVppukuMtAdu ani wocaxu. 
adigiMcaMdi cUxxAM. 
BARA: mIru ceVppinatlugA Ayana aMwa maryAxa galavAdu, jFAnaM galavAdunu ayiwe wappakuMdA oVppukoVMtAdu. 
kAnI Ayana BARa nAku rAxu. 
kanuka mIru nA mAtalu Ayanaku Ayana BARalo warjumA cesi ceVbiwe Ayana oVppukuMtAru ani woswuMxi. 
pEgA ixi SAswraM( Science) yaXArXAnveRaNaM( Search after truth) ani aMxarU kalisi hAhU xaggaraku veVlYlAru. 
appudu hAhU prANamulu bigabatti kUrcunnAdu. 
appudu A paMdiwudu A kUrcunna paxXawi paxmAsanaM anI, A vAyuvu bigiMcuta prANAyAmaM anI, Ayana wanawo ceVppAdu ani ceVppAdu. 
I paxXawigA Ayana neVla nAlYla kriMxa mUdu nAlugu gaMtalu mAwrame uMdevAdu anI, ippudu axi rojuku edu eVnimixi gaMtalu ceswunnAdu ani ceVppAdu. 
marunAdu proVxxutiki PreVMci paSu SAsravewwa xigAdu. 
Ayana BARAvewwawo kaliSAdu. 
oVkariwo oVkariki paricayaM kaligiMxi. 
paSu: mIku kaligina saMxehamu, nAkU kaligiMxi. 
paSuvula Sirassulalo meVxadu manuRyulaku unna atuvaMti jFAnAnni kaligi uMdataM asaMBavaM. 
BARA: avunu nijame. 
manaM SabxAlu ucCariMcetappudu prayawnaM ceswAmu. 
A prayawnaM manaku weVliyakuMdAne jaruguwuMxi. 
e SabxaM ucCariMceMxuku eVMwa gAli manaM nABi xaggaranuMci puttiMcAli, axi kaMTamulo eVMwa bigabattAli, muKaMloki rAniccina gAli wAlYuvulako xaMwAlako, UrXvaBAgAniko eVkkuva wagiliMcAli, wakkuva wagiliMcAli ixi aMwA mana meVxadulo unna jFAnAnnibatti manaku weVliyakuMdAne jarigipowU uMtuMxi. 
paMdi: avunu. 
vIti saMskqwa vEyAkaruNulu spqRtaM anI, IRawspqRtaM anI, saMvAxaM anI, vivAxaM anI moVxalugA aMtAru. 
BARA: vAlYlu e peru peVdiwe emi? 
jarige prayawnaM axi. 
paSu: vIti annitiki, saMskqwaMlo perlu unnAyi? 
ayiwe A BARa rAsinavAlYlu goVppa SAswrajFulu anna mAta. 
paMdi: vAlYlEna xAnilo manaM e mUla avuxumu? 
BARA: avuxumu kAmu axi aMwA eVMxuku kAnI I prayawnAlu. 
paMdi: bAhyAByaMwara prayawnAlu, wAlvAxi? 
sWAnAnni bAhya prayawnamu aMtAru paSu: mI pariBARa kaWalu atlA uMcaMdi. 
A prayawnaM jFAnaM uMte gAni kalagaxu. 
A jFAnaM paSuvula meVxadulalo uMdaxu. 
BARA: mI SAswramu, mA SAswramu, reVMdU reVMdu mArgAla powunnA, avi gurwiMcina yAxArWya viRayaM mAwraM oVkate. 
paSu: asalu paSuvula neVwwurulo, manuRyula neVwwurulo unnaMwa curuku lexu. 
paMdi: A saMgawiki ikkada prasakwi kalugaxu. 
eVMxuku aMte hAhUgAri xehaM manuRya xehaM vaMtixi. 
manuRya xehaMkannA kUdA eVkkuva sukumAramEnaxi, meVwwanEnaxi. 
manuRyula SarIrAllo unna neVwwurulo curuku yABE pAlYlu uMte, Ayana SarIraMlo vaMxa pAlYlu uMtuMxi. 
iMka mIru 
ixxarU muKa avayavAla guriMci meVxadu yoVkka guNAlanu guriMcI AlociMcavaccu. 
BARA: mIku anavasaraMgA kopaM vaswunnaxi. 
memu SAswra viRayikaMgA carca ceswunnAM kAnI mI aSva muKuniki avamAnakaraMgA prasaMgiMcadaM lexu. 
A mAtlAdexi saMskqwaBARa ani nAku weVlusu. 
Ayana mAtlAde BARavaMti BARa e saMskqwa graMWAllonU cUdalexu. 
aMwa manoharamEna BARa mAtlAduwAdu. 
Ayana eVMwa goVppa paMdiwudo weVliyalexu. 
Ayana atlA mAtlAduwAdu aMte, Ayana muKa avayavAlu atlA mAtlAdeMxuku anuguNaMgA unnAyi annamAte kaxA! atuvaMti jFAnaM uMdeMxuku A meVxadulo unna paxArWaM anuvEnaxi ane kaxA! I viRayaM sAmAnyamEna jFAnamunaku anumeyaM avuwuMdagA( UhiMca waginaxi) mIru iMwa pariSoXana ceyAli anadaM bAgalexu. 
BARA: memu pariSoXiswAM anexi A viRayaM kAxu. 
Ayana vaxanaMlo avayavAlu manuRya muKAvayavAlakannA BinnaMgA uMdi A SaBxamulu ucCariMpabaduwunnavemo anna viRayaM. 
paSu: nenU axe Ayana walalo unna meVxadu manuRyula meVxaduki xaggaragA uMtuMxemo ani cUdAli. 
paMdi: A cUdatamu eVtlA watasWiswuMxi. 
paSu: Ayanaku kloroPAraM iswe Ayana meVxadu BAgaM Saswramuwo weVraci cUsi parIkRa ceyavaleVnu. 
paMdi: SaswraM ceyadaM kUdA? 
Ayanaku kloroPArame eVkkaxemo! pEgA prANApAyaM jaragavaccu. 
Ayana mana xeSaMlo koVnnAlYlu uMte Ayana xeSaM exo, Ayana eVvvaro kanukkovAlani uMxi. 
Ayana valla mahAviRayAlu koVnni bayata padawAyi Ayana jFAnAnni, xAni lowunu kanipeVttakuMdA alpamEna Ayana SarIra avayavAlanu pariSIlana ceswAmu, xAnivalla exo jFAnABivqxXi ceswAM aMtAru emiti? 
asalu Ayana jFAnaM manuRya jFAnAniki awIwaMgA kanipiswoMxi. 
Ayana meVxadu manuRyula meVxadukanna cAlA BinnaMgA uMdi uMdAli. 
Ayana kaMTa bilaM wappakuMdA peVxxaxi. 
Ayana goVMwuka cUdalexu? 
gurrapu meVda aMwa lAvunnaxi. 
Ayana xavadalu, nAlukA cAlA lAvEnavi ayi uMdavaleV. 
lekapowe Ayana mAtlAduwoMte boVMyimani aMwa Xvani puttaxu. 
samIpAniki A Xvani vispaRtaMgA uMdaxu. 
A viRayaMlo pariSoXana akkara lexu ani nA uxxeSaM. 
BARA: mIkU mAkU praXAna viRayAlalo BexaM unnaxi. 
mIru prawIxI UhiMcAM aMtAru. 
memu prayogaM(4) cesi cUdavaleV aMtAmu. 
axi yaxArWaM kAkapovaccu. 
memu prawyakRaMgA viRayamunu cUsi pariSIliswAM ganuka mA pariSoXana eVppudU yaxArWaM avuwuMxi. 
paMdi: memu UhiswAM aMte, veVrri moVrrigA UhiMcaM gaxA! oVka hewuvunu puraskariMcukuni UhiswAM memu e viRayAlanu AXAraM cesukuni UhiswAmo A viRayAlalo xoRaM vuMte, mA Uha wappavaccu. 
mIru ixi ceVppaMdi. 
xoRaM uMte, mI viRayaMlo kUdA uMdavaccu. 
mIru viRayaM pariSiliMci cUswAru. 
A pariSIliMcadaMlo koVnniMtini samagraMgA pariSiliMcaleka povaccu. 
appudu yaxArWya parijFAnAniki BaMgaM kaluguwuMxi. 
paMdiwulu itlA vAxiMcagAne BARA paSu SAswra vewwalaku mIku mAku aBiprAya BexaM uMxi ani ceVppi vAxana mugiMci veVlYli poyinAru. 
paMdiwudu hAhU xaggaraku veVlYlAdu. 
BARA paSu SAswravewwalu ixxarU oVkacota kUrcoVni mAtlAdukovadaM moVxalu peVttAru. 
kloroPAraM ippiMcadaM varaku ixxarU ekIBaviMcAru. 
kloroPAraM iccina waruvAwa paSu SAswravewwa wala weVraci meVxadu parIkRiMcukuMtAdu. 
BARAvewwa muKAvayavAlu parIkRiMcukuMtAdu. 
kanuka awaniki kloroPAraM ippiMcatAniki prayawnaM ceVyyAli anukoVnnAru. 
A ceVyyatAniki A mqgAniki weVliyakuMdA ceswe maMcixi anukunnAru. 
paMdiwudu poyi ceVbuwAdu emo ani BayapaddAru. 
marI A mqgAnni guriMci paMdiwudiki goVppa aBiprAyaM uMxi ganuka, axi oVka viXamEna maryAxa BaMgaMgA uMtuMxi ani ceVppadaM kUdA AlociMcAru. 
Ayana nivasiMce gqhaM moVttamoVxata pariSIliMcAli anukoVnnAru. 
ixxarU, veVlYlAru, pariSIliMcAru. 
reVMdu mUdu rojulu xina rAwrulu melukoVni A mqgaM cese panulu annI jAgrawwagA pariSIliMcAru. 
A mqgaM rAwrilYlu reVMdu jAmulappudu, reVMdu mUdu gaMtalu kalYlu mUsukuni nixra powU unnatlugA padukoVMtuMxi. 
A samayaM wama kAryAniki anukUlaMgA uMtuMxi ani grahiMcAru. 
rojU vyavahAraM yaWAprakAraMgA jaruguwoMxi. 
janaM vaswunnAru. 
cUsi powunnAru. 
paMdiwulu vaswunnAru. 
prasaMgiswunnAru. 
BARA paSu SAswravewwalukUdA rojU vaswAru. 
atU itU cUswAru. 
exo Alociswunnattu kanabadawAru. 
waruvAwa paxihenu rojulaku oVka rojuna rAwri reVMdu jAmulappudu yABE maMxi manuRyulu gumigUdi saxxu lekuMdA hAhU iMtiki vaccAru. 
cImacitukkumaMte vAlYlalo vAlYlu uxvegaM poVMxuwunnAru. 
aMxulo oVkadu vacci walupu wAlYaM Xvani lekuMdA wISAdu. 
nAlugu rojulanuMcI, A wAlYaMlo nUneV poswU vaccAru. 
aMxucewa wAlYaM Xvani lekuMdA wirigiMxi. 
Aruguru manuRyulu mAwraM lopaliki veVlYlAru. 
malYlI wAlYaM veSAru. 
wakkina janaM aMxarU katakatAlaku bayata nilcuMdi rivAlvarlu bArulu cesi attipeVttAru. 
lopala praveSiMce ArugurU rivAlvarlu cewulalo puccukuni jAgrawwagA awanini samIpiMcAru. 
A velYaku vAlYla axqRtavaSAwwu hAhU reVMdu cewulU poVtta mIxa xaggaragA peVtti unnAyi. 
kAlYlu reVMdU xaggaragA peVtti unnAyi. 
A Arugurilo ixxaru kannu mUsi, kannu weVricetaMwalo reVMdu peVxxa inupa saMkeVlYlanu kAlYlaku oVkatI, cewulaku oVkatI wagiliMcAru. 
A saMkeVlYlu _mahA mahA baliRTamEnavi. 
avi annI baliRTamEna ukku mukkalawo ceyiMcAru. 
pAwika maMxi manuRyula balaM kalavAdEnA vAtini sAgaxiyya ledu. 
avi wagiliMcinaMwalo hAhU kalYlu weVricAdu. 
weVricina veVMta paxi eVlaktrik xIpAlanu awani kalYla mIxiki Pokasu ceSAru. 
Ayana niScalaMgA paMdukoVni aMxarivaMkA cUSAdu. 
veVMtane Ayana padukoVnna gaxi aMwA peVxxa veVluwuru vyApiMciMxi. 
aMwalo vArilo oVka paMdiwudu kanipiMcAdu. 
awadu hAhU ceVvixaggara itlA aricAdu. 
" nI cewulakI, kAlYlakI SqMKalAlu veSAmu. 
nuvvu kaxiliwe ninnu caMpi veswAmu. 
mA SAswra pariSoXana koVraku nIku o mawwu maMxu peVduwunnAmu. 
mIru oVka gaMta leka reVMdu gaMtala sepu mawwulo uMtAru. 
mIku prANApAyaM lexu. 
kanuka prawiGatiMcakuMdA uMte mI maryAxA, mA maryAxA xakkuwuMxi. 
" veVMtane ixxaru dAktarlu xaggaraku vacci Ayanaku kloroPAraM moVxalu peVttAru. 
hAhU kalYlu wrippi aMxari vaMkA cUsAdu. 
prakkanu meyaru nilcunnAdu. 
awaniki veVMtane weVlisiMxi. 
ixi aXikArula anumawiwo jaruguwunna pani ani. 
Ayana veVMtane kalYlu mUsukoVnnAdu. 
dAktarlu kloroPAraM paMp ceswunnAru. 
oVka dAktaru nAdi cUdataM moVxalu peVttAdu. 
pAvu gaMta sepu ayina waruvAwa smqwi unnaxI lenixI cUsAru. 
hAhU kannulu weVricAdu malYlI pAvu gaMta sepu ayinaxi. 
smqwi poyiMxi emo ani malYlI cUSAru. 
hAhU malYlI kalYlu weVricAdu. 
I kriyA kalApaM oVka gaMta sepu jarigiMxi. 
hAhU kalYlu weVrici cUswU unnAdu. 
aMxulo BARA SAswravewwaku oVka anumAnaM kagiliMxi. 
A mqgaM asalu gAli pIlcakuMdA bigabeVttiMxemo ani. 
kloroPAraM dabbA veVnakku wIsi awani mukku xaggara vrelYlu peVttAdu. 
gAli AdadaM lexu. 
dAktarlu hqxayaM pariSIliMcAru. 
hqxayaMlo spaMxanaM lexu. 
nAdi cUsAru. 
nAdi AdataM lexu. 
hqxayaM AgipoyiMxi. 
kqwrima SvAsa kaligiMcAli anukunnAru. 
( ArtiPiRiyalu reVspareRanu) ayyo! apAyaM anukunnAru. 
vIlYlu aMxarU gAbarA paduwuMte hAhU kalYlu weVricAdu. 
aMxarU AScaryapoyinAru. 
vExyulu hqxayamU, nAdI malYlI parIkRa ceSAru. 
vAti reVMtilonU kaxalika lexu. 
hAhU kalYlu mAwraM weVrici uMcAdu. 
dAktarlU, meyarU emi AlociMcukoVnnAro kAnI veVMtane Ayana cewulakI, kAlYlakI saMkeVlYlu wIsi vesi, aMxarU bayatiki veVlYlipoyinAru. 
bayata rivAlvarlu puccukoVni nilcunna yABE maMxi sEnikulu vAri veVMtabadipoyinAru. 
ixxaru SAswravewwalU, ixxaru dAktarlU kUrcoVni waruvAwa emi ceyavalayuno AlociMca moVxalupeVttAru. 
meyaru wanaku pani uMxi ani veVlYlipoyinAdu. 
PreVMci SAswrajFudu wana viRayaM nirASa cesukunnAdu. 
jarmanI SAswravewwaki iMkA nirASa kalugalexu. 
jarmanu SAswrajFudu: oVkavelYa Ayana melukoVnnappude wala kosi meVxadu wIsi cUswe eVtlA uMdexi. 
dAktaru: axi apAyaM kAxu! maniRi caccipowe? 
ja. 
SA: iMkA maniRi ani mIku anumAnaM uMxA? 
dA: avunu kAxu weVliyakuMdA vuMxi. 
nenu grIs miWAlajI caxivAnu. 
hiMxU miWAlajIlo kUdA koVnni graMWAlu caxivAnu. 
itlAMti jaMwuvulu uMdataM A puswakAlalo uMtuMxi. 
kAnI avi annI kalpanalu anukoVnnAnu. 
grIku purANAlalo unna minetAru moVxalEna jaMwuvulaku kUdA prANaM uMtuMxi. 
A grIku vIrulu vAtini caMpAru. 
prANaM uMdi gAli AduwoMte caMpuwAM. 
hqxaya spaMxanAnni batti, nAdi kaxalikanubatti prANaM uMdatAnni gurwiswAM. 
ippudu awanilo oVka xAniki oVkati viruxXaMgA unnAyi. 
hqxayaM gAnI, nAdi gAnI kaxalavu. 
awadu brawiki unnAdu. 
kalYlu weVraci cUswAdu. 
nAku emI pAlupovadaM lexu. 
PreVMci SAswravewwa: oVka upAyaM ceswe bAgA uMtuMxemo ani UhagA unnaxi. 
awaniwo I viRayaM aMwA ceVppi" ixi pariSoXana viRayaM. 
nIku prANApAyaM uMdaxu. 
nIvu oVppukovalasiMxi. 
gaMta sepatlo nIku malYlI punaHsmqwi vaswuMxi" ani oVppiswe? 
paMdiwudu: kAnI Ayana oVMtimIxa gAyaM mana maMxulawo nimmaxiMcaxu kaxA! manaM gAyaM cesinavAlYlaM mAwrame avuwAM. 
pEgA axi wala mIxa, neVmmaxiMpiMcinavAlYlaM kAkapowAmemo! ja. 
SA: oVppukokapowe iMko upAyaM ceVyyavaccu. 
wupAkulu cUpi nIvu oVppukokapowe vItiwo kAlci caMpeswAM ani ceVppavaccu. 
awani eVxutane I wupAkiwo kAlci e jaMwuvuno caMpeswe, awaniki BayaM kUdA kaluguwuMxi. 
alA oVppukuMtAdu anukuMtAnu. 
dA: reVMdU upAyAlugA unnAyi. 
repu adigi cUxxAM. 
ani nirNayiMcukoVni eVvalYla xArina vAlYlu veVlYlAru. 
marnAdu weVllavArina waruvAwa hAhUni cUdatAniki veVlYlAru. 
Ayana prANAyAmaMlo unnAdu. 
ivvAlYa proVxxune moVxalu peVttAdu emitabbA ani paMdiwulu aMxaru AScaryapoyinAru. 
A roju proVxxuguMkevaraku Ayana kalYlu weVrava lexu. 
samAXi vaxala lexu. 
kUrcuMdi kUrcuMdi, SAswravewwalU, dAktarlU visigi veVlYlipoyinAru. 
malYlI marnAdu proVxxunne vaccAru. 
Ayana samAXilo unnAdu. 
rAwri pUta padukoVnnAdA ani akkada unna kApalA vAlYlanu adigAru. 
vAlYlu atlAge kUrcunnAdu ani ceVppAru. 
itlA paxihenu rojulu gadiciMxi. 
eVvaro Ayana veVnukagA povadaM watasWiMciMxi. 
Ayana vIpu mIxa pakRi Ikalalle guburugA exo peVrigi unnaxi. 
prakkanuMci cUswe Ayana cewikriMxa ixivaraku uMde pulYlu kanipiMcadaM lexu. 
I pakRi Ikalu eVkkadivi ani aMxarU AScaryapoyinAru. 
I paxihenu rojulabatti Ayana xaggaraku eVvalYlU veVlYladaM lexu, rAvadaM lexu, A katakatAlloki eVvvarU veVlYla lexu. 
paxahArava rojuna Ayana kalYlu weVraci' wawraBavaMwaH kuwravarwaMwe' ani keka veSAdu. 
Ayana mAtlAduwunnAdu ani weVlisi akkada unna polIsuvAru poyi meyaruwo ceVppAru. 
meyaru paMdiwulanu pilipiMcAdu. 
paMdiwulu vaccAru. 
hAhU vAlYlani wAnu kappukoVnutaku reVMdu peVxxa SAluvAlu kAvAli ani adigAdu. 
veVMtane SAluvAlu vaccinAyi. 
mUdu gajAla veVdalpU, paXnAlagu mUrala poVdugU kaligina meVwwani sannani Ulu xuppatlu aMculu kuttiMci reVMdu weVcci Ayanaku iccAru. 
Ayana oVkati kappukoVnnAdu. 
Ayana paMdiwulawo annAdu," nenu snAnaM ceyavaleV. 
nenu snAnaM cesinaMwasepU I cuttupatla eVvvarU uMdakUdaxu lekapowe A snAnaM cese cota addaMki kattiMcAli" ani. 
I mAtalaku aMxarikI AScaryaM ayiMxi. 
kAnI meyaru vinadaMwo nijame anukoVnnAdu. 
Ayana" nijaMgA I hAhU nAgarikudu. 
lekapowe snAnAla gaxi kAvAli aMtAdA" anukunnAdu. 
veVMtane exo wIsuku vacci snAnAla gaxiki nAlugu vepulA addAlu kattAru. 
hAhU lopalaku veVlYli snAnaM cesi bEtaku vacci paMdlu weVmmannAdu. 
paMdlu weVccAru. 
AragiMcAdu. 
janaM malYlI Ayana cuttU mUgadaM moVxalupeVttAru. 
paMdiwula prasaMgAlu AraMBaM ayinAyi. 
Ayana wana oVMtimIxa nuMci SAluvA wIyadaM lexu. 
nAlugu Exu rojulu ayiMxi. 
Ayana pagalu mAtlAduwAdu kAnI rAwrulaMxu padukodu. 
kUrcuMdi prANAyAmaM ceswU uMtAdu. 
I saMgawi aMxarU jAgrawwagA gurwupattAru. 
PreVMci jarmanI SAswrajFulu Ayana rAwrilYlu padukoka povadAniki wAmu awaniki kloroPAraM ivvadAniki cesina prayawnaM kAraNaM anukunnAru. 
itlA uMdagA oVka vAraM rojulaki Ayana vIpu mIxa exo eVwwugA unnatlu kanipiMciMxi. 
moVxata axi SAluvA mudawalu paddaxi anukoVnnAru. 
rojuku rojuku axi eVwwu avuwunnatlu uMxi. 
Ayana kUrcuMdagA, Ayana kriMxa exo baMgArapu Ikalu paracinatlu kanupiMcadaM moVxalupeVttiMxi. 
Ayana eVvvarU melkoVnaka muMxe poyi, snAnaM cesi vacci sAvitlo kUrcuMtAdu. 
A kUrcovadaM kUrcovadaM proVxxukruMke varakU atlAge kUrcuMtAdu. 
axivaraku paMdlu winevAdu. 
ippudu avI mAneSAdu. 
proVxxukuMkadaM wote koVMceVM kaxali paxmAsanaM vesi prANAyAmaM moVxalu peVdawAdu. 
oVka rojuna maXyAhnaM Exuguru SAswrajFulu Exuguru dAktarlani, ixxaru paMdiwulani veVMtabeVttukoVni Ayana xaggaraki veVlYlAru. 
poyi Ayanaku koVMwa xUraMlo kUrcunnAru Ayana reVMdo SAluvA kUdA wIsukoVni oVlYlu aMwA kappukunnAdu. 
Ayana moVKaM wappa iMkemI kanipiMcadaM lexu. 
SAswrajFula uxxeSAlu saMskqwIkariMci paMdiwulu Ayanawo ceVppAru:" ayyA! vIrixi jarmanI xeSaM. 
Iyana BARA SAswravewwa" ani paMdiwulu moVxalu peVttagAne Ayana" BARASAswraM nAma kiM" ani praSniMcAdu. 
paMdi: BARa eVtlA puttiMxi, e BARalonuMci I BARalu puttinAyi I viRayaM weVlusukunexi BARA SAswraM. 
hAhU navvi" sarveRAM BARANAM gIrvANyena praBavahewuH eRA vicAraNa nAma kiM prakArA" annAdu. 
paMdi: moVttamoVxata iMdo yUropiyan BARa ani oVkati unnaxi. 
aMxulonuMci iMdo Ereniyanu BARa puttiMxi. 
xAni nuMdi saMskqwaM puttiMxi. 
ixi mA SAswra pariSoXana" annAdu. 
hAhU navvi waruvAwa kaWa ceVppamannAdu. 
paMdi: I reVMdava Ayana PreVMci xeSasWudu, paSuSAswravewwa. 
ExugurU AyA SAswramulayaMxu eVMwo sAmarXyaM gadiMcinavAru. 
vAriki wama viRayaMlo oVka saMxehaM uMxi. 
axi wIrcukoVnutaku vaccAru. 
hAhU: ka eRaH kaXyawAM. 
paMdi: ciwwaM mIru kRamiMcavalayunu. 
wama SarIraM mAnava avayavaM kalaxi. 
mI Sirassu aSvamuxi. 
aSvAxulu paSuvulu. 
vAniki mAnavulaku unnaMwa jFAnaM kAnI uccAraNa sOlaByaM kAnI lexu. 
wama Sirassu aSva Sirassu kanuka aMxulo mAnavuni jFAnamunaku waginatlugA ceyabadina meVxadu uMduta eVtlu watasWiMcunu ani paSuSAswrajFuni saMxehaM. 
mI wAlYuvulu, xaMwamulu moVxalEna muKAMwara avayavamulu Gotaka muKa avayavamulu kanuka mI notiveVMta manuRyocCAraNa eVtlu vaswunnaxi ani jarmanI paMdiwunaku saMxehaM. 
I saMxeha nivAraNa ceyutaku vAru mIku oVka ORaXaM icci mIku smqwi lekuMdA ceswAru. 
appudu mI meVxadunu vAru kawwulawo weVraci parIkRiswAru. 
ixi yaWArXya parijFAnaM kosaM ganuka mIru xIniki oVppukovaleV. 
hAhU: nenu oVppukokapowe emi ceswAru? 
ja. 
SA: mA balaM upayogiMci mIru oVppukunetattu ceyavalasi vaswuMxi. 
( hAhU iwanu emiti aMtAdu ani paMdiwuNNi adagagA paMdiwudu xAnini saMskqwaMlo ceVppAdu. 
) hAhU: oVkka viRayaM cUdaMdi. 
nAku mI manassulalo inni cilipi Uhalu eVtlA pudawAyi ani uMxi. 
I Uhalu putteMxuku mI walalo unna meVxalYlu eVtlAMtivi pariSIliMcuxAM ani uMxi nannu emi ceyamaMtAru? 
paMdiwudu I vAkyAlu warjumA cesi SAswrajFulawo ceVppAdu. 
vAlYlu oVkalYla moVKaM vaMka oVkalYlu cUcukoVnnAru. 
emi samAXAnaM ceVppAlo weVliyaxu. 
koVMceVM sepu atU itU wakkiwAri vAlYla xArini vAlYlu veVlYlAru. 
appudu paMdiwudu itlA annAdu. 
" mA xeSAlalo viRayaM weVlusukuMxAM anna jijFAsa eVkkuva. 
mA xeSasWulu iwara KaMdAlaku poyi akkada unna viMwalU viSeRAlanu guriMci rAswU uMtAru. 
hAhU: eVMxuku A pani ceVyyataM? 
sqRti viBinnaM Enaxi ani mIku weVliyaxu? 
sqRtilo aneka rakAlEna jaMwuvulu uMtAyi ani mIku weVliyaxu? 
aneka rakAla jaMwuvulu uMte vAti alavAtlu veru, aneka jAwula manuRyulu uMte vAlYla AcArAlu veru ayi uMtAyi ani weVlusukoVnadaM cAlA welikEna viRayaM. 
moVttamoVxata koVnni kroVwwa mqgAlanu kroVwwa jAwulanu cUswe axi AScaryaMgA uMdavaccu. 
axi ajFAnaM yoVkka lakRaNaM. 
SAswra parijFAnaM kaligina waruvAwa buxXi paripakvaM Ewe AScaryakaramEna viRayaM emI uMdanakkara lexu. 
pEgA manaM oVka viRayaM cUsi weVlusukuMte xAninibatti aneka viRayAlu UhiMcavaccu. 
xenini manaM UhiswAM xAnini waruvAwa prawyakRaMgA cUcinA AScaryaMgA uMdaxu. 
I mAwraM kosaM pariSoXana anI, kosi cUswAM anI aMtAru eVMxuku? 
pEgA mIru AlociMci manassunu ekAgraMgA uMci viRayamula yoVkka yAxArXyaM weVlusuko leralle uMxi. 
SArIrakaMgA pariSIliMci eVMwa jFAnaM ani nercukuMtAru? 
ekAgra manaskulu Ewe xAni viRayaM weVluswuMxi kaxA! paMdiwulakU mAtalu emI arXaM kAlexu. 
A paMdiwulu poyi I mAtalu annI vacci ivawala aMxariwo ceVppAru. 
marunAdu I viRayAlu pawrikala niMdA eVkkinE. 
marunAdu I vAkyAlu caxivina waruvAwa yUrapulo gala peVxxa wawvavewwalu aMxarU I gurrapu maniRi yoVkka meXA viSeRAnni guriMci AlociMcadaM moVxalupeVttAru. 
cAlA maMxi waxxarSanArXamE laMdanuku bayaluxerAru. 
paMdiwulakU SAswrajFulakU hAhUwo vAxiMcatAniki emI wocalexu. 
vIru aMxarU emi ceVppinA Ayana oVka cinna mAtawo vIlYla vAxAlu annI parABUwAlu ceswunnAdu. 
laMdanulo awanu mqgaM anna viMwa poyi awadu vAxanaSIli anna viMwa puttiMxi. 
oVka rojuna BARA paSu SAswravewwalu kUrcuni AlociMcadaM moVxalu peVttAru. 
paSu: I mqgaM manaku svAXInaM ayyetatlu lexu. 
xInini emi cexxAM? 
BARAvewwa: manaM moVxata AlociMcina upAyame bAgA uMxi. 
awani eVxuta oVka peVxxa xunnano, eVxxuno wupAkiwo kAlci caMpi cUpi awanini Baya peVtti manaM vaSaparacukovAli. 
paSu: I saMgawi lArdu meyaruwo ceVppi dAktarlanu wIsikoVni poyi prayawnaM cexxAM. 
ani vAlYlu ixxarU poyi I saMgawi meyaruwo ceVppAru. 
meyaru itlA annAdu. 
" wupAkiwo kAliswe prANulu caccipowAyi ani awaniki memu ixivarake weVliya ceSAM. 
awadu vaccina koVwwalo oVka rojuna awanu oVka sEnikuni cewilonuMci wupAki lAkkunnAdu. 
memu rivAlvaruwo oVka kukkanu caMpi Ayanaki cUpi malYlI A wupAki wIsukunnAM. 
paSu: ayiwe Ayanaku BayaM ixivarake kaligiMxi annamAta. 
sare, iMka I prayawnaM cexxAM. 
ani dAktarlu, sibbaMxi, SAswrajFulu aMxarU kalisi Ayana xaggaraku veVlYlAru. 
Ayanawo I saMgawi aMwA ceVppiMcAru. 
" mIru oVppukokapowe maryAxa xakkaxu. 
yaxArWa viRaya parijFAnaM kosaM mAlo prANAlu aMte leVkka levu. 
kloroPAraM ane I maMxu eVkkuvagA iswe maniRi caswAdA, cAvadA ane viRayaM welcukuneMxuku oVka PreVMci SAswrajFudu wAnu I maMxu pIlci caccipoyinAdu. 
itlA eVMwa maMxo goVppa SAswrajFulu mA xeSAllo jFAnaM kosaM Ahuwi ayinAru. 
kanuka mIru xIniki oVppukovAli. 
hAhU: ayinA mI mAnava jAwiki emi goVppa lABaM vacciMxi? 
paMdiwulu nAwo ceVppe viRayAlanubatti cUswe, mI xeSaMlo ajFAnaM eVkkuvagA unnatlu uMxe! koVnni koVnni vyAXulaku ORaXAlu levata. 
kalarAlU, maSUcikAlU vacci janaM caccipowuMtArata. 
vaMxa eMdlu kUdA sarigA brawakarata. 
wapassu eVvvarU ceVyyarata. 
jFAnaM wapassu valla vaswuMxi. 
kAnI jaMwu SarIrAlanu kosi cUswe rAxu. 
paSu: memu mIwo vAxiMceMxuku rAlexu. 
mIru memu ceVppina prakAraM vinakapowe I wupAkulawo mimmalni bAXiMci mIku smqwi poyina waruvAwa mA viRayapariSoXana cesukovalasi vuMtuMxi. 
kanuka AlociMcavalasiMxi. 
hAhU: mI xeSaMlo prawi vyakwikI I svAwaMwryaM uMxata kaxA! moVnna oVka paMdiwudu ceVppAdu. 
A svAwaMwryaM mI xeSAlalo puttina vAlYlakenA? 
iwara xeSAla nuMci ikkadiki vaswe, vAdiki A vyakwi svAwaMwryaM uMdaxA? 
nenu oVka vyakwini. 
nA svAwaMwryaM nAku unnaxi. 
nA SarIraM mIxa mIru ceswAM anna parIkRaku nenu oVppukonu. 
mari nA svAwaMwryaM emi kAvaleV? 
peVxxalu aMxarU walalu vAlcAru. 
paSu SAswravewwa itlA annAdu" svAwaMwryaM anexi mAnavulake kAnI, mqgAlaku lexu. 
nIvu mqgaM avunu kAvuna, A svAwaMwryaM nIku pattaxu. 
"" hAhU: manaM aMxaramU paSuvulame. 
wiryakkulakU manuRyulakU jFAnaMlo BexaM uMxi. 
manuRyulaku unnaMwa jFAnaM paSuvulaku lexu. 
vAti BexaM jFAnaM cewane nirNayiMpabaduwuMxi. 
nAku kUdA mIku unnaMwa jFAnaM vuMxi. 
kAbatti nannu mIru mIku mallene cUdAli. 
" pa. 
SA: kAnI oVkka jFAname kAxu I viRayAnni nirNayiMcexi, AkAraM kUdAnu. 
hAhU: ayiwe mIku unna AkArame jFAnaM valasina AkAramE, nAku unnaxi kAkapovuta eVtlu? 
nAku I AkAraM unnaxi. 
nAku jFAnaM unnaxi. 
pUrvaM nIku gala anuBavaM prakAraM I reVMti aMxu poVMxika lexu. 
ippudu nA aMxu A poVMxika kanabaduwoMxi. 
eVMxuku oVppukovu. 
nene paSuvunu aguta emi? 
sarva jaMwu lokaM paSumayame. 
pa. 
SA: memu iccata balAXikulaM. 
nIvu mA xeSAniki vaccAvu kAbatti mA iRtaM vaccinatlu nadavAli. 
hAhU: nenu eVtlA vaccAnu? 
eVkkada nuMci vaccAnu? 
I viRayaM mIru ceVppagaligiwe, nenu mIku svAXInaM EpowAnu. 
iMka vAxopavAxAlu prabalina koVxxI, lABaM lexu ani vAlYlalo vAlYlu sEgalu cesukoVni bayatiki vaccAru. 
wAlYaM veSAru. 
cewula mIxa kAlYla mIxa wupAkulawo pelcamani sEnikulaku AjFa iccAru. 
oVka sEnikudu kAlcAdu. 
A guMdu hAhU eVdama cewi xaMda xaggara vunna kaMdalonuMci xUripoyiMxi. 
Ayana kappukoVnna SAluvA mIxa cilli paddaxi. 
hAhU atlAge kUrcunnAdu. 
Ayana bAXa kUdA anuBaviMca lexu. 
malYlI iMkoVka sAri pelcAru. 
axi kudi cewi mIxa wagiliMxi. 
itlA paxi bArulu veVlYlinE. 
xeVbba wagilina cotallA SAluvA mIxa boVwwalu paduwunnAyi. 
gulYlu Ayana SarIraMlonuMci veVnukaku xUsuku veVlYuwunnAyi. 
Ayana emI kaxala lexu. 
kAnI koVMceVM bAXa paduwunnatlu natiMcAdu. 
sEnikulu kAlcadaM ApAru. 
Ayana veVMtane kaxali paxmAsanaM vesi, prANAyAmaM prAraMBiMcAdu. 
ayixu nimiRAlu Agi malYlI wupAkulu pelcAru. 
IsAri gulYlu Ayana oVMtiki wagalataM, kriMxa padataM sAgiMxi. 
kriMxa padda wUtAlu pagili cuttU maMdataM prAraMBiMcinAyi. 
A maMta maXya Ayana kUrcunnAdu. 
ilA iravE gulYlu pelcina waruvAwa Ayana emEnAdo cUxxAM ani malYlI lopaliki veVlYlAru. 
cuttU vunna wUtAlawo nippu ArpeSAru. 
Ayana vaMka cUSAru. 
Ayana mIxa vunna SAluvA wagalabadi poyiMxi. 
kAnI Ayana vIpu mIxa nuMci poVdugugA peVxxa Ikalu vrelAduwunnAyi. 
A Ikalu baMgAru vanneVgA vunnAyi. 
Ayana kalYlu weVraci cUSAdu. 
kopaMgA cUSAdu. 
lopala vunna manuRyulu aMxarU ceVllAceVxarE pAripoyinAru. 
Ayana malYlI koVMwa sepu kanulu mUsukoVni kUrcoVni. 
malYlI kalYlu weVracAdu. 
Bayapadi xUraMgA poyina janaM malYlI xaggaraku vaccAru. 
iMxAka wAlYaM veVyyakuMdA pAripoyina sEnikudu malYlI vacci wAlYaM veSAdu. 
hAhU wana battalu wagulabadipovadaM cewa, malYlI nAlugu SAluvAlu kAvAli annAdu. 
meyaru weVppiMcabogA, SAswrajFulu ixxarU vaccAru. 
Ayana mana pariSIlanaku oVppukuMte SAluvAlu ixxAM annAru. 
meyarU, paMdiwulU" axi wappu. 
atlA anarAxu" ani SAluvAlu weVppiMci iccAru. 
oVka dAktaru annAdu kaxA" Ayane koVnnAlYlaku oVppukovaccu; manaM koVnnAlYlu AguxAM ani. 
ikkada itlA uMdagA sEnikulalo peVxxa gaMxaragolYaM puttiMxi. 
" manaM moVxata wupAkulu veswe. 
Ayanaku wagilinAyi. 
xAniki Ayana eVkkuva bAXapada lexu. 
waruvAwa pAwika wUtAlu wagili kriMxa padipoyinE. 
ivvAlYa manaM axqRtavaMwulaM ganuka Ayana mananu caMpadAniki rAlexu. 
vaswe manaM aMxaraM roVtteVlalle virigipoyevAlYlame" anukoVnnAru. 
appatinuMcI Ayana xaggaraku veVlYladaM aMte, sEnikulaku mikkili BayaM veyadaM moVxalu peVttiMxi. 
aMxulo koVMxaru annAru. 
Ayana manalanu emI ceVyyadu, cesevAdu ayiwe ixi varake cesevAdu. 
kanuka BayaM lexu. 
poxAM annAru. 
Bayamo, BayaM kAxo rAjasevakulu kanuka veVlYli wIrAli. 
malYlI veVlYlAru. 
wupAkula valla lABaM lexu kaxA, Ayana xaggaraku veVlYluwU wupAkulu eVMxuku annAru. 
lABaM lekapoyinA wupAkulu puccukune veVlYlAru. 
malYlI kApalAlu kAswunnAru. 
vAraM paxi rojulu ayina waruvAwa awani eVdala I vixrohaM callAriMxi. 
malYlI paMdiwulu vaswunnAru. 
powunnAru. 
oVka rojuna SAswrajFulu ixxaru Ayana xaggaraku veVlYlAru. 
Ayana vAri vaMka cUsi gurwupatti navvAdu. 
vAlYla ixxari prANAlu pEvi pEna lecipoyinE. 
hAhU paMdiwulanu cUci annAdu kaxA!" itlA cUdaMdi! I ixxarU nannu cUsi mqgAnni anukoVnnAru. 
nenu oVkka manuRyuNNe kAxu. 
mqgAnne kAxu. 
pakRini kUdA kAxU" ani leci nilcuMdi SAluvAlu wIsi vesi, ixi varaku IkalugA vunna wana veVnuka BAgaM aMwA vippi, reVMdu peVxxa reVkkalu praxarSiMcAdu. 
avi atU, itU vixaliMcAdu. 
vixaliswe A gAliki cuttupatla unna janaM pralYayamAruwAniki wUli kriMxa paddatlu paddAru. 
A reVkkalu wagili reVMdu vepulA vunna inupa katakatAlu virigi poyinAyi. 
A cuttupatla praxeSaM aMwA baMgAru kAMwulu vyApiMcinE. 
cuttU unna vaMxa, reVMdu vaMxala maMxi kannulu mirumitlu koVnnAyi. 
prawivAlYlU Bayapadi veVnakki veVnakki waggAru. 
Ayana reVMdu mUdu adugulu atU itU veSAdu. 
veswe kriMxi rAlYlu paracina nela baliRtamEna gurraM deVkkalawo koVttinatlu KaMgu KaMgumani mrogiMxi. 
Ayana SarIraM aMwA baMgAramalle XagaXagalAdi poyiMxi. 
Ayana eVgiri powAdA anipiMciMxi. 
Ayana reVkkalu cAci nilabadiwe eVnimixi adugula eVwwuvAdU. 
wAti ceVttu aMwa eVwwu vAdalle kanipiMcAdu. 
Ayana reVkkalu cUswe, oVka peVxxa parvawAniki reVkkalu vaccinattu unnaxi. 
janaM A xqSyAnni cUda leka kalYlu mUsukoVnna vAlYlu koVMxaru, nela mIxa boragila paddavAlYlu koVMxaru, vaNikipoyina vAlYlu koVMxaru, mUrCa paddavAlYlu koVMxarU ayinAru. 
Ayana aMwatiwo malYlI wana reVkkalu muducukoVni SAluvA kappukoVni kUrcunnAdu. 
cuttU vunna janaM aMwA BayapaddAru ani weVlisikoVni kUrcunnAdu. 
cuttU vunna janaM aMwA BayapaddAru ani weVlisi koVni BayaM lexu annatlu cewiwo saMjFa ceswU aMxarinI xaggaraku rammannAdu. 
virigipoyina inupa katakatAlu wIsi avawala peVttAdu. 
ippudu Ayana neVrabA sWalaMlo kUrcunnAdu. 
cAlA maMxi xaggaraku vaccAru. 
malYlI paMdiwulu prasaMgaM AraMBiMcAru. 
Ayana SAswrajFula vaMka cUsi itlA annAdu. 
BUmi mIxa manuRyulu, mqgAlu, pakRulu, vAti lakRaNAlu veru verugA vuMtAyi. 
I BUmi kAnI iMko cota ivi annI kalase uMdavaccu. 
manaM eVlA saMkalpiswe I SarIraM alA uMtuMxi. 
" A mAta eVvarikI arXaM kAlexu. 
eVlA saMkalpiswe, alA uMdataM emiti anukoVnnAru aMxulo Exuguru, mugguru paMdiwulu mAksmular puswakAlu caxivAru. 
vAlYlaki mAta koVMwa arXamEMxi. 
appatikI proVxxugUki eVvari xArina vAru poyinAru. 
inapa katakatAlu leni vatti KAlYi sWalaMlo hAhU A rAwri aMwA gadipAdu. 
I gurrapu maniRiki reVkkalu unnAyi anI, avi koVwwagA moVlicinAyi anI, avi cAlA baliRTamEnavi anI, avi wagili inupa katakatAlu virigipoyinAyi anI, malYlI pawrikallo paddaxi. 
wupAki xeVbbale wagallexu ani ixivaraku pawrikalalo padiwe, AScaryapoyina ameVrikA, yUrapu, AstreliyA, keVnadA, APrikAlu annI pogulupadi laMdanu cerinE; prayANaM ceVyyadAniki dabbu unnavAdallA wana padava laMdanu pattiMcAdu. 
meyaru, UlYlo unna pArlameVMtu meVMbarlu peVxxa uxyogasWulu samAveSamE I hAhU viRayaM vicAriMcAru. 
Ayana eVvalYlakI apakAraM cesevAdu kAxu kanuka, Ayanni KExulo peVttadaM bAgalexu annAru. 
Ayanni e peVxxa lArdu ayinA wana iMtiki awiXigA wIsuku veVlYli uMcukuMte bAgA uMtuMxi anI, leka powe rAjyAniki awiXigA wIsukoVni pArlameVMtu BavanaMlo uMci Ayanaku kAvalasina veVsalubAtulu annI ceVyyadaM nyAyaMgA uMtuMxi anI wIrmAniMcAru. 
A marunAdu proVxxunna aXikArulu, paMdiwulu aMxarU Ayana xaggaraku veVlYlAru. 
wama uxxeSaM Ayanaki caxivi vinipiMcAru. 
A vinipiMciMxi itlA unnaxi. 
" mqgaM, pakRi kAnI maniRi! nIvu cAlA maMci vAdavu. 
nIku manuRyulaku unnaMwa jFAnaM unnaxi. 
nIvu krUrudavu kAxu. 
ixivaraku nI viRayaM mAku weVliyaxu kanuka KExulo peVttAM. 
nIvu eVvarikI apakAraM cesevAdavu kAxu ani mAku nammakaM kuxiriMxi. 
ninnu KExulonuMci woVlagiMci mA rAjyAniki awiXigA wIsukoVMtunnAM. 
nIku kAvalasina anni veVsulubAtulu mA rAjyaM wuna mA rAjyaM dabbuwo ceswAM. 
mA rAjyaM nIku rakRaNa icciMxi kAna ninnu iMka eVvalYlU emI ceya leru. 
" I mAtalu saMskqwamulo paMdiwulu ceVppagA hAhU vini peVxxa navvu navvi oVka arupu aricAdu. 
" aho alpawA manuRyANAM" ani. 
paMdiwulu aMxarU xInini vinnAru. 
I mAtalu paMdiwulaku mAwraM weVlisinAyi. 
wakkina vAlYlaku weVliya lexu. 
akkadanuMdi hAhUni oVka peVxxa lArdu iMtiki wIsuku poyAru. 
akkada Ayanaku rAjaBogAlugA vuMxi. 
iMka janaMlo vivAxAlu paddAyi. 
" Ayanaku reVkkalu eVMxuku? 
vAtiwo eVguruwAdu? 
eVgiri eVkkadiki powAdu? 
Iyanni KExIgA uMcakuMdA vaxalipeVttadaM bAgalexu. 
e rAwri velYo eVgiri powAdu! pagalu eVgiri powe vimAnAlawo veVMbadiMcanEnA veVMbadiMca vaccu. 
" KExu vaxali peVttadaM bAgAlexu" anI;" Ayanaku KExu emiti? 
reVkkalawo koVdiwe inupa katakatAlu virigi. 
wupAkulawo kAliswe leVkka leka poyiMxi. 
Ayanaku iRtaM ikkada unnAdu kAnI lekapowe Ayanni evalYlApagalaru" anI;" I reVkkalu, gurrapu walA reVMdunnU exo camawkAraM cesi aMtiMcukunnAyi kAnI nijAnivi kAvu. 
reVkkalu nijAnivi ayiwe moVxata eVMxuku levu? 
ippudu eVtlA vaccinAyi? 
" anI, nAnA viXAlugA ceVppukovadaM moVxalu peVttAru. 
koVwwa lArdu iMtiki poyina appati nuMci hAhU wanaku oVka peVxxa gaxi kAvAli anI, aMxulo wAnu kUrcovAli anI, oVka neVlanAlYlu wannu eVvarU palukariMca kUdaxu anI ceVppAdu. 
A lArdu I viRayaM aXikArulu aMxarikI weVliya ceSAdu. 
vAlYlu xIrGAlocana cesi ixi varaku paxihenu rojulu mukku mUsuku kUrcunnatle kUrcuMtAdu ani oVppukunnAru. 
A lArdu vere oVka peVxxa gaxilo Ayana kUrcUneMxuku vIlu erparicAdu. 
Ayana gaxiloki veVlYlAdu. 
neVla nAlYlu ayinaxi. 
mupPE oVkatava rojuna A lArdu A gaxi walupu wattAdu. 
Ayana vacci walupu wISAdu. 
wIswe gaxilo A lArduki eVvarU kanipiMca lexu. 
lArdu Bayapadi kekalu veSAdu. 
hAhU veVMtane grahiMci" nenu I weVra veVnuka unnAnu" aMtU vaccAdu. 
lArduki akkada weVra vunnattu kanipiMciMxi. 
malYlI yaWAsWiwi. 
paMdiwulU, janamU, rAvadamU, povadamU. 
oVka roju rAwri arcibiRappu, paximaMxi biRappulU vaccAru. 
Ayana mawAnni guriMci praSniMcAru. 
biRappu: mI mawaM emiti? 
hAhU: nAku mawaM emI lexu. 
mawaM emiti? 
biRappu: atlA anakUdaxu. 
xevudu unnAdu gaxA! A xevunikumArudu krIswu. 
manaM Ayanni nammiwene kAnI mukwi lexu. 
hAhU vAlYla vaMka ciwraMgA cUSAdu. 
kanulu mUsukoVnnAdu. 
XyAniMcAdu. 
waruvAwa biRappulu aMxarU oVka vaMxa praSnalu veSAru. 
Ayana samAXAnaM ceVppa lexu. 
koVMwa sepatiki hAhU annAdu. 
" sAmAnyulaku mawaM lexu. 
maharRulake mawaM uMtuMxi. 
oVkAnoVka maharRi ceVppina mawamaMxu oVkaniki viSvAsaM uMtuMxi. 
alpuni viSvAsaM alpamEMxi. 
aXikuni viSvAsaM aXikamEMxi. 
e lokaMlo ayinA, wakkuva Sakwi gala I lokaMlo kAnI, eVkkuva Sakwulu gala iwara lokAllo kAnI prANulu aMxaru vAMCA xURiwulu, vAMCAwIwudE brahma paxAnni eVvadu seviswAdo, vAdiki alpamEna itlAMti vAtiwo avasaraM lexu. 
mawaM aMte emito emi weVluswuMxi. 
moVttamoVxata lokaM yoVkka naSvarawvaM weVliswe cAlu" annAdu. 
waruvAwa emi ceVppavaleVnu eVvarikI weVliyaxu. 
eVvari xArina vAru veVlYlipoyinAru. 
oVka rojuna sAyaMkAlaM lArdu Ayanni veVMtaxIsukoVni RikAru bayaluxerAru. 
peVxxa motAru kArulo hAhU kUrcunnAdu. 
paMdiwulu paximaMxI cuttU kUrcunnAru. 
appatiki proVxxu kUkiMxi. 
motAru eVMwa pavaru peVttinA cAlA kaRtaM mIxa pojoVcciMxi. 
A saMcAraMlo Wemsu naxi oVdduku veVlYlAru. 
akkada hAhU odalu stImarlu cUcAdu. 
A mahAnagarAnni cUcAdu. 
peVxxa peVxxa vIXulu cUcAdu. 
vIXula maXya sWApiMcina prawimalu cUcAdu. 
bahiraMgamEna sarvamEna nAgarikawA cUcAdu. 
Ayanaku, odalu xAkA motAru pogA, Wemsu naxi kanipiMciMxi. 
kanupiMcutawone Ayana motAru Apu ani kriMxaku xigAdu. 
paMdiwulanu cUci" ikkada unnaxi kaxA, nAwo lexani ceVppAru emiti? 
" annAdu. 
A paMdiwulu wamaki A viRayaM weVliyaxu annAru. 
janaM guMpulu guMpulu padi Ayanani cUdataM moVxalupeVttAru. 
malYlI proVxxugruMku varaku lArdu iMtiki veVlYlAdu. 
marunAdu proVxxunane lArdu leci hAhUnu cUdaboyinAdu. 
hAhU wana gaxilo ledu. 
iMwalo gavarnameVMtu BavanamunuMdi lArdu iMtiki teVliPonu vacciMxi. 
hAhU Wemsulo snAnaM ceswunnAdu ani. 
appatiki laMdanu sarigA melkolexu. 
aragaMtalo nixrapowunna janaM aMxarU leci Wemsu oVdduku veVlYlAru. 
motArlu krikkirisi poyinE. 
janaM odala mIxa, odala swaMBAla mIxa eVkki kUdA cUswU unnAru. 
hAhU snAnaM ceswU unnAdu. 
Ayana oVkkasAri munigi leci reVkkalu Arcetappatiki wupAnu valeV samuxraMlo valeV naxI waraMgAlu leci oVdduna xaBeluna koVttukoVMtunnAyi. 
laMgarlu vesi unna peVxxa peVxxa stImarlu kUdA oVruguwunnAyi. 
cinna cinna padavalu wallakriMxulE poyinE. 
Ayana nItilo kuppiMci nadumuxAkA leswAdu. 
leci reVkkalu vixiliswAdu. 
oVka varakapu koVMda odduki BayaMkaramEna samuxra waraMgAlu koVttukuMte nIlYlu gaggolupadi ciMxinatlu, awani reVkkala veVMtane Wemsu naxI waraMga jalAlu leci xUraMgA odalalo vunna janAnni vAnajallu koVttinatlu koVduwoMxi. 
Ayana oVka peVxxa wimiMgilamalle naxi maXyagA rivvunapowe peVxxa oda samuxraMlo powU uMte xAni veVnuka nIru cIli peVxxa guMta erpaddatlugA awani veVMta kUdA alAMti oVka viBAgaM veVlYuwoMxi. 
awani cewiwo nIru koVdawAdu. 
pidugu paddaMwa Xvani puduwuMxi. 
A xeVbba vegAnni naxi wattukolexu emo anipiswoMxi. 
oVka cinna ceVruvulo enugu coVrabadiwe oVddulayaMxu nIlYlu ubikinatlu Wemsu ubiki poyiMxi. 
gaggolu padipoyiMxi. 
Ayana snAnaM ceyadaM cuttuprakkalavAlYlaku upaxravaM ayiMxi. 
awadu naxilonuMci bayataku vaccetattu ceyadaM eVtlAgo weVliya lexu. 
oVka gaMta sepatiki AyanaMwata Ayane bayatiki vaccAdu. 
axi laMdanu kAvadaMcewa maMcu kuruswU uMxi. 
Ayana bayaluxeri wAnu unna lArdu iMtiki veVlYuwunnAdu. 
Ayana veVMta lArdu, paMdiwulu, aMxarU veVlYlAru. 
Ayana iMtiki veVlYli, malYlI prANAyAmaMlo kUrcunnAdu. 
rAwri panneVMdu ayiMxi, levadu. 
weVllavAri kUda Ayana veVlYli lArdunu lepAdu. 
paMdiwulu prakkana unnAru. 
Ayana itlA annAdu. 
" mI naxi cinnaxi. 
aMxumUlaMgA proVxxuna nenu snAnaM ceswU uMte koVnni padavalu kUdA munigipoyinE. 
naxi gaggolu ayiMxi. 
mIku ixi apAyakaraM ayiMxi ani nAku waruvAwa weVlisiMxi. 
nenu iMka mI naxilo snAnaM ceVyyanuleVMdi" annAdu. 
paMdiwulu" memu axi wamawo ceVbuxAM anukoVnnAM" annAru. 
weVllavAriMxi. 
ippatike hAhU vacci paxi neVlalu kAvaswoMxi. 
prapaMcaM moVwwammIxa hAhU kaWa vinanivAlYlu leru. 
hiMxUxeSaMlo kUdA I saMgawi weVlisiMxi. 
vAlYlalo sAMpraxAyajFulu" awadu eVvado gaMXarvudu. 
e SApavaSAno, akkada atlA padivuMtAdu annAru. 
wakkinavAlYlu gaMXarvudu kAxu yakRudu, piSAcaM, axi exo oVka viparIwa sqRti" annAru. 
koVMxaru marI weVliviwetalu wakkuva galavAlYlu" atlA eVMxuku uMdagUdaxu? 
kiMkAMg ledA annAru. 
hiMxUxeSAnnuMci, cEnA nuMcI, japAnu nuMcI janaM hAhUni cUddAniki veVlYlAru. 
e mawaM vAlYlu padiwe A mawaM vAlYlu, wama purANAlalo vuMde e xevawako oVka xevawaki, hAhUkI mudipeVttukoVnnAru. 
dabbukala vAlYlu Karcu peVttakalavAlYlu vacci cUsi powunnAru. 
paMdiwulu, hAhU kUrcuni prasaMgiMcadAlu eVkkuvEnAyi. 
paMdi: mIru mA xeSaM vacci paxakoVMdu neVlalu xAtiMxi. 
mI saMgawi mAku emI weVliyaxu. 
mI xeSAnni guriMci, mimmalni guriMci mAku emI weVliyaxu. 
mIru eVppudU mA xeSaMlone vuMtArA? 
iMkA iwara xeSAlu cUdavaleVnu ani mIku emEnA vAMCa vunnaxi? 
hAhU: nA saMgawi mIku ippatiki ippudu weVliyaxu. 
koVxxi rojullo mIku axi oVka viXaMgA weVliya ceswAnu. 
iwara xeSAlu evI nenu cUdanakkara lexu. 
nenu ikkada iMkA eVnnAlYlu uMtAno nenu ceVppanu. 
paMdi: veVlYiwe mIru eVkkadiki veVlYawAru. 
hAhU: A saMgawi mIku waruvAwa weVliyaceswA. 
paM: mIku manuRya jFAnaM kanna eVkkuva jFAnaM uMxi. 
mIku weVlisina iwara viRayAlu mAku ceVppAli. 
manuRyudu canipoyina waruvAwa emi avuwAdu? 
hAhU: axi mI mawa guruvunu kanukkoMdi. 
paMdi: mA mawa guruvulu ixivaraku oVka viXaMgA ceVppAru. 
axe nijamA? 
hAhU: eVvalYla mawa guruvulu ceVppiMxi A mawaMlo vAlYlaki saMbaMXiMcina aMwamattuku nijaM. 
eVMxuku aMte A jFAnaM vAlYla saMskArAniki anuguNaMgA uMtuMxi kanuka. 
vAlYla svaBAvaM cewa xAnini viSvasiMca kaliginaMwa Sakwi mAwraM vAlYlaki uMtuMxi kanuka cinna cepa cinna ceVruvulo uMtuMxi. 
peVxxa cepa peVxxa ceVruvulo uMtuMxi. 
wimiMgalaM samuxramulo uMtuMxi. 
cinna ceVruvulo maMci nIlYlalo uMde cepanu samuxraMlo veswe caswuMxi. 
mana SarIrAlu uMde cepanu samuxraMlo veswe caswuMxi. 
mana SarIrAlu mana saMskArAniki anuguNaMgA uMtAyi ani, mana mana Sakwi manaM unna xeSAnnI mana SarIrAnnI, mana pUrvula AcArAnni patti uMtuMxi. 
ixi oVka gADamEna baMXaM. 
paMdi: mAku I saMgawulu annI weVlusu. 
I viRayAla mIxa mAlo peVxxa peVxxa SAswrAlu vrASAru. 
hAhU: mari iMka nenu ceVppavalasinaxi emiti? 
paMdi: paralokAnniguriMce hAhU: mari xAnni guriMci mIlo SAswrAlu levA? 
paMdi: unnAyi. 
vAtini guriMci iwamiwWaM ani gatti nammakaM lexu. 
hAhU: nenu ceVppexi axi. 
A nammakaM vyakwini batti BexiswuMxi. 
varNAnni batti Bexiswunnaxi. 
jAwinibatti BexiswuMxi. 
wanaku xeni yaMxu viSvAsaM unnaxi, axi kAnI xAnni guriMci ceVpiwe, xAnilo viSvAsaM uMdaxu. 
pEgA oVka peVxxa parvawaM mIxa nivasiMce vAdiwo samuxraM unnaxi ani ceVbuwAvu. 
vAdu viSvasiswAdu. 
prayojanaM emi unnaxi? 
veVlYlicUswAdu. 
anuBavaMlo koVMceVM BexaM. 
xAni mIxa prayANaM ceswAdu, mari koVMwa BexaM oVkadu xAnilo munigi rawnAlu weVswAdu, mari koVMwa BexaM oVkadu xAnilo munigi rawnAlu wIswAdu, axi vere anuBavaM. 
prayojanaM emi unnaxi? 
appatikEnA samuxraM vAdiki saMpUrNaMgA weVlisiMxA? 
exi manaku gADamEna anuBavaMloki vaswe xAni yaMxu manaku cariwArXawa. 
wakkina vyarXopanyAsAlawo emI pani lexu. 
aMxukani weVlusukovalasina viRayAlu eVkkuva poguceswAnu anadaM kanna oVkka viRayaM anuBavapUrvakaMgA weVlusukoVMte kqwArXaM eVkkuva avuwuMxi. 
Ayana iccina upanyAsaM marnAdu yUrapulo anni pawrikalalo paddaxi. 
paxi paxakoVMdu neVlalu gadacina waruvAwa hAhU rUpAnni guriMcina viMwa cAlA waggiMxi. 
axi kUdA oVka pariciwamEna viRayaMgAne parigaNiMpa baduwoMxi. 
awani I upanyAsaM yUrapunu, ameVrikAlalo unna paMdiwulu aMxarU Ayanni wAwvikudu annAru. 
koVMxaru awanni mawa pravakwa annAru. 
koVMxaru AlocanAparudu annAru. 
( xaWhinker) awani I mAtalu vinna koVxxI caxivina koVxxI yUrapu ameVrikAlaku awani yaMxu viMwa marI eVkkuvEMxi. 
I mqgaM emiti, I mAtlAdadaM emiti ani awanini cUdadAniki malYlI guMpulu gUdi bayalu xerAru. 
janaM malYlI wananu cUdadAniki guMpulugA vaswunnAru ani Ayanaku weVlisiMxi. 
weVlisi Ayana annAdu" nA mAtalu kUdA mIru pawrikalalo prakatiswe I janulaku nA yaMxu jaMwubuxXi waggadAniki baxulu heVcciMxemi? 
" oVka rojuna Ayanni wIsuku veVlYli rElYlu cUpiMcAru. 
stImubotlu cUpiMcAru.

accAPIsulu cUpiMcAru.

memu ceSAM.

mIru BArawaxeSaM eVruguxuru kaxA! paMdiwulu" Uz" annAru. 
waruvAwa hAhU emiyu mAtlAda lexu.

aMxarU' jU' lopaliki veVlYlAru.

koVnni vAsana pattinE.

I GorAniki kAraNaM weVliyaka aMxarU gubbatillAru.

rAwri eVnimixi gaMtalaku viMxu prAraMBamEMxi. 
A viMxuku hAhAhUhUnu kUdA pilicAru.

rAwri paxakoVMdu gaMtalaku viMxu aMwA ayipoyiMxi. 
appudu oVka goVppa jarmanI saMgIwa SAswravewwa piyAno mIxa wAnu vrAsina kroVwwa saMgIwaM pAdatAniki erpAtu jarigiMxi.

maniRi poVttivAdu. 
eVrragA kaMxagaddavaleV unnAdu. 
nallani paMtlAmu woVdigi weVllani kamIju vesukunnAdu. 
Ayana piyAno xaggara kUrcuMdi rIdla mIxa vrelYlu veswUne Xvani waraMgAlu puttiMcAdu12( yUropiyanu saMgIwaMlo ixi oVka sWAyi) lo A jarmanu paMdiwudu goVppavAdu. 
Ayana A sWAyilo pAdataM prAraMBiMcAdu, vAyiMcadaM prAraMBiMcAdu. 
viMxu sAvadi aMwA aSvamulu GoRiMcinatlu Xvanulu ciwraciwramugA vyApiMcinAyi. 
hAhAhUhU kUrcunnavAdu leci piyAno xaggaraku veVlYlAdu. 
Ayana veVMta paMdiwulU veVlYlAru. 
jarmanI paMdiwudu vAyiswoMte hAhU jAgrawwagA veVlYlAru. 
jarmanI paMdiwudu vAyiswoMte hAhU jAgrawwagA cUcAdu. 
awadu eVMxuku cUswU unnAdo eVvarikI weVliya lexu. 
oVka mqgaM vacci oVka maXura Xvani viSeRAnni viMwagA pariSIliMcinatlu saBAsaxulu aMxaru BAviMcAru.

janaM aMxarU xigBrAMwulE poyinAru.

veVMtane hAhU piyAno muMxara kUrcunnAdu. 
piyAno mIxa vrelYlu veSAdu. 
maXura Xvanulu puttinE. 
janaM nivveVrapoyi cUcAru.

paMdiwudu puccukoVnnAdu. 
piyAno mIxa malYlI mrowa vinipiMciMxi.

awadu oVka aragaMta sepu gAnaM ceSAdu. 
prakqwi niSSabxaM ayipoyiMxi.

piyAno vaxalipeVttAdu.

vINa vAyiswU unnAdu.

koVnni rAlexu. 
marunAdu proVxxuna A paMdiwudu hAhU wana cewiki iccina kAgiwaM wIsi caxivAdu. 
aMxulo Ayana vrAsina saMskqwAniki arXaM ixi. 
" mqgAlallo kqwrimawvaM vijqMBiMcalexugAna vAtilo pasa cAvalexu.

nenu anukoVnexi ixi.

maMwri ayyAdu.

moVxati yuvakudu muMxukuvaccAdu.

iMkemI koranu" annAdu.

kAraNaM _ jAnI A UlYloni oVka peVxxa maniRiwo mAtalloki xigAdu.

" vAdu Urike uMdadu. 
anavasaraMgA annI neVwwi mIxiki weVccukoVMtAdu" ani hari, veNu, kumAr bAXapaddAru.

jAnIwo paMxeVM kattina peVxxa maniRi cappudu ceVyyakuMdA veVnakku wirigi veVlYlipoyAdu.

suwwi pakkana padiuMxi. 
nela mIxa meku xigabadi uMxi.

parIkRagA cUSAru snehiwulu. 
jAnI jubbA aMcu mekuwo bAtu nelaloki xigabadipoyiMxi.

unna UlYlovAlYlanu jAnI iMtiki pilavadaM lexu kAni bayata UrivAlYlanu piluswunnAdu.

" I roju sAyaMwrame iMtiki rA" annAdu. 
" nenu oVkkaNNe rAvAlA? 
veVMta eVvarayinA vaccinA ParvAlexA? 
" ani mohan adigAdu. 
" eVMwamaMxi vaccinA ParvAlexu" ani jAnI baxuluceVppAdu. 
A roju sAyaMwraM mohan paximaMxi snehiwulanu veVMtabeVttukoVni jAnI iMtiki veVlYlAdu. 
aMxarU Bojana parAkramaM unnavAlYle. 
jAnI elotU ceVyyalexu. 
cakkagA aMxarikI kadupuniMdelA BojanaM peVttAdu. 
axI mAmUlu BojanaM kAxu. 
reVMdu rakAla mAMsaM kUralu, cepala vepudu, kodi kUra wayAruceyiMcAdu. 
mohan_ku cAlA saMwqpwigA uMxi. 
pisinAri jAnI xaggara bAgA Karcu peVttiMcAnu kaxA ani poVMgipoyAdu. 
BojanAla waruvAwa jAnI aMxarikI wAMbUlAlu erpAtuceSAdu. 
aMxarU kUrcoVni uMdagA jAnI lopaliki veVlYli oVka pillini caMkana peVttukoVni vaccAdu. 
xAnini oVka mUla vaxilipeVtti panimaniRini kekeSAdu. 
" A mUla ceVwwa kuppalo padiunna palYleVMlo pilliki pAlu annaM kalipi wIsukurA" annAdu. 
panimaniRi ceVwwa kuppalo veVxiki palYleVM ivawaliki wIsiMxi. 
lopaliki wIsukuveVlYli annaM kalipi palYleVM pilli muMxu peVttiMxi. 
mohan kalYlu A palYleVM mIxa paddAyi. 
eVnno elYlugA baMgAru pani ceswunna mohan_ku axi baMgAru palYleVM ani weVlisipoyiMxi. 
sarigA SuBraM ceVyyakapovadaM valla kaMcu palYleVMlAgA kanabaduwoMxi. 
eVMxukEnA maMcixani mohan pillini cUse vaMkawo xaggaragA veVlYlAdu. 
pilli wala nimuruwU palYlAnni wAkicUSAdu. 
saMxehaM lexu axi nijaMgA baMgAru palYleVme! wAMbUlAlu ayina waruvAwa mohan annAdu. 
" mA iMtlo oVka pilli uMdexi. 
aMxaramU xAnini prANaMgA cUsukoVnevAlYlaM. 
axi canipoyi nAlugelYlu ayiMxi. 
ippudu nI iMtlo pillini cUswuMte mA pilli gurwukuvaswoMxi xInni ammuwAvA? 
vaMxa rUpAyilu iswAnu" annAdu. 
" ammanu. 
ixaMte nAku cAlA iRtaM" annAdu jAnI.

jAnI mohamAtaMlo paddAdu.
