" ani raMgayyanu balavaMwaM ceSAdu. 
nArayya. 
raMgayyanu balavaMwaMgA sArAyi xukANaMku wIsukupoyAdu. 
ixxarU sArA wIsukunnAru. 
pEsalu nArayye ceVlliMcAdu. 
rAnu rAnu raMgayyaku kUdA wAgudu alavAtayiMxi. 
panimIxa manasu peVttaleka poyevAdu. 
aMxuku pani iccinavAlYlYu wittevAru. 
panivvadaM kUdA mAniveSAru. 
cewilo pani lexu. 
wiMdiki giMjalu levu. 
ayinA wAgudu mAnalexu raMgayya. 
civariki peVlYlAM meVdalo nagalu kUdA ammAdu. 
cewiki exi xoVrikiwe axi ammi marI wAgevAdu. 
raMgayya koVduku koVmarayyaku cAlA rojula nuMdi bAgolexu. 
mUsina kannu weVravadaM lexu. 
rogaM waggadaMlexu. 
maMci maMxulu ippiMcAlannAru. 
pakka vUrilo cUpiMcamannAru. 
" kAni cewilo cilligavvalexu. 
eVkkadinuMdi wevAli maMxulu? 
eVlA wIsukuveVlYlAli pakka vUriki ani rAmulamma Alocanalo padiMxi. 
raMgayya iMti viRayAlu pattiMcukunevAdu kAxu. 
eVppudU wAgina niRAlo uMdevAdu. 
wAgi wAgi poVxxupoyAka iMtiki cerevAdu. 
wAgudu mAnamaMte rAmulammanu wittevAdu. 
rAmulamma koVduku bAgolexani ceVppiMxi. 
ayinA raMgayya pattiMcukolexu. 
koVdukuku maMxu ippiMcAlani rAmulamma adagani vAlYlaMxarini dabbula koVraku adigiMxi. 
raMgayya wIsukunna dabbe wirigi ivvalexu. 
aMxuku rAmulammaku eVvvarU appu ivvalexu. 
koVdukunu cUsi rAmulamma edupu ApukolekapoyiMxi. 
kalYlanuMdi nIlYlu kArAyi. 
koVmarayyaku rogaM waggadaM lexu sariEna maMxulu leka roju rojuku eVkkuvaOwoMxi. 
oVkaroju asale bAgoleka poyiMxi. 
AyAsaM eVkkuvayiMxi. 
kAlYlu cewulu callabaddAyi. 
Upiri wIsukoleka powunnAdu. 
axi cUsi rAmulammaku gAbarA eVkkuvEMxi. 
kAlYlAddaMlexu. 
eVtu wocalexu. 
" ippudu nenu eM ceVyyAli? 
raMgayyanu eVkkada veVwakAli? 
koVmarayyanu eVlA vidici veVlYlAli? 
" ani rAmulamma Alocanalo padiMxi. 
emI ceyaleka koVmarayyanu cUsukuMtu alAge poyiMxi. 
sAyaMkAlamayyesariki koVmarayya Upiri AgipoyiMxi. 
kalYlu weleSAdu. 
axi cUsi rAmulamma guMdeVlu bAxukunnaxi. 
koVMwasepatiki soVmmasilli padipoyiMxi. 
rAmulamma edupu vini cuttupakkala vAlYlu vaccAru. 
rAmulammanu cUsi vAlYlaku jAli vesiMxi. 
koVMxaru raMgayyanu veVwakadAniki veVlYlAru. 
sArA xukANaMlo raMgayyanu cUSAru. 
appudu raMgayya wAguwU kUcunnAdu. 
vAlYlu raMgayyaku koVduku canipoyina viRayaM ceVppAru. 
raMgayya emi pattiMcukolexu. 
wana panilo wAnunnAdu. 
vAlYlu raMgayyanu iMtiki patti weVccAru. 
iMtiki vaccAka kUdA emi jarigiMxo weVlusuko lekapoyAdu. 
koVMwasepu cUsi UrivAlYlu koVmarayya SavAnni pAwipeVtteMxuku wIsukupoyAru. 
appudu raMgayya wAgina niRA nuMdi werukunnAdu. 
" mA koVmarayyanu eVkkadiki wIsukuni powunnAru? 
" ani adigAdu. 
koVmarayya canipoyAdani weVlusukunnAdu. 
bAvurumannAdu raMgayya. 
kalYla nIlYlu peVttukunnAdu. 
raMgayya edupu vini rAmulamma weVliviki vacciMxi. 
" nI sArA piSAcamE kUcunnaxi. 
axi mana koVmarayyanu bali wIsukunnaxi. 
nuvve koVmarayyanu caMpAvu" ani rAmulamma raMgayyanu pattukuni kalYla nIlYlu peVttukuMtU aMxi. 
" avunu! nuvvu aMtunnaxe nijaM mana koVmarayyanu caMpiMxi nene. 
nA sArA alavAtu nA koVdukunu bali wIsukunnaxi. 
" ani wala bAxukuMtU rAmulammawo annAdu raMgayya. 
unna oVkka koVduku canipovadaM valla raMgayya manassuku xeVbba wagiliMxi. 
wana wAgudu iMwa pani cesiMxani raMgayya weVlusukunnAdu. 
wAnu cesina wappudu panivalla raMgayyaku kanuvippu kaligiMxi. 
Uri peVxxala muMxu" nenu ippatinuMdi sArA muttukonu" ani oVttu peVttukunnAdu. 
sArA wAgiwe emavuwuMxi? 
-----------------------1. 
jIrNa Sakwi wagguwuMxi. 
2. 
kAleyaM ceVdipowuMxi.

awigA wAgiwe AhAra nAlYaMlo kyAnsar vacce avakASamunnaxi.

ajIrwi, rakwahInawa, kIlYla vAwaM, mUwrapiMdAla vyAXi moVxalagu rogAlu rAvaccu.

cakkeVra vyAXi eVkkuva avuwuMxi. 
6. 
cinni vayassulone musaliwanaM vaswuMxi. 
mAxi oVka palleVtUru. 
peru adavipAleVM. 
nA peru xevayya. 
mA UlYlo mUdelYla nuMdi vAnalu levu. 
UlYlo aMxaraM BUmini nammukuni bawukuwunnAmu. 
mUdelYla nuMdI paMtale levu. 
mA bawukulu baruvEpoyAyi. 
goVMwuloki muxxa xigadame karuvEMxi. 
IsArEnA samayAniki vAnalu rAvaccunani eVxurucUSAM. 
vAnalu padawAyani ASapaddAM. 
kAnI vAna kurise jAdale levu. 
Uri vAlYlaM AlociMcAM. 
kalasikattugA exEnA ceyAli. 
marriceVttu kiMxa cerAM. 
vAnalu padAlaMte kappawalli AdAli. 
annAdu peVxxa rAjaliMgaM. 
gudilo AMjaneyudini nItiwo kadagAli. 
siMXUraM pUyAli. 
pUjalu ceyAli. 
ani annAdu cilakayya. 
sare aMte sare anukunnAM. 
oVka poVdugAti rokali weVccAru. 
batta pIlika wIsukunnAru. 
aMxulo oVka kappapillanu uMcAru. 
rokali naduma xAnni kattAru. 
atU itU pattukunnAru. 
BujAla mIxa uMcukunnAru. 
muMxuku nadicAru. 
ixxaru ixxaru coVppuna mArAru. 
kappawallini moSAru. 
iMtiMtikI wirigAru. 
aMxarU kappawallimIxa nIlYlu poSAru. 
mosevAri mIxa biMxeVla koVxxI poSAru. 
UraMwA wirigAru. 
civaraku AMjaneyudi gudiki cerAM. 
biMxeVla koVxxI nIlYlu weVccAru. 
AMjaneyudini kadigAru. 
siMXUraM xevudiki pUSAru. 
aMxarU pUjalu ceSAru. 
vAna kosaM AkASaM vEpu ASagA cUSAru. 
eVkkadA mabbu jAdalexu. 
kappawallini UregiMcinA vAnalu padalexu. 
aMxarU walalu pattukuni kUcunnAru. 
nIlYlalo wadisi koVMxariki jalubu cesiMxi. 
reVMdu mUdu rojulu jvaraM kUdA vacciMxi. 
oVka rojuna UrivAlYlu SaMkaraMnu kaliSAru. 
SaMkaraM A UlYlo badipaMwulu. 
paMwulu aMxari muKAlalo xigulunu cUSAdu. 
kappawalli AdAru, AMjaneyudiki pUjalu ceSAru. 
ayinA vAnalu padalexu. 
axe kaxA mI xigulu. 
ani adigAdu paMwulu. 
axi mI nammakaM mIxi. 
mari ixivaraku vAnalu eVlA kuriSAyi. 
kappawalli Adiwene kurisAyA? 
ani adigAdu SaMkaraM. 
asalu vAnalu eVlA padawAyo mIku weVlusA? 
samuxraM nIru eVMda vediki AvirigA mAruwuMxi. 
I Aviri mabbulugA AkASAniki ceruwuMxi. 
ceVtla gAliki mabbulu callabadawAyi. 
appudu vAnalu padawAyi. 
adavulu bAgA uMde cota vAnalu bAgA padawAyi. 
aMxuke ceVtlaku vAnawo saMbaMXaM uMxi. 
kAnI mana UlYlo eM ceswunnAM? 
mana avasarAlaki adavulanu narukuwunnAM. 
vaMtaceVrakugA vAduwunnAM. 
patnaMlo ammuwunnAM. 
koVnni elYlugA ceVtlu koVduwunnAM. 
ippudu mana UlYlo paccaxanaM lexu. 
ceVtlu kanipiMcakuMdA cesi wippalu paduwunnAM. 
manaku ippudu maMci gAli lexu. 
pEsala kosaM UlYloni vepaceVtlanu narukuwunnAM. 
vAnalu padamaMte eVlA padawAyi? 
ani paMwulugAru meVllagA maMxaliMcAdu. 
aMxarU oVkari muKAlu oVkaru cUsukunnAru. 
ikanuMci ceVtlu narakavaxxu. 
cenu gatla mIxa ceVtlu peVMcAli. 
ani aMxarU paMwulugAri muMxu oVttupeVttukunnAru. 
mIraMwA cinna rEwulu. 
vere bawukuweVruvu lexu. 
vAnalanu nammukoVni BUmini sAguceyadaM kawwi mIxa sAmu. 
mIru vere AlociMcaMdi. 
byAMkula nuMdi appulu xoVrukuwAyi. 
iravayyExu vela varakU appu xoVrukuwuMxi. 
A soVmmuwo borubAvulu wavviMcaMdi. 
maMci rAbadini icce paMtalu veVyyaMdi. 
Ayana mAtalu aMxarikI naccAyi. 
saMwoRaMgA iMtixAri pattAM. 
karnUlu jillA kaMxeVnavolugA piluvabadi kAlagamanaMlo karnUlugA mArina praxeSaM gala jillA.

rAyaxurgaM: SrIkqRNaxevarAyalu vidixi keMxraM. 
wirumala AlayAnni polina oVka SiWilAlayaM praKyAwamEnaxi. 
I xevAlayaM SiKaraM caMxanaM karrace ceyabadinaxi. 
I jillAlo vijayanagara rAjulu kattiMcina xevAlayamo, koVlano, exo oVkati cUdavaccu. 
karnUlu nuMdi viviXa prAMwAlaku gala xUraM( ki. 
mI. 
lalo) uravakoVMda-53, kalYANa xurgaM-53, rAyaxurgaM-86, XarmavaraM-47, puttaparwi-97, peVnugoVMda-74, hiMxUpuraM-114, madakasira-111, kaxiri-114. 
kadapa jillA jillA keMxramaEna kadapa peru mIxa kadapa jillA ane peru vacciMxi. 
I jillA1343-1514 uwwara akRAMSamulu,7785-7929 wUrpu reKAMSamula maXya kalaxu. 
I jillAku uwwarAna karnUlu jillA, prakASaM jillA, xakRiNAna ciwwUru, paScimAna anaMwapuraM, wUrpuna neVllUru jillA sarihaxxulugA gala jillA. 
I jillA muKyakeMxraM: kadapa. 
cariwra: reVMdava SawAbxaMlo tolamI vrAsina rAwalawo karige, karipe ane peru kadapagA mAriMxani Uha. 
SAwavAhanulu, colYulu kAkawIyulu, vijayanagara rAjulu, golkoVMda navAbulu paripAliMcina prAMwaM. 
cAlYukyula janmasWalaM kadapa. 
1797 lone I jillA erpadiMxi. 
A waruvAwa1807 sixXavataM praXAna keMxraMgA mAriMxi. 
wirigi1812 jillA keMxraMgA kadapa ayiMxi. 
I jillAku ceVMxina iwara vivaramulu: vESAlyaM:15359 atavI prAMwaM:33% janABA:22,67,000 akRarAsyawa:48. 
12% munsipal pattaNamulu:2 iwara pattaNamulu:8 lok saBA niyojakavargamulu:2 SAsanasaBA niyojakavargamulu:11 maMdalamulu:50(965 grAmamulu) kadapa, ceVnnUru, kAjIpeta, vallUru, peVMdlimarri, ciMwakoVmma xinneV, rAyacoti, cinnamaMdeVM, waMdupalli, saMbepalli, veVraveVli, lakkireVddipalli, cakrAyapeta, gAlivIdu, rAmApuraM, kamalApuraM, eVrraguMtla, vIrapunAyanipalli, kodUru, citveli, obulapalli, pullaMpeta, rAjaMpeta, naMxalUru, peVnagalUru, sixXavataM, oVMtimitla, atlUru, baxvelu, gopavaraM, porumAmilYlYa, narasApuraM, bi, kodUru brahmaMgAri maTaM, jammalamadugu, peVxxamudiyaM, mElavaraM, muxxanUru, kAMdApuraM, puliveVMxula, siMhAxripuraM, liMgAla, woVMdUru, veMpalli, vemUla, proVxxutUru, rAjupAleVM, ceVppali, eVs- mExakUru, xuvvUru. 
naxulu: peVnneru, bahuxA, piMca, maMdali, pullaMgi, guMjana. 
paMtalu: vari, joVnnalu, koVrralu, veruSeVnaga.

cUdaxagina praxeSamulu wAlYlYapAka: rAjaMpetaku3 ki|| mI xUraMlo unna I grAmaM prasixXa vAggeyakArudu annamAcAryuni puttinillu. 
wana paxAlawo wirupawi veMkateSvaruni prArXiMci mukwi poVMxina Bakwudu.

oVMtimitta: ixi sixXaMpetaku14 ki|| mI xUraMlo uMxi. 
ekaSilAnagaramani peru kUdA uMxi. 
koxaMdasvAmi AlayaM ikkada uMdutace oVMtimitta prajala nAlukapE eVkkuva AduwU vacciMxi.

xevAlaya xvAraM eVwwayinaxi. 
maMdapaM32 swaMBamulawo nirmiMcAru.

suraBi:20 cinna cinna palleVla samUhaM. 
I grAmaMlo sWApiMcabadinaxi. 
praKyAwa suraBi nAtaka kaMpeVnI. 
ixi1889 lo sWApiMcabadi I nAtiki pramuKa nAtaka saMsWagA uMxi. 
gaMdikota: jArjikota ane peru kUdA uMxi. 
aneka xevAlayamulu, masIxulu pramuKaMgA unnAyi. 
hanumaMwudu, SrIrAmacaMxruni AhvAniMcina kRewraM. 
aMxuku gurwugA reVMdukoVMdala naduma woraNaM kattinAdani ceVpwAru.

puRpagiri: pinAkini wIraMlo gala I kRewramaMxu SrI ceVnnakeSavasvAmi xevAlayaM praKyAwi ceVMxinaxi. 
I xevAlayaMloni SilpakalYa cUsi wIravalasiMxe. 
jyowi: peVnnUru naxi eVdamavEpugala I kRewramaMxu jyowinAXa xevAlayaM cAriwrAwmakamEnaxi.

I svAmi peru saMgameSvarudu.

I praxeSaMloni liMgaM isukaxi. 
xInipE velimuxralu prawyakRaMgA kanipiswAyi.

nallamala adavulu, ramaNIyamaEna prakqwi cUsi wIravalasiMxe.

maMci vyApAra keMxraM.

kaWala kaxaMbaM maMci xoVMga: rElu, bassu, kAru lAMti vAhanAlu leni rojulu. 
A kAlaMlo xoVMgala BayaM eVkkuva. 
oVMtari prayANaM cesevAriki guMdeVlu vegaMgA koVttukoVnevi. 
vIrayyaku alAMti prayANaM oVkati padiMxi. 
koVMwa baMgAraM wIsukoVni oVka adavini oVMtarigA xAtAli. 
bayaluxeremuMxu vIrayya eVMxukEnA maMcixani baMgArAnni miMgeSAdu. 
kadupuloni baMgArAnni eVvadu xocukoVMtAdu ani bayaluxerAdu. 
ixaMwA oVka xoVMga cUSAdu. 
oVka prayANIkudilAgA vIrayya veVMta nadicAdu. 
adavi xAtadAniki wodu xoVrikiMxi kaxA ani vIrayya saMwoRapaddAdu. 
xoVMga samayaM xoVrikinappudu vIrayyanu caMpi kadupuloni baMgAraM kAjexxAmani anukoVnnAdu. 
ayiwe adavi nadumana oVka xoVMgala guMpu eVxurupadiMxi. 
xoVMgalu ixxarinI soxA ceSAru. 
emI xoVrakalexu. 
xoVMgala nAyakudu" vIlYlalo muMxu oVkadi kadupu kosi cUxxAM. 
aMxulo baMgAraM uMte reVMdovAdi kadupu kUdA koxxAM. 
lekuMte reVMdovAdini vaxilipeVdaxAM. 
" annAdu. 
vIrayya notilo wadilexu. 
veVMta vaccina xoVMga AlociMcAdu. 
" moVxata vIrayyanu caMPiwe awani kadupulo baMgAraM xoVrukuwuMxi kAbatti waruvAwa wananu caMpuwAru. 
axe moVxata wananu caMpiwe kanIsaM vIrayyanayinA vaxilipeVdawAru" ilA anukoVnna xoVMga moVxata wAnu muMxuku vaccAdu. 
xoVMgalu vAdi kadupu kosi aMxulo emIlexani vIrayyanu vaxalipeVtti, poVmmani annAru. 
xoVMgalu kUdA manuRule! vAlYlalo kUdA maMciwanaM uMdoVccu anadAniki uxAharaNa I kaWa. 
wappukosaM wappu: A Uri peru cIkatipAleVM. 
A UlYlo aMxarU onamAlu rAnivAlYle! mUDAcArAlu eVkkuva. 
rAmayya koVduku aMjayya mAwraM patnaM veVlYli caxuvukoVni vaccAdu. 
caxuvukoVnna aMjayya mAtalaku UlYlo pattiMpu lexu. 
eVvarannA exannA wappu ceswe' nuvvu gulYloki veVlYli pramANaM ceVyyi'' wappu ceVyyakapowe aracewilo karpUraM veVligiMcuko cUxxAM' _ ilA anevAru. 
" wappu, oVppunu nirNayiMcadAniki kortulu unnAyi. 
ilA cewulu kAlcukoVne pramANAlu panikirAvu" ani aMjayya ceVppi cUSAdu. 
awadi mAtalu eVvarU vinalexu. 
" wappu ceVyyakapowe karpUraM veVligiMcinA ceVyyi kAlaxu" annAru. 
ilA uMdagA nArAyaNa ane paSuvula kApari oVka xoVMgawanaM ceSAdani UlYlo peVxxalaku anumAnaM kaligiMxi. 
veVMtane paMcAyiwIki erpAtuceSAru. 
" nenu xoVMgawanaM ceyalexu moVrro" ani nArAyaNa moVwwukoVnnAdu. 
peVxxalu vinipiMcukolexu. 
" nuvvu wappu ceyakapowe salasala kAge nUneVlo ceVyyi peVttu. 
nI ceVyyi kAlakapowe nuvvu xoVMgawanaM ceVyyalexani oVppukoVMtAmu" annAru. 
liMgayya ane varwakuNNi pilici" nuvvu salasalA nUneV kAgabeVttukarA" ani ceVppi paMpAru. 
arXagaMtalone liMgayya kAgina nUneV pAwranu oVka gudda cutti wIsukoVccAdu. 
grAma peVxxala muMxu peVttAdu. 
" nArAyaNa! I nUneVlo cewulu peVttu wappu ceVyyani vAlYlaku kAlaxu" annAru peVxxalu. 
aMjayya pEkileci" kanIsaM oVka praSnaku samAXAnaM ceVppi A waruvAwa mI pani kAnivvaMdi. 
wappu ceVyyanivAlYlaku kAlaxu annAru. 
nUneV weVccina liMgayya kUdA wappu ceVyyanivAde kaxA! awaneVMxuku pAwraku oVka gudda cutti marI weVccAdu" ani adigAdu. 
grAma peVxxalu nijame annattu wala AdiMci" liMgayyA! gudda lekuMdA pAwranu pEkeVwwi pattuko" annAru. 
liMgayyaku oVlYlu maMdipoyiMxi. 
" mIku buxxi lekapowe nAkU lexanukoVnnArA? 
wappu cesinA ceVyyakapoyinA kAge nUneVnu wAkiwe eVvarikEnA ceVyyi kAluwuMxi. 
aMtU xulupukoVMtU veVlYlipoyAdu. 
paMcAyawI peVxxalu walavaMcukoVnnAru. 
exi nijaM? 
ixxaru koVtlAdukoVnnAru. 
kortuku veVlYlAru. 
jadjigAru viMtunnAru. 
vAxi, prawivAxi muMxukoVccAru. 
vAxi jarigiMxi ceVppAdu. 
wanaxi wappu kAxu annAdu.

prawivAxi muMxuku vaccAdu. 
wana vAxana vinipiMci wanaxi wappu kAxu annAdu.

vayasu paxahAru.

waMdri unnAdu. 
peru veVMkateSu. 
raMgiki caxuvukovAlani uMxi.

akRarawapasmAn_lo aMxarikI caxuvu ceVbuwunnAru. 
nuvvU caxuvuko annAdu. 
waMdriki raMgi caxuvukovadaM iRtaM lexu. 
menalludu SrIrAmuluku AmeVnu kattabeVdiwe wana bAXyawa wIripowuMxi anukoVnnAdu. 
SrIrAmulu peVxxireVddi xaggara pani ceswuMtAdu. 
peVxxireVddi xurmArgudu. 
xoVMgasArA vyAparaM ceswAdu. 
SrIrAmulu lAMti panimanuRulu cAlAmaMxi awani waggara unnAru. 
eVppudeVppudu raMgini peVlYli cesukoVMxAmA ani SrIrAmulu wApawrayaM. 
raMgiki appude peVlYli cesukovadaM iRtaM lexu. 
peVlYli vAyixA veyadAniki xeVyyaM pattinatlu natiswuMxi. 
xeVyyAnni vaxalagoVttadAniki mAmA allulYlu BUwavExyuNNi piluswAru. 
oVka gaxilo nimmakAyalu, vepamaMdalwo eVxurugA unna BUwavExyuNNi cUsina raMgi BayapaduwuMxi. 
" nijaMgA I vepamaMdalwo nuvvu nannu koVdawAvA" ani BUwavExyuNNi adigiMxi raMgi. 
BUwavExyudixi kUdA natane!" nijAniki I BUmi mIxa xeVyyAlu BUwAlu anevi levu. 
eVvarannA mAnasikaMgA balahInulagA uMte exexo mAtlAduwAru. 
nA xaggariki xeVyyaM pattiMxani wIsukuvaswAru. 
vepamaMdalawo nAlugu wagiliswe, A bAXa padaleka xeVyyaM poyiMxi aMtAru iMwe" annAru BUwavExyudu. 
ixxarU oVka oVppaMxAniki vaccAru. 
vExyudu BUwAnni vaxalakoVttinatlu, raMgi xeVyyaM xigipoyinatlu natiswAru. 
xeVyyaM poyiMxikaxA ani SrIrAmulu raMgi meVlYlo wAlYi kadawAdu. 
peVxxireVddi xaggara SrIrAmulu bAnisagA padiuMdadaM raMgiki naccaxu. 
axi vaxilipeVtti svawaMwraMgA brawukuxAmu aMtuMxi. 
svayaMupAXi paXakAla guriMci tIcaru cebuwAdu. 
rAmulu mAtlAdi vaswAdu. 
SrIrAmulu wana jattu nuMci vidipovadaM peVxxireVddiki iRtaM lexu. 
xoVMgasArA kesulo awanni irikiswAdu. 
SrIrAmuluku mUdu neVlalu jEluSikRa paduwuMxi. 
raMgi viswarAkulu kutti ammukoVMtU svawaMwra jIvanaM moVxalupeVduwuMxi. 
saMpAxiMcina xAMtlo koVMwa poVxupu kUdA ceswuMxi. 
postAPIsulo mahilYAsamqxXi yojana paXakaM kriMxa akOMtu weVruswuMxi.

nuvvu aMwatiwo Urukovu. 
nannu kaburlaloki xiMcuwAvu.

nenu anni praSnalakU samAXAnaM ceVbuwAnu.

nuvvu A ammAyini kaburlaloki xiMcuwAvu. 
ixxarU RikArlu veVlYlawAru.

"" A pillavAdu poVxxaswamAnamU weVlugu sinimAlu cUswuMte neneM cesexi?

"" nirmAwa alAMti sinimAle wiyyamaMtAdu"" nirmAwA! nirmAwA! alAMti sinimAle eVMxuku wiyyamaMtAvu? 
"" pillavAdu alAMti sinimAle cUswAdu"" pillavAdA! pillavAdA! alAMti sinimAle eVMxuku cUswAvu? 
"" nirmAwa alAMti sinimAle wIswunnAdu"" nirmAwA! nirmAwA! alAMti sinimAle eVMxuku wIswunnAvu? 
nI sinimAla valla pillavAdi parIkRa poyiMxi"" mIru BalevAlYle sAr! pillavAdi parIkRaku nA sinimAlaku saMbaMXaM emuMxi? 
nAku kAvalasiMxallA pillavAdu jebulo nuMdi rUpAyi nA gallApeVttaloki rAvAli. 
aMxukosaM pillavAdu elAMti sinimAlu cUdatAniki eVgiri gaMweswAdo alAMti sinimAle wIswunnAnu. 
nAxi pUrwi vyApAraM sAr! namaswe? 
" kaMbalYi kAvAli: cAlA elYlaku muMxari saMgawi. 
A kAlaMlo ippatilA dabbu calAmaNilo uMdexi kAxu. 
rAmayyaku uppu kAvAlaMte wana xaggara unnaxi exo oVkati somayyaku icci awani xaggara uppu wIsukoVnevAdu. 
oVkavelYa rAmayya icce vaswuvu somayyaku avasaraM lekapowe ibbaMxi ayyexi. 
alAMti rojulalo..
. 
gaMgayya ane rEwu iMtiki AvuneVyyi kAvAlani somanAWaM ane paMdiwudu vaccAdu. 
" nAku goVrreVboVccuwo nesina oVka guddamukka iswe AvuneVyyi iswAnu" annAdu gaMgayya. 
paMdiwudu iMtiki veVlYli BAryawo viRayaM ceVppAdu. 
AmeV iMtlo unna oka kaMbalYilo oVka mukka kawwiriMci icciMxi. 
paMdiwudu A guddamukkanu gaMgayyaku icci neVyyi pattukupoyAdu. 
atuwarvAwa paMdiwudu eVppudu neVyyi kAvAlannA kaMbalYi mukka oVkati pattukoVccevAdu. 
ilA cAlA mArlu jarigiMxi. 
civariki oVka mAru paMdiwudu malYlI gaMgayya xaggariki vaccAdu. 
I mAru paMdiwudu weVccina guddamukka mAmUlugA weVcce xAMtlo sagame uMxi. 
vAlYla iMtlo unna kaMbalYilo civariki aMwe mukka migiliMxi mari! A mukkanu gaMgayya cewilo peVtti" nuvvu mAmUlugA icce newilo sagaMivvu. 
cAlu" annAdu. 
gaMgayya navvuwU" sagaM eMxuku? 
pUrwigA iswAnu. 
mIru prawimAru weVcce guddamukkalawo mA Avida oVka kaMbalYi kuduwoMxi. 
ippudu mIru weVccina mukka kaMbalYi, pUrwikAvadAniki sariggA saripowuMxi. 
I calikAlaM memixxaraM kappukovadAniki cakkati kaMbalYi wayArayiMxi. 
" annAdu. 
aMxarU rAjule! reVMdu vaMxala elYlaku munupu prawi UrikI cuttU oVka goda uMdexi. 
poVxxukAgAne muKaxvAraM mUsivesevAlYlu. 
oVkaroju cIkati padina waruvAwa najIruxxIn nagarAniki bayaluxerAdu. 
xovalo rAjugAri wotamAli kUdA awaniki jawapaddAdu. 
" bAgA poVxxupoyiMxi. 
IvelYappudu walupulu weVraci lopaliki veVlYlanivvaremo" annAdu najIruxxIn. 
" nAku A samasya lexu. 
nenu rAjugAri xaggara pani ceswAnu kaxA! annAdu garvaMgA wotamAli. 
kAssepu Agi awanu najIruxIn_nu adigAdu. 
" nuvvu eVvari xaggara pani ceswAvu" ani" nenu cAlA maMxi rAjula xaggara pani ceswAnu. 
" ixxaru kota muKaxvAraM xaggariki vaccAru. 
wotamAli walupu watti" eVvarakkada? 
walupulu wIyaMdi. 
nenu rAjugAri wotamAlini" ani aricAdu. 
getu kApalAxAru awadi mAtalu leVkkaceyalexu. 
" nuvvu eVvarEnA sare! repu weVllArina waruvAwane walupulu wIsexi? 
annAdu. 
kAssepu Agi najIruxxIn walupu wattAdu. 
" eVvaru? 
" annAdu getu kApalAxArudu. 
" ayyA! nenoVka bAtasArini. 
arXarAwripUta wamarini ibbaMxi peVduwunnaMxuku kRamiMcaMdi. 
koVMceVM walupulu wIswe I rAwriki eVkkadayinA walaxAcukoVMtAnu" annAdu. 
" sare! lopalikirA!" aMtU awanu walupulu wISAdu. 
" xayacesi nAwo bAtu I wotamAlini kUdA rAnivaMdi" annAdu najIruxxIn. 
ixxarU lopaliki veVlYlina waruvAwa wotamAli najIruxxIn_nu adigAdu. 
" nuvvu cAlA maMxi rAjula xaggara pani ceswunnAnu ani ceVppAvu gaxA! eVvareVvaru? 
"" iMxAkA oVka rAjunu cUSAvu kaxA? 
"" eVvaru? 
"" getu xaggara unna kApalAxAru. 
alAMti rAjulu cAlA maMxi xaggara nenu pani ceswuMtAnu. 
xaMdulo koVluvu: rAmasAmi aMte A uèlYo aMxariki hadal, vayasu yAbEpEne uMtuMxi. 
BArI vigrahaM, burra mIsAlu _ cUdagAne guMdeVlu jallumaMtAyi. 
rAmasAmi sEnyaMlo pani ceSAdu. 
Ayana uxyogaM cese rojullo iMdiyA _ pAkiswAn yuxXaM vacciMxi. 
yuxXaMlo waneM ceSAdo ippatikI kaXalu kaXalugA ceVbuwuMtAdu rAmasAmi. 
aMxarU nolYlu veVlYlabeVtti vinAlsiMxe! rAmasAmi UlYlokUdA akRarawapasmAn kAryakramaM jarigiMxi. 
aMxarU caxukoVnnAru. 
iMwo aMwo lokajFAnaM kUdA cAlA maMxiki abbiMxi. 
rAmasAmi kaWala saMgawi mAmUle! Ayana ceVbuwUne unnAdu. 
vinevAlYlu viMtUne unnAru. 
mAjI sEnikudi iMti pakkane oVka janacEwanya keMxraM uMxi. 
nUwana akRarAsyulaku wana wadAKA cUpiMcAli anukoVnnAdu rAmasAmi. 
oVka roju mAnitar rAvadaM AlasyaM kAvadaMwo wana kaWa moVxalupeVttAdu. 
" yuxXaM moVxalE nAlugu xinAlu ayiMxi. 
eVkkada cUsinA pInugule! oVkko BArawIyudu yAbEmaMxi SawrusEnikulni caMpeSAru.

" mI saMgawemiti? 
" eVvaro adigAru.

AroxinaM.

ippudaMwA yuxXAlu wupAkulwo kaxA cesexi? 
" wanu ceVppexAniki eVvarannA addoVswe rAmasAmiki bale cirAku.

wupAkiki civara emuMtuMxo weVlusA?

awanu koVMceVM waggi" axexo cinna kawwilAgA pEna uMtuMxi.

. 
xAMwone koseSAnu. 
"" nalabEwoVmmixi maMxiki kAlYlU, cewulU koswU uMte vAlYlu Urake unnArA? 
" iMkoVkadiki XarmasaMxehaM vacciMxi. 
rAmasAmiki oVlYlu maMdipoyiMxi. 
mIreM caxuvukoVnnArayyA! caccinavAdi kAlU ceVyyI gaMtasepu kosinA vAdu kaxalwAdA? 
"" aMte nuvvu kAlYlU cewulU kosiMxi49 maMxi caccinavAlYlakannamAta. 
sarele!" mUdovAdu annAdu. 
" I caxuvukunnolYlaku emI ceVppakUdaxu" anukoVMtU rAmasAmi xulupukoVni leci veVlYlipoyAdu. 
(' xaMdulo koVluvu aMte gurraM pEna eVkkipowAdo, axi vesina pedanu eVwwuwAdo weVlIxu' _ I sAmewa rAmasAmi lAMti vAlYlavallane vacciMxi) nenaMte nene! rAmayya bAgA XanavaMwudu. 
kAlu kaxapakuMdA kAvalasinavannI awani xaggariki vaswAyi. 
A UlYlone somayya ani iMko XanavaMwudu unnAdu. 
ixxarikI prawi viRayaMlonU potIne! nenaMte nene anukoVne rakaM! oVka roju rAmayya wana pippi palYlu pIkiMcukovAli. 
dAktarni ekaMgA wana iMtike pilipiMcukoVnnAdu. 
wIrA dAktarugAru rAmayya palYlu pIkadAniki wayArayinappudu somayya vaswunnAdani kaburu vacciMxi. 
dAktarunu veVlYli peVrati vEpu uMdamani pilicinapudu rammani ceVppAdu. 
somayya vaccAdu. 
ixxarU kassepu piccApAti mAtlAdukoVnnAru. 
mAtala maXyalo rAmayya" emayinA nAlAgA nuvvu SarIrAniki bAXa kaligiwe ocukolevu" annAdu somayyawo. 
" eVvaru A mAta annaxi! nI kaMte eVkkuva kAkapoyinA nIwo samAnaMgA nenu bAXanu orcukogalanu" annAdu somayya. 
" Ewe ippude parIkRiMcukoVMxAmA? 
" annAdu rAmayya. 
sare aMte sare anukoVnnAru. 
rAmayya paMti dAktarni pilipiMci" nAku oVka pannu pIkey" annAdu. 
rAmayya notiloni pippipalYlanu dAktaru axivarake cUsi unnAdu kaxA! takImani pIki padeSAdu. 
axi appatike UguwU uMxi kAbatti rAmayyaku noVppi puttalexu. 
" ika somayyaku kUdA oVka pannu pIku" annAdu rAmayya. 
somayya palYlu annI bAgAne unnAyi. 
dAktaru bAgunna paMtini balavaMwaMgA pIkesariki keVvvumanaka wappalexu. 
rAmayya nene geVlicAnu annattu mIsAlu xuvvukoVnnAdu. 
rAjugAru gurwiMcalexu: oVka rAjugAriki Sawruvulu eVkkuvayyAru. 
Ayana prANaBayaM pattukoVniMxi. 
iMtA, bayatA eVkkada unnA24 maMxi aMgarakRakulu Ayana veVMta uMdevAru. 
adavilo rAjugAriki oVka BavanaM uMxi. 
evEnA rahasya carcalu jarapAlaMte akkadiki veVlYlevAdu. 
oVkamAru mUdu rojulapAtu adaviloni BavanaMlo uMdatAniki rAju bayaluxerAdu. 
24 maMxi aMgarakRakulu anusariMcAru. 
adavi BavanaMlo moVwwaM9 gaxulu unnAyi. 
maXya gaxilo rAjugAri padaka. 
Ayana wana aMgarakRakulu24 maMxinI migawA eVnimixi gaxullo uMdamannAdu. 
eVtu cUsinA mUdu gaxulu kanipiswAyi. 
A BavanaMlo oVkko varasalo unna gaxullo9 maMxi kanipiMcAli ani rAjugAru AjFa veSAru. 
moVxati roju sajAvugA gadicipoyiMxi. 
reVMdava roju aMgarakRakullo naluguriki bayatiki veVlYlAlsina pani erpadiMxi. 
rAjugArini anumawi adigiwe Ayana oVppukodu. 
e varasaloni gaxullo cUsinA9 maMxi lekapowe aMxarnI uriwIswAdu. 
eVlA ceVyyadaM ani AlociswU uMte oVkadu leci," mUla gaxullo naluguru leVkkana uMdi maXyagaxilo oVkaru uMte leVkka saripowuMxi. 
rAjugAru ceVppina prakAraM varusagaxullo9 maMxi kanipiswAru. 
naluguru bayatiki veVlYlipovaccu" annAdu. 
nijame! awadu ceVppinatlu sarxukoVMte leVkka saripoyiMxi. 
hammayya ani aMxarU Upiri pIlcukoVnnAru. 
naluguru bayatiki veVlYlipoyAru. 
bayatiki veVlYlinavAlYlu iMko nalugurni veVMtabeVttukoVni vaccAru. 

valYlu aMgarakRakulu aMxarikI snehiwule! lopali gaxulloki vAlYlu vaswe moVwwaM28 maMxi ayipowAru. 
KarmakAli rAjugAru leVkka peVttAraMte varusagaxullo9 maMxiki miMcipowAru. 
eVlA ceVyyadaM anukoVMtU uMte aMwakumunupu salahA iccinavAdu malYlI pEki lecAdu. 
" maXyagaxilo5 maMxi uMdi civara gaxullo ixxaru uMte leVkka saripowuMxi" annAdu. 
nijame! awadu ceVppinatlu28 maMxi gaxulu paMcukoVnnAru. 
eVtu leVkkapeVttinA9 maMxe welAru. 
snehiwulu oVka roju uMdi veVlylYipoyAru. 
aMgarakRakulu malYlI moVxati paxXawilo sarxukoVnnAru. 
iMwa jariginA rAju aMgarakRakula saMKya waggadaM peVragadaM gamaniMcaleka poyAdu. 
*** 
rAmu vadraMgi. 
cinnavAdEnA maMci panivAdu. 
koVyyawo alaMkAra xIpAlu ceswuMtAdu. 
cAlA aMxaMgA ceswAdu. 
mIku aMxamEna cinna xIpAlu kAvAlA? 
ayiwe rAmu cewa ceyiMcavalasiMxe. 
edu muKAla xIpAlu, paxi muKAla xIpAlu kAvAlA? 
rAmu ceyavalasiMxe! rAmu paniwanaM guriMci aMxarikI weVlusu. 
cuttupakkala anni grAmAlavAlYlakI weVlusu. 
rAmu nAnna cinnappude poyAdu. 
amma uMxi. 
AmeV eVMwo maMcixi. 
AmeV mAtalu viMte rAlYlu kUdA karuguwAyi. 
rAmuki o ceVlleVluMxi. 
AmeV peru kokilamma. 
pattulA uMtuMxi. 
ciximi xIpaM peVttukovaccu. 
aMwa aMxaMgA uMtuMxi. 
xevawalA uMtuMxi. 
ceVlleVlu aMte rAmuki prANaM. 
ammaMte rAmuki xEvaM. 
rAmuki peVlYlIdu vacciMxi. 
ayinA iMkA cesukolexu. 
` ceVlleVli peVlYli ayyAke nA peVlYli' aMtAdu. 
rojU poVxxune paniki kUrcuMtAdu. 
appudu kokilamma vaswuMxi. 
annayya cewiki ulini aMxiswuMxi. 
rAmu pani moVxalu peVdawAdu. 
ilA rojU jaragavalasiMxe. 
amma, ceVlleVlu, rAmu hAyigA uMtunnAru. 
oVkanAdu rAmuki peVxxa pani wagiliMxi. 
A xeSapu yuvarAjuki peVlYli kAbowoMxi. 
vacce punnami nAde peVlYli. 
rAju koVduku peVlYlaMte mAtalA. 
oVkate ArBAtaM. 
xeSamaMwA oVkate saMxadi. 
peVlYliki veVyyi alaMkAra xIpAlu kAvAlata. 
A panini vadraMgi rAmuki appagiMcAru. 
rAmu ukkiribikkirayyAdu. 
veVyyi xIpAlaMte mAtalu kAxu. 
pEgA rAjugAri iMtipani! rAmuki garvaMgA anpiMciMxi. 
BayaM kUdA vesiMxi. 
oVka maMciroju cUsukunnAdu. 
amma kAlYlaku moVkkAdu. 
amma xIviMciMxi. 
koVdukuki xiRti wIsiMxi. 
kokilamma annayya cewiki ulini aMxiMciMxi. 
rAmu xIpAlu ceVyyadaM moVxalupeVttAdu. 
manasaMwA pani mIxa peVttAdu. 
wiMdi, nixra maracipoyAdu. 
rojulu gaduswunnAyi. 
guttalu guttalugA xIpAlu wayAravuwunnAyi. 
vAtini vIXi arugumIxa peruswunnAru. 
oVkaroju ceVnnayya vaccAdu. 
ceVnnayya aMte yuvarAjugAri maniRi. 
appatiki pOrNami iMko paxi rojuluMxi. 
" xIpAlu wayArEnAyA? 
" adigAdu ceVnnayya. 
" sagaM wayArEnAyi" annAdu rAmu vinayaMgA. 
ceVnnayyaku amma majjiga icciMxi. 
" repu mA yuvarAjugAru vaswunnAru. 
wayArEna xIpAlu cUdAlata" annAdu ceVnnayya. 
aMxarU ulikkipaddAru. 
axemI cinna viRayaM kAxu. 
oVka vadraMgi iMtiki yuvarAju rAvadaM mAtalu kAxu. 
vAlYlaku garvaMgA anpiMciMxi. 
saMwoRaM kaligiMxi. 
aMwakaMte eVkkuvagA BayaM vesiMxi. 
BayaMwo gajagajA vaNikipoyAru. 
A kAlaMlo rAjugAriki kUdA aMwagA BayapadevAru kAxu. 
yuvarAju aMtene hadalu! awanu ceVddavAdani vinikidi. 
parama kopiRtivAdani ceVppukoVnevAru. 
aMxuke aMwa BayaM. 
ceVnnayya veVlYlipoyAdu. 
repu yuvarAju vaswAdu. 
appudu eM jaruguwuMxo emo! maMci jaragavaccu. 
ceVdU jaragavaccu. 
biwukubiwukumaMtU gadipAru. 
rAmu mariMwa woVMxaragA xIpAlu ceswunnAdu. 
rAwraMwA melukoVne unnAdu. 
weVllavAresariki bAgA alasipoyAdu. 
xIpAlalo nixrapoyAdu. 
kokilamma vacci cUciMxi. 
" pApaM annayya eVMwa alasipoyAdo!" anukuMxi. 
lepakuMdA UrukuMxi. 
kokilamma vAkili wudici kallApi calliMxi. 
aMxaMgA muggulu peVttiMxi. 
snAnaM cesi, pUlu koyadAniki veVlYliMxi. 
pUlawota iMtiki kudivEpuna uMxi. 
wotaloki adugu peVdiwe kokilammaku poVxxu weVlisexi kAxu. 
cilakalawo mAtlAduwuMxi. 
picukalawo AdukuMtuMxi. 
ceVtlawo, wIgalawo muccatlu peVduwuMxi. 
AkASaMlo sUryudu poVdicAdu. 
unnattuMdi yuvarAju raWaM rAmu iMti muMxu AgiMxi. 
aMwa poVxxune vaswAdani eVvvarU anukolexu. 
raWaM nuMci yuvarAju xigAdu. 
awani nadakalo boleVdaMwa garvaM. 
awaniwo pAtu ixxaru sevakulu kUdA vaccAru. 
vAlYlu xunnapowullA unnAru. 
cUdagAne BayaM putte AkArAlu. 
vAlYla nadumulaku pattAkawwulu velAduwunnAyi. 
yuvarAjuni moVxata amma cUciMxi. 
parugeVwwuku svAgawaM ceVppiMxi. 
cewulu jodiMci moVkkiMxi. 
rAjulu namaskariMcaru. 
appudappudu walanu mAwraM UpuwAru. 
iwadEwe walanu kUdA Upalexu. 
emI cUdanatte muMxukoVccAdu. 
vadraMgi rAmu iMkA nixrapowUne unnAdu. 
vAdi vIpu mIxa amma xabaxabA wattiMxi. 
vAdu ulikkipadi lecAdu. 
kalYlu weVrici ayomayaMgA cUSAdu. 
yuvarAju ixi gamaniMcalexu. 
awagAdi cUpu kokilammapE padiMxi. 
gudlappagiMci AmeVne cUswunnAdu. 
ayiwe kokilamma axi gamaniMcalexu. 
` arugu mIxa unna xIpAlanu yuvarAju cUswAdu. 
cUsi AScaryapowAdu. 
wananu meVccukuMtAdu' ani rAmu anukunnAdu. 
ayiwe yuvarAju vAti vaMka cUdane lexu. 
awadi cUpaMwA kokilamma mIxe uMxi. 
rAmu oVka xIpAnni cewiloki wIsukunnAdu. 
xAnini yuvarAjuki cUpiMcAdu. 
" xInini edu gUlYla xIpaM aMtAru. 
oVkkoVkka gUtilo oVkkoVkka xIpaM peVttavaccu. 
cUceMxuku eVMwo alaMkAraMgA uMtuMxi..
" annAdu. 
yuvarAju emI vinalexu. 
kokilammane cUswU unnAdu. 
iMwalo kokilamma veVnakki wirigiMxi. 
vAkitlo unna yuvarAjuni cUciMxi. 
AmeVku guMdeV xadaxadamaMxi. 
Bayapadi peVratiloki parigeVwwiMxi. 
akkade xAkkuMxi. 
aMxarU axi cUsAru. 
" A pilla eVvaru? 
" yuvarAju adigAdu. 
rAmu mAtlAdalexu. 
nIlYlu namuluwU nilabaddAdu. 
yuvarAju urimi cUSAdu. 
sevakulu kawwulu wISAru. 
amma BayapadiMxi. 
` A pilla nA kUwuru bAbU!" aMxi. 
yuvarAju wala UpAdu. 
veVMtane akkadi nuMci veVlYlipoyAdu. 
xIpAla vaMka kannu eVwwi kUdA cUdalexu. 
ammaku, rAmuku ceVmatalu pattAyi. 
muMxumuMxu eM jaruguwuMxo ani BayapaddAru. 
prANAlu guppeVtlo peVttukunnAru. 
vAlYlu Bayapadinatle jarigiMxi. 
maruroje ceVnnayya vaccAdu. 
cAvu kaburu callagA ceVppAdu. 
" ninnu axqRtaM variMciMxoyi" annAdu. 
rAmu weVllamuKaM veSAdu. 
ceVnnayya vivariMcAdu. 
" yuvarAjugAriki nI ceVlleVlu bAgA nacciMxi. 
A ammAyi mIxa manasupaddAdu. 
xIpAlawo pAtu nI ceVlleVlini kUdA rAjamahalku paMpiMcu. 
peVlYliki muMxu roje paMpiMcAli. 
ika nuMci nI ceVlliki rAja Bogame! arWamayyiMxA? 
" annAdu ceVnnayya. 
ammaku, rAmuku pidugu padinatlu ayyiMxi. 
rAmuki kAlYlU cewulU Adalexu. 
" punnami rojune rAjugAriki peVlYli avuwuMxigA! nA ceVlleVlu xeniki? 
" annAdu ayomayaMgA. 
ceVnnayya peVxxagA navvAdu. 
" wammudU! vaccexi pattapu rANi. 
vArasuni kosaM AmeVnu cesukoVMtunnAru. 
axi vere saMgawi. 
AmeV kAka yuvarAjugAriki eVMxaro uMtAru. 
nI ceVlleVlAMti vAlYlu akkada cAlA maMxi uMtAru. 
ciMwapadaku, nI ceVlleVlu suKaMgA uMtuMxi. 
rANilAge uMtuMxi. 
nIku kUdA kAvalasinaMwa XanaM muduwuMxi. 
" annAdu ceVnnayya. 
rAmu koVyyabAripoyAdu. 
amma xevudi gaxiloki parigeVwwiMxi. 
akkada nela mIxa padi poVrlipoVrli edciMxi. 
ceVnnayya marikoVMwa sepu naccajeVppAdu. 
veVlYlipoye muMxu karAKaMdigA annAdu. 
" jAgrawwa. 
pAripoyeMxuku cUdoVxxu. 
eVkkadiki poyinA veVwiki pattukuMtAM. 
walalu weVgipowAyi. 
mIku mIrugA oVppukuMte maMcixi. 
A iMtlo BUkaMpaM vaccinattu ayyiMxi. 
ammaki, rAmuki picceVkkinattu ayyiMxi. 
" xevudA! meM eM wappu ceSAmani? 
mammalni ilA xaMdiMcAvu?

ibbaMxulu wakkuva. 
I xiguva cUdaMdi:1.

mana avasaraM ArWika parisWiwini batti koVxxipAti sWalaMkUdA saripowuMxi.

kolYla PArAlu _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ kolYlanu peVMce nilayAlanu kolYla PArAlu aMtAru.

iMkA eVnno gudlu xigubadi avAli.

maMci yAjamAnyaM aMxiMcagalarA? 
xeSavAlYI kolYlalo rakAlu _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ xeSavAlYI kolYlanu nAtukolYlu ani aMtAru.

paga rAju pAripoyAdani weVlisi rAjugAru saMwoRiMcAru. 
Ayana saMwoRaM aMwA kAxu. 
narasayyaku goVppagA sanmAnaM ceSAru. 
xaMdigA dabbu, baMgAraM icci Uriki paMpiMcAru. 
paricayaM: kusumalanu manaxeSaMlo kusaMba, karXi ane perlawo kUdA piluswAru. 
kusumala nuMdi nUneV wIswAru. 
ixi cAlA KarIxEna nUneV, ArogyAniki cAlA maMcixi. 
kusuma nUneV rakwaMloni koVvvunu waggiswuMxi. 
ixi guMdeV jabbu rAkuMdA cUswuMxi. 
praswuwaM I paMta xigubadi heVktAruku5 nuMdi6 kviMtAlYlu mAwrame. 
koVwwa paxXawulu pAtiswe8 nuMdi12 kviMtAlYla varaku xigubadi rAvaccu. 
paMtakAlaM- nelalu: rabIkAlaM kusuma paMtaku cAlA anukUlaM. 
seVpteVMbaru, aktobaru neVlallo viwwanaM veswe janavari, Pibravari neVlallo I paMta kowaku vaswuMxi. 
moVkkalu peVrigi peVxxagA avuwunna koVxxI varRaM kAni, gAlilo wemakAni eVkkuvagA uMdarAxu. 
kusuma paMtaku sAravaMwamEna nallaregadi nelalu cAlA anukUlaM. 
sAravaMwamEna wemagala garapa nelallonU, baMkamatti nelallonU oVMdrumatti nelallonU, I paMtanu paMdiMcavaccu. 
cOdu nelallo kUdA I paMtanu paMdiMcavaccu. 
oVkasAri kusuma paMtanu vesi waruvAwa mArcakuMdA axe paMtanu paMdiswe, koVnni rakAla bUju weVgulYlu vaswAyi. 
aMwe kAkuMdA BUsAraM kUdA wagguwuMxi. 
rabI paMtagA kusumAlu vesi KarIP_lo veroVka paMta veyadaM maMcixi. 
kusuma paMtanu mArci kAyaXAnyAla paMtanu veyadaM valla BUsAraM peVruguwuMxi. 
melu rakAlu: paMta eVkkuva xigubadi rAvAlaMte melurakaM viwwanAlu vAdAli. 
kusuma paMta paMdiMcatAniki maMjIrA, sAgara muwyAlu ane melurakaM viwwanAlu vAdukalo unnAyi. 
maMjIrA viwwanaM veswe heVktAruku8 nuMdi10 kviMtAlYla varakU xigubadi vaswuMxi.
xIni paMtakAlaM110 nuMdi120 rojulu. 
sAgara muwyAlu ane rakaM wruppu weVgulunu wattukogalige rakaM. 
xIni paMtakAlaM kUdA110 nuMdi120 rojule. 
aktobaru neVla AKaruku gAni, navaMbaru moVxatlo kusuma paMta vesukoVnadAniki sAgara muwyAla rakaM cAlA anuvEnaxi. 
viwwana SuxXi: e paMtakEnA viwwanaM vesemuMxu viwwana SuxXi ceyadaM cAlA avasaraM. 
eVMxukaMte viwwanAla xvArA paMtaku vacce weVgulalYlanu niroXiMcavaccu. 
oVka kilo viwwanAlaku3 grAmula WErAm lexA keVptAn ane maMxu kalipi viwwana SuxXi ceVyyAli. 
viwwanAlu vese paxXawi: I paMtanu mana rARtrAlalo aktobaru moVxati vAraMlo leka reVMdava vAraMlo vesi penubaMka weVgulu nuMdi kApAduko vaccu. 
ixi Pibravari neVlalo kowaku vaswuMxi. 
kusuma paMtanu rabI paMtagA KarIP paMtagA veswAru. 
rabI paMtaku heVktAruku10 kilola melurakaM viwwanAlu kAvAli. 
viwwanaM vesetappudu moVkkaku moVkkaku maXya waginaMwa eVdaM uMdetatlu cUsukovAli. 
viwwanAlu veseMxuku goVrru upayogiswe maMcixi. 
viwwanaM vesetappudu cAluku cAluku maXya waginaMwa eVdaM uMdetatlu cUsukovAli. 
kusuma paMtaku viwwanAlu eVkkuva lowulo padakuMdA cUsukovAli. 
lowuna padiwe moVlakalu pEkirAvu. 
kusuma paMtanu eVkkuvagA iwara paMtalawo kalipi miSrama paMtagA veswunnAru. 
alA kAkuMdA I paMtanu praXAna paMtagA veswe AxAyaM eVkkuvagA AxAyaM vaswuMxi. 
Ewe miSramapaMtagA veyadAnni pUrwigA mAniveyavalasina panilexu. 
kusuma goXuma, aviseV, XaniyAlu moVxalEna iwara paMtalawo kalipi rabI paMtagA veyavaccu. 
eVruvula vAdakaM: rabI paMtalo kusumanu oVke paMtagA vesinappudu heVktAruku30 nuMdi40 kilola nawrajanini,20 nuMdi30 kilola BAsvarAnni icce eVruvulanu veVyyAli. 
alA kAkuMdA KarIP paMta kosi kusuma paMta vesinA heVktAruku15 nuMdi20 kilola nawrajanini icce eVruvulanu vAdAli. 
I paMtaku eVruvulanu viwwanAlanu veyadAniki oVkati, reVMdu vArAla muMxu10 nuMdi15 seVMtImItarla lowu xukkilo padetatlu veVyyAli. 
nIru peVttadaM: kusuma paMtaku nIru peVtte avasaraM uMdaxu. 
ayinA avasarAnni batti oVkati, reVMdusArlu moVkkalaku nIru wagulakuMdA nelanu wadapAli. 
iMxukugAni prawi reVMdu mUdu cAlYla maXya cinna boxeVlu vesi vAti xvArA nelanu wadupavaccu. 
kalupu wIyadaM- nivAraNa: viwwanaM vese muMxu poVlaM sarigA wayAru cesukokapowe kalupu moVkkalu bAgA peVruguwAyi. 
viwwanaM moVlakeVwwina waruvAwa25 nuMdi30 rojulaku moVxatisAri kalupu wIyAli. 
A waruvAwa45 nuMdi50 rojulalo reVMdavasAri kalupu wIyavalasina avasaraM uMxi. 
paMta rakRaNa: sAXAraNaMgA penubaMka weVgulu, pacca purugu poVgAku laxxeV purugu I paMta Akulanu patti wini veswAyi. 
wuppu weVgulu valla Akula maXyaBAgaM guMdrati maccalu erpadi A BAgaM eVMdinatlu kanipiswuMxi. 
vItivalana paMtaku cAlA naRtaM kaluguwuMxi. 
vIti nivAraNaku dEmoWoyet-30,. 
1. 
7 millIlItarlu lexA kvinAlPAs(20 SAwaM)2 millIlItarlanu oVka lItaru nItiwo kalipi heVktAruku500 lItarla maMxu nItini pErupE callAli. 
I viXaMgA cesi paMtanu cIda purugula bAri nuMdi rakRiMcavaccu. 
mullu guccukokuMdA, giMjalu rAlipokuMdA poVxxuna10 gaMtalalopu I paMta kowa pUrwi ceyAli. 
I viXaMgA kosina paMtanu cenulo reVMdu rojulapAtu eVMdanivvAli. 
kalYlaMlo rAyini eVdlaku katti lAgiMcataM lexA trAktaruwo nUrcadaM _ gAni ceVyyAli. 
giMjalalo wadi AradAniki mUdu nAlugu rojulu eVMdabeVtti baswAlalo niMpAli. 
anagA anagA oVka rAju. 
A rAju koVluvulo gaMgAraM oVkadu. 
gaMgAraM rAju koVluvulo ceri cAlA rojulu ayyiMxi. 
gaMgAraM rAju koVluvulo jIwAlu paMcuwAru. 
I panilo gaMgAraM laMcAlaku marigAdu. 
ani maMwriki weVlisiMxi. 
gaMgArAM viRayaM rAjuku weVlipAdu. 
vere paniki baxilI ceyaMdi ani rAju annAdu. 
gaMgAraMnu vere panilo uMcAru. 
koVnni neVlalu gadicAyi. 
A panilo kUdA gaMgAraM laMcAlu mAnalexu. 
I viRayaM maMwri rAjuwo annAdu. 
vere SAKaku baxilI ceyaMdi. 
ani rAju annAdu. 
gaMgArAMnu vere SAKaku paMpAru. 
A panilo kUdA gaMgArAM laMcAlu mAnalexu. 
ika lABaM lexu. 
gaMgAraMnu samuxraM xaggara uMcaMdi. 
cese pani emI lexu. 
vacce alalu leVkkiMcAli axe awani pani. 
ani rAju annAdu. 
maMwri gaMgArAMnu samuxraM xaggaraku paMpAdu. 
gaMgArAM wana pani mAnalexu jAlarulanu ApevAdu. 
mIru samuxraM mIxaku pokUdaxu. 
powe alalu ceVxiri powAyi. 
ilA ayiwe nenu alalu eVlA leVkkiMcAli. 
alalu leVkkiMcadame nA pani. 
ani jAlarulawo anevAdu. 
maniRiki paxi rUpAyalu kAvAli. 
alA ayiwene samuxraM mIxaku poVMdi. 
lekuMte lexu. 
ani jAlarulanu beVxiriMcevAdu. 
samuxraM panilo kUdA gaMgAraM laMcAlaku marigAdu. 
rAjuku kopaM Agalexu. 
ika manaM cesexi emI lexu. 
gaMgArAM ika mAradu. 
gaMgArAMnu samuxraMloki woseyaMdi. 
ani maMwriwo annAdu. 
anagA anagA oVka rAju. 
A rAjuku rojU gaddaM gIyAli. 
o roju rAju iMkA leva lexu. 
maMgali rAju leciMxAkA cUSAdu. 
rAju levagAne gaddaM gISAdu. 
A roju rAju vetaku bayaluxerAdu vetalo rAjuku jaMwuvulu wagalalexu. 
rAju alasipoyi kotaku cerAdu. 
KAlYI cewulawo kotaku cerAdu. 
ivAlYa ilA eVMxuku jarigiMxi. 
ani rAju AlociMcAdu. 
xIniki aMwatiki maMgale kAraNaM. 
ivAlYa levagAne maMgali muKaM cUSAnu. 
aMxuke ivAlYa e panI kAlexu. 
ani rAju anukunnAdu. 
maMgali kosaM sevakulanu paMpiMcAdu maMgali wala wIsiveyaMdi. 
ani sevakulaku puramAyiMcAdu. 
maMgaliki eVtU wocalexu. 
wAnu rAjuku e hAni ceSAdo weVliyalexu. 
nAmIxa kopaM uMte wala wIseyaMdi. 
kAni mI kopAniki kAraNaM weVlapaMdi. 
ani maMgali rAjuwo annAdu. 
rAju kopaMwo aricAdu. 
ivAlYa levagAne nI muKaM cUSAnu. 
aMxuke e panI kAlexu. 
vetalo kUdA emI xoVrakalexu. 
ani rAju annAdu. 
mIru levagAne nA muKaM cUSAru. 
aMxuku mIku kevalaM panulu kAlexu. 
kAnI ivAlYa nenu mIke moVxata gaddaM gISAnu. 
ivAlYa mIre nA moVxati girAki. 
xIMwo nA wala weVguwunnaxi. 
ivAlYa eVvariki velYa bAgAlexu? 
eVvari muKaM cUsina velYa maMcixi kAxu? 
mIre ceVppaMdi. 
ani maMgali rAjunu adigAdu. 
rAju Alocanalo paddAdu. 
- oVkato mAsaM onagAya1 reVMdo mAsaM regupaMdu2 mUdo mAsaM muMwa mAmidi3 nAlugo mAsaM nAna biyyaM4 ayixo mAsaM aratipaMdu5 Aro mAsaM AvakAya6 edo mAsaM veVnnamuxxa7 eVnimixo mAsaM veVnnamuxxa8 woVmmixo mAsaM woVtleV maMcaM9 paxo mAsaM pApa puttiMxi10 mA Uri harixAsu maMci paMdiwudu. 
gaNiwaMlo cAlA Ganawa kalavAdu. 
paMca pAMdavulu aMtu5 maMcapu kolYlavaleV4 muggurani anaboyi3 ixxarani aMtUne2 cUpAdu oVkavelu1 panneVMdo wexIna bayaluxerAdu12 paxamUdu palleVlu wirigAru. 
13 paxanAlgo nAdu mA palleV koVccAru14 paxihenu paxyAla caxivi vinipiMcAru. 
15 paxahAru bahumawulu poVMxagaligAru. 
16 paxihedu rojulu uMdipoyAdu. 
17 paxXeVnimixi purANAlu valleVveSAru. 
18 paMxoVmmixo rojuna wirigi bayaluxerAru.

20 iravE oVkatava roju21 iravEAru janavari26 neVlarojulu30 maMdalaM40 weVlugu akRarAlu56 aravEnAlugu kalYalu64 nUru, vaMxa100 dajanu12 pakRaM15 pAwika25 xaswA24 paxulu- vaMxalu- velu kowikI maniRikI reVMde cewulu2 cewiki velYlu ayixu5 ExU ExU kalipiwe paxi10 paxI paxI kalisi iravE20 iravE paxI kalipiwe mupPE30 muppayi paxI kalipiwe nalaBE40 ayixu paxulu kalipiwe yABE50 Arupaxulu kalipiwe aravE60 varusagA deVbBE eVnaBE woVMBE70,80,90 paxi paxulEwe avi nUru100 paxi vaMxalayiwe oVka veyi1000 jama- kUdika mekaku eVnni kalYlu nIkeVnni kalYlu? 
avi reVMdu, ivi reVMdu2+2 anni kalipiwe nAlugu=4 mekakeVnni kAlYlu, nIkeVnni kAlYlu? 
avi nAlugu, ivi reVMdu4+2 anni kalipiwe Aru=6 meka koVmmuleVnni, nIku vunnavi eVnni? 
avi reVMdu, ivi sunna2+0 annI kalipinA reVMde mekakeVnni walalu, nIkeVnni walalu? 
axi oVkati, ixi oVkati1+1 avi anni reVMdu=2 mekaki oVkka woka nIku axi leka, maniRivE lokAna masaluwunnAvu. 
wIsivewa- Karcu aMxAla mA ceVlli Atalu AdaMga. 
ayixurAlYla gaccakAyalu AdaMgA oVkkati eVguravesi cewa iMkeVnni5-1=4 reVMdu jAravidiceV cewilo eVnni? 
4-2=2 edu gavvalu patti Adu paccIsu reVMdu veVlikilapadda borlapaddavi eVnni? 
7-2=5 mUdu borlapadda veVlikalapaddavi eVnni? 
7-3=4 weVlisi ceVppina mIru weVlivigalavAru. 
poVdupu kaWa koVnni pittalu eVgiri powU joVnna cenu cUsinavi. 
karra mIxi kaMkikoVkati gabagaba vAlinavi; oVkka pitta migiliMxi. 
kAxu axi xAri anukoVni leci karraku reVMdu vAlinavi; oVkka karra migiliMxi? 
eVnimixi maMxi kaliSAru. 
Ataku veVlYlAru.

varusagA nilabadi leVkkiMcagA oVkkaru wakkuva ayinAru. 
eVvaru leVkkapeVttinA aMwe. 
eVMxuku oVkkaru wakkuvAyeV? 
( leVkkapeVttevAru wananu leVkkiMcalexu) guNakAraM rAjugAri kota rawanAla kota! kota godaku reVMdu bAtalu unnAyi. 
2 bAtaku mUdesi wotalunnAyi.

lotAlu eVnni? 
9,27*** nArAyaNaku jokiMxi nAlugu kilo bAtuwo. 
ANaMxaM vAdiMxi ayixu kilola rAyi. 
ayixeVwwulu nArAyaNa45=20 kilolu AnaMxaM nAlugu eVwwulu5420 kilolu uppu wIsukoVni Uriki nadicAru. 
ceVppaMdi eVvaru eVkkuva baruvu moSAru? 
( samAnaM) lItaru pAlalo1+ lItaru nIlYlu1 kalipi poVyyimIxa2 kAga peVttaMga, poVMgi poyina sagaM2-1 poVyyilo mAdeV aMxulo aralItaru Aviri ayipoye1-12( aralItaru) migilinaveVnni ara lItaru BAgahAraM- jama wAwa vayasulona80 wana vayasu pAvu80*14=20 wAwa vayasuna sagaM wana waMdri vayasu40 wana walli reVMde eMdlu wakkuva wana BarwakannA40-2=38 iravEExu eMdlu wanaku eVvari vayasu vayasu eVMwa? 
( wAwa80, waMdri40 walli38, wanaku20) oVkaru oVka roVtteVnu oVkaroju wiMte ixxariki oVkka rojuku eVnni kAvAleV? 
oVkaru oVka panini oVka gaMtalo ceswe ixxaru A panini eVnni gaMtallo ceswAru? 
oVkaru oVka Uriki oVka rojuna powe ixxaru A Uriki eVnni rojulaku powAru? 
cikku leVkkalu naluguru pillalu wotaku veVlYli koVnni mAmidi paMdlu weVMpukunnAru. 
paMcukunetappudu paMcAyiwI cinnavAniki BAgaM ivvaka migawA muggure paMcukunnAru. 
cinnavAdu adigiwe awaniko BAgaM ivvalexu, kAni walo paMdU iccAru. 
leVkka cUswe vAnikI migawA vAriwo samAnaMgA paMdlu vaccinavi. 
2) ixxaru pillalu wotaki veVlYli jAmapaMdlu weVMpukunnAru. 
ceVttu eVkkinavAdu reVMdu pAlYlu wIsukoVni ceVttukiMxi vAniki oVka pAlu iccAdu. 
wakkuva BAgaM poVMxinavAdu eVkkuva BAgaM poVMxinavAni oVka paMdu kosinAdu. 
awadu iccAdu. 
appudu ixxari paMdlu samAnaM ayinAyi. 
moVwwaM paMdleVnni? 
3) oVka gurraM, oVka gAdixa XAnyaM baswAlu moswU naduswunnaxi. 
" nAku baruvugA uMxi. 
oVka baswA wIsuko. 
appudu ixxarivi samAnaM avuwAyi", annaxi gurraM. 
" nenu nIkaMteV cinnaxAnni. 
nAxe oVka baswA nIpEna vesuko. 
appudu nAvi nI baswAllo sagaM avuwAyi", annaxi gAdixi. 
xenipE eVnni baswAlu vunnavi? 
402) ixxaru pillalu wotaki veVlYli jAmapaMdlu weVMpukunnAru. 
ceVttu eVkkinavAdu reVMdu pAlYlu wIsukoVni ceVttukiMxivAniki oVka pAlu iccAdu. 
wakkuva BAgaM poVMxinavAdu eVkkuva BAgaM poVMxinavAni oVka paMdu kosinAdu. 
awadu iccAdu. 
appudu ixxari paMdlu samAnaM ayinAyi. 
moVwwaM paMdlu eVnni? 
3) oVka gurraM, oVka gAdixa XAnyaM baswAlu moswU naduswunnaxi. 
" nAku baruvugA uMxi. 
oVka baswA wIsuko. 
appudu ixxarivi samAnaM avuwAyi", annaxi gurraM. 
" nenu nIkaMteV cinnaxAnni. 
nAxe oVka baswA nIpEna vesuko. 
appudu nAvi nI baswAllo sagaM avuwAyi", annaxi gAdixa. 
xenipE eVnni baswAlu unnavi? 
4) elUru koVbbarikAyalaku wirupawilo girAkI, Xara eVkkuva. 
akkadinuMci ikkadiki rElu mArgaMlo vaMxa steRanlu unnavi. 
baswAku oVka koVbbarikAya prawi steRanlonU pannu ceVlliMcAli. 
baswAlo uMdevi vaMxa kAyale. 
eVnni baswAlu wIsukupowe anni kAyalu iswU povAlisiMxe. 
civariki migilexi sunna. 
eVlAgEnA koVbbarikAyalu migalcAli eVlA? 
5) raMgammaku oVka kUwuru, naluguru kodalYlu, oVkarojuna kUwuriki Apil paMdu winAli6.. 
kUwuriki koVniswe kodalYlaku kUdA koVnAlsi vaswuMxi. 
raMgamma pisinAri. 
kUwuriki icci kodalYlaku ivvakapowe wAnu niMxapAlu avuwuMxi. 
aMxuku o upAyaM AlociMciMxi. 
kodalYlake naluguriki walA oVka paMdu koVnicciMxi. 
kUwuriki emI ivvalexu. 
vAlYlu iccina paMdu kosi walA sagaM mukka Adabiddaki iccAru. 
raMgamma saMwoRapadiMxi. 
raMgamma kUwuriki wana vaxinalakaMte eVMwa eVkkuva vacciMxi. 
cikku leVkkala javAbulu1) moVwwaM12 paMdlu2) moVwwaM6 paMdlu3) gurraMpE7, gAdixapE5 baswAlu unnavi. 
4)2 baswAlu wIsukuni prayANaM ceswe sagaM xUraM prayANaM cesesariki baswAku sagaM kAyalu pannukiMxa powAyi. 
aMte oVkkoVkka baswAlo50( sagaM) miguluwAyi. 
I reVMdu sagAlanu oVka baswAlo veVyyAli. 
migawA50 steRanulaku I oVka baswAlonuMci50 kAyalu powe civariki50 kAyalu miguluwAyi. 
5) naluguru nAlugu ara mukkalu iccAru. 
aMte kodalYlu walA arapaMdu winnAru, kUwuriki2 paMdlu vaccAyi. 
kUwuriki oVkatinnara paMdu vaxinala eVkkuva. 
aMkeVlu, gurwulu kanukkoMdi I kiMxa addaMgA, niluvugA koVnni leVkkalu ivvabaddAyi. 
koVnni galYlu KAlYIgA unnAyi. 
KAlYI galYlalo e gurwu veswe, A aMkeV veswe saripoye javAbu vaswuMxo, A gurwulanu aMkeVlanu veyaMdi. 
60*=120--------------------------------------------------------320----------------------------==---------------------------20100----------------------------- rAmAyaNaMlo perlu kiMxa koVnni akRarAlu unnAyi I akRarAlu kalipiwe rAmAyaNaMlo unna koVMwa maMxi perlu vaswAyi. 
I akRarAlanu addaMgA kAni, niluvugA kAni, etavAlugA kAni kalipiwe I perlu vaswAyi. 
I perlanu galYlalo gurwiMcaMdi. 
- jAMbavaMwudu- 
mahilYalu maMci ceVddalu: cAlAmaMxi cAlA cotla' AdA _ magA samAnaM' ani ceVbuwAru. 
pawrikalalo AdavAriki magavAriwo bAtu samAna hoxA kalpiMcAli ani vArwalu vaswunnAyi. 
' mahilYallArA..
. 
eVMwa kAlaM ilA noru mUsukoVMtAru? 
' ani kaWalu rAswunnAru. 
asalu, I carcalu annI eVMxuku vaswunnAyi? 
mana samAjaMlo AdavArini wakkuvagA cUswunnAmA? 
alA cUswe axi wappA? 
I samasya manaku weVlusu. 
samAXAnaM kUdA manaku weVlisiMxe! oVkappudu samAjaMlo swrIki cAlA eVkkuva gOravaM uMdexi. 
woVlirojullo puruRuniki mArgaxarSi swrIne! vyavasAyaM moVxalupeVttiMxi, paSupoRaNa prAraMBiMciMxi, buttalu alladaM, battalu neVyyadaM, ilYlu kattadaM lAMti panulaku SrIkAraM cuttiMxi swrIle! vItannitiwo bAtu garBaM XariMcadaM pillalanu kanadaM swrIla vaMwu. 
A rojullo swrI puruRa saMbaMXAlu ippudu unnatlu uMdevi kAvu. 
svecCa uMdexi. 
biddalanu wallula xvArAne gurwiMcevAru. 
biddala mIxa hakku kUdA wallixe! alAge AsWihakku kUdA AmeVxe! aMxuke AnAti samAjAnni mAwqsvAmyaM anevAru. 
keralYa rARtraMlo itIvali kAlaM varaku mAwqsvAmyaM AcAraMlo uMdexi. 
akkada koVMxari iMtiperu walliperuwo moVxalavuwuMxi. 
I paxXawi kAlagawilo mAriMxi. 
mAradAniki kAraNAlu rakarakAlugA UhiMcadAniki avakASaM uMxi. 
nammakAniki xaggaragA uMde oVka kAraNaM _ A rojullo janABA wakkuvagA uMdexi. 
vetAdAli annA, vyavasAyaM ceyAlannA, oVka guMpuwo iMko guMpu yuxXaM ceyAlannA janasaMKya eVkkuva kAvAli. 
janABA uwpawwi eVkkuva kAvAlaMte swrIlaku eVkkuva viSrAMwi uMdAli. 
appude vAru wama garBAnni rakRiMcukovAlannA, puttina biddalni jAgrawwagA kApAdukovAlannA sAXyaM avuwuMxi. 
I xqRitiwo puruRudu bayati panula bAXyawalu wana neVwwimIxa eVkkuva vesukovadaM moVxalupeVttAdu. 
swrI eVkkuva kAlaM iMtilo viSrAMwigA gadipelA praNAlika sixXaM ceSAdu. 
roju rojukU samAjaMlo swrIki prAXAnyawa waggasAgiMxi. 
AsWihakku AmeV nuMdi puruRudu lAkkoVnnAdu. 
rAjakIya bAXyawalu AmeV nuMdi wappiMcAdu. 
oVka swrIki oVka puruRudu ane kattadi ceSAdu. 
kramaMgA swrI sWAnaM xigajAriMxi. 
AmeV iMti panulu cUsukune panimaniRilA, vaMtapani cese vaMta maniRilA, Barwaku xAMpawya suKaM aMxiMce oVka yaMwraMlA mAripoyiMxi. 
kAlakramaMlo eVnno SawAbxAlu gadicipoyAyi. 
Adaxi aNacivewaku alavAtu padipoyiMxi. 
gawa koVnni xaSAbxAlugA samAjaMlo swrI sWAnaM gUrci carca moVxalayiMxi. 
Ada _ maga samAnaM ane uxyamaM bayaluxeriMxi. 
balahIna kulAlavAriki, vargAlavAriki rijarveRanlu unnatle swrIlaku kUdA anni raMgAlalonu ketAyiMpulu moVxalayyAyi. 
grAma saMsWala eVnnikalalo swrIlaku1/3 vaMwu sItlu ketAyiMcAru. 
iMwavarakU swrIla cewulu pAwralu womAyi. 
ceVwwalu UdcAyi. 
vaddiMcadaMlo alasipoyAyi. 
A swrI cewulu ippudu malYlI aXikAraM cUpiMcanunnAyi. 
iMwavarakU magavAdi veVMta nadicina swrI vArini wana veVMta wippukogaligina avakASaM vacciMxi. 
AmeV kannItini wudavaMdi grAmaMloni mahilYaku woVlikodi kUsina veVMtane poVxxupoVduswuMxi. 
iMtilo iMkeVvarU nixra levakamunupe AmeV xinacarya moVxalavuwuMxi. 
poVxxupoyexi rAwri paxigaMtala waruvAwano! axI aMxarU unnaxexo wini naduM vAlcina waruvAwa. 
I maXyalo AmeVku eVnno samasyalu. 
wiMdigiMjalu weVcci peVttadaM magavAdi vaMwayiwe vAtini vaMdipeVttadaM AdavAri bAXyawa. 
vaMta Urake wayAravaxu. 
poVyyi rAjeVyyAlaMte nuggu pidakalo, katteVlo evo oVkati kAvAli. 
vAtini eVkkadanuMdi weVccukoVMtuMxo magavAlYlu pattiMcukoru. 
paSuvulu uMte vAti mewa saMgawi kUdA AdavAlYle cUdAli. 
Uriki xaggaragA gaddi xoVrike kAlamA ixi? 
xUraM povAli. 
ceVruvullono, wotallono, adavullono gaddi ceVkkuku rAvAli. 
nIti samasya kUdA AdavAlYlaxe. 
maMcinIlYla paMpu Urilo lekapowe ika ceVppanakkaralexu. 
poVxxupoVdavakamunupe wAlYlu, koVdavali cewabattukoVni e adaviloko; pArA, wattI neVwwina peVttukoVni e bAvi xaggarako nadaka sAgiMcAli. 
mAruwunna vAwAvaraNaM grAmaMloni AdavAlYlanu eVkkuvagA kaRtapeVduwoMxi. 
sakAlaMlo kuravani vAnalu, nASanamavuwunna adavulu, kaluRiwamavuwunna vAwAvaraNaM annI AdavArike eVkkuva prawikUlaMgA uMtunnAyi. 
baMjaru BUmula aBivqxXi paXakAnni arWaM cesukoVni prawi grAmaM nuMdI koVMxaru muMxuku rAvAli. 
wama grAmAniki avasaramEna vaMtaceVraku kosaM ceVtlu, paSuvulaku gaddi peVMcukovaccu. 
maMciniti sOkaryaM kosaM aXikArulanu adagavaccu. 
poVgaleni poVyyilu kUdA erpAtu cesukovaccu. 
grAmaMloni mahilYa kannItini wudiciveyAlaMte manaMxaraM pUnukovAli. 
' vidAkulu' peVruguwunnAyi oVka mahilYanu, oVka puruRuNNi mAmidAkula woraNaM kalupuwoMxi. 
A ixxarini vidAkula kAgiwAlu veruceswunnAyi. 
oVkappudu BAryABarwalu vidipoye saMGatanalu cAlA wakkuvagA uMdevi. 
praswuwaM vidAkula kesulu eVkkuvavuwunnAyi. 
Barwa eVMwa hiMsiswunnA BArya oVkappudu mOnaMgA BariMcexi. 
vidipovadaM ane Uha AmeV meVxaduloki vaccexi kAxu. 
alAge BArya eVMwa viccalavidigA pravarwiswunnA Barwa samAjAniki Bayapadi opikagA BariMcevAdu. 
praswuwa kAlaMlo BAryABarwalu iRtaM lekuMdA saMsAraM ceyadaM eVMxuku ani wamanu wAmu praSniMcukoVMtunnAru. 
vidipoyevAri guriMci samAjaM kudA peVxxagA pattiMcukovadaM lexu. 
vidAkula kesullo eVkkuvagA muMxu paduwunnaxi mahilYale! kutuMbaM guriMci pattiMcukokuMdA julAyi wirugulYlu wirige Barwanu BArya gOraviMcadaM lexu. 
wanaku oVka vyakwigA viluva, gOravaM ivvani Barwa avasaraM lexane ABiprAyaM nagarAlalo swrIlaku uMxi. 
cinna cinna pattaNAlu, grAmAlaloni swrIlu eVkkuvagA maxyaM, pekAta vyasanAlaku bAnisalayina wama Barwala patla ayiRtaM cUpuwunnAru. 
vidigA jIviMcAlani korukuMtunnAru. 
ayiwe vidAkula valla BArya eVkkuvagA naRtapowuMxi. 
kAraNaM AmeVku ArWikaparamEna svawaMwraM lekapovadaM. 
attadugu vargAlalonu, unnawa kutuMbAlalonu AdA, magA samAnasWAyilone uMtAru. 
kiMxi vargaMlo BAryA Barwalu ixxarU kUli cesukoVne bawukuwU uMtAru. 
ixxari saMpAxanA xAxApu samAname. 
alAMtivAru vidipoyinA ArWikaparamEna ibbaMxulu vArini bAXiMcavu. 
pEvargaMlo vAriki kUdA dabbu samasya rAxu. 
ixxarikI dabbu veVsalubAtu uMtuMxi. 
vidAkula valla eVkkuva ibbaMxulapAlayyexi maXyawaragawi kutuMbAlaku ceVMxinavAre..
. 
vIriki samasyalu eVkkuva. 
I samasyalalo cAlA muKyamEnaxi pillala peVMpakaM. 
wallixaMdrulu vidipowe pillala bAXyawa eVvaru cUsukovAli? 
eVvaro oVkaru anukoVMte A pillala BaviRyawwu vAru eVvari xaggara unnAro vAri ArWikasamarXawa mIxa AXArapaduwuMxi. 
dabbuparamEna samasyalu lekapoyinA vidipoyina xaMpawulaku ceVMxina pillalu mAnasikaMgA narakaM anuBaviswAru. 
BAryABarwalu sulaBaMgA vidipovaccu kAni pillalu wallixaMdrulalo e oVkkari eVdabAtunu kUdA sahiMcaleru. 
wallixaMdrulu ixxarU, leka ixxarilo eVvaro oVkari aBimAnAniki nocukoni pillalalo neramanaswawvaM eVkkuvavuwuMxani aMtAru. 
wama pillalanu nerasWulugA I samAjAniki aMxiMce aXikAraM wallixaMdrulaku lexu. 
kanIsaM pillalu mAnasikaMgA eVxigi sWirapadevarakayinA wallixaMdrulu kalasi uMdAli. 
manaxeSaMlo hiMxU vivAha cattaM kriMxa1955va saMvawsaraMlo vidAkulanu cattabaxXaM ceSAru. 
1976lo I cattAnni savariMci mariMwa sulaBaMgA vidAkulu poVMxelA vIlu kalpiMcAru. 
cinna cinna saMGatanalu oVkarimIxa oVkariki premanu puttiswAyi. 
koVnni saMxarBAlalo alAMti cinna saMGatanale xaMpawulu vidipovadAniki xAriwIyadaM vicAriMcaxagina viRayaM. 
nagarAlalo vidAkulu korevAri saMKya eVkkuva. 
BAryanu Barwa, Barwanu BArya gOraviswU snehiwullAgA jIviswU uMte vidAkula prasakwi eVnnatikI rAxu. 
ayiwe koVMwa sarxukupovadaM ane wawvaM ixxarilonU uMdadaM cAlA avasaraM. 
swrIlaku yogAsanAlu: mAnavuniki mAnasika SAMwi anexi cAlA avasaraM. 
I mAnasika SAMwini mAnavudu yogAsanAla xvArA poVMxagaladu. 
yogAsanAla valla SArIraka patuwvaM erpaduwuMxi. 
koVnni rakAla rogAlaku I yogAsanAlu oVka goVppa maMxu. 
vIni valana koVnni warahA rogAlu waggadamU, koVwwa rogAlu rAkuMdA niroXiMcatamU jaruguwuMxi. 
muKyaMgA ajIrNaM, xIrGakAla rogAlu, livar( kAleyaM) ku saMbaMXiMcina iwara vyAXulu yogAsanAla xvArA nivAriMpabaduwAyi. 
swrIlaku I aByAsaM valla cakkagA SarIra peVruguxala, cakkani SarIraM, cakkani cUpu vaMti lakRaNAlu erpaduwAyi. 
sahajaMgA swrI wana jIviwaMlo aneka viXulanu, bAXyawalanu nirvahiswuMxi. 
oVka premamUrwigA _ anurAgaM cUpe BAryagA _ oVka xaggari snehiwurAligA _ oVka cakkani walligA _ oVka gqhiNigA _ iMtlo kutuMba nirvAhakurAligA _ samAjaMlo oVka bAXyawa kaligina vyakwigA vyavahariswU uMtuMxi. 
cAlA maMxi swrIlu I viXamEna bAXyalawo cAlA ibbaMxulanu _ narAla balahInawa, walanoVppi, vikAraM, ajIrNaM, Awruwa, mAnasika oVwwilYlu, iMkA swrIla prawyeka jabbulavaMtivi _ eVxurkoVMtU uMtAru. 
kadupuwo uMdataM, niMdu garBiNigA uMdataM, prasaviMcataM ane mUdu prawyeka lakRaNAlu swrIki mAwrame ketAyiMcabaddAyi. 
I mUdu lakRaNAlu swrI yoVkka ArogyAniki koVMwa varaku BaMgaM kaligiswAyi. 
yogAsanAlu A mAxiri saMwAnowpawwi xaSalalo kUdA swrIki bAsatagA uMdi ArogyAnni kApAduwAyi. 
prawi rojU20 nimiRAlapAtu yogAsanAlu vesinatlayiwe SarIrAniki, manasuku maMci Arogyaparipakvawa erpaduwuMxi. 
aMxaM, ArogyaM, SArIraka kAMwi, AkarRaNa vaMtivi poVMxataM sAXyamavuwuMxi. 
mAnasika AMxolYana nuMdi yogAByAsaM kApAduwuMxi. 
maMcinIlYlU _ jAgrawwalU maMcinIlYlu eVlA SuBraM cesukovAli? 
madugu nIlYlayiwe: rAmApuraMlo oVke oVka maduguMxi. 
axe maMcinIlYlaku AXAraM. 
mari vAlYlu e jAgrawwalu wIsukovAli? 
madugu nIlYlu SuBraMgA uMcukovadaM cAlA kaRtaM. 
A madugu xaggare o bAvi wavviMcukodaM maMcixi. 
gavarnameVMtunu adigi o cewi paMpu veyiMcukoVMte marI maMcixi. 
kAnI ixi aMwa woVMxaralo jarige panenA? 
kAxu. 
IlogA I jAgrawwalu wIsukovaccu. 
1. 
A madugu aMxarU maMcinIlYlake vAdAli. 
2. 
eVvvarU aMxulo snAnaM ceyagUdaxu. 
guddalu uwakagUdaxu. 
paSuvulu kadagagUdaxu. 
3. 
eVvvarU iMxulo adugEnA peVttagUdaxu. 
nIlYlu weVccukoVne AdavAlYla kosaM simeVMtuwo meVtlu kattiMcAli. 
vAlYlu meVtlamIxa nuMce kadavalU, biMxeVlU muMcAli. 
4. 
paSuvulu xigakuMdA uMdeMxuku cuttU kaMceV veyiMcAli. 
eVvari paSuvulEnA xigiwe jarimAnA veVyyAli. 
5. 
eVvvarU A madugu xaggaragA xoVddiki pokuMdA cUdAli. 
xoVddiki xUraMgA kUcunnA akkadi nuMci vAnanIlYlu maduguloki rAgUdaxu. 
madugu cuttU aMwA kaMceV veVyyadaM kaRtame. 
anni kattubAtlu ceVyyadaM marI kaRtame. 
aMwegAxu. 
iMwa cesinA A nIlYlu ceVdipovani nammakaM lexu. 
aMxuvalla maruguxoVdlu kattukovadaM annitikaMte maMcixi. 
ayiwe ixi cAlA maMxiki iRtaM uMdaxu. 
woVMxaragA jarige panI gAxu. 
mareM ceVyyAli? 
oVka upAyaM uMxi. 
oVka nIlYla woVtti kattukovAli. 
A woVttilo madugunuMci rojU poVxxuna nIlYlu niMpukovAli. 
aMxulo saripadA blIciMgu pOdaru kalapAli. 
wAgadAniki, ginneVlu kadagadAniki rojaMwA I nIlYlu vAdukovAli. 
migawA panulaku madugu nIlYlu nerugA vAdukovaccu. 
aMwAgAxu gAni koVMwameraku ixi upayogapaduwuMxi. 
kanIsaM nIlYla bexulu, baMka bexulu rAkuMdA kApAduwuMxi. 
bAvi nIlYlayiwe _ maMgApuraMlo bAvi nIlYlu vAdawAru. 
mari vAlYle jAgrawwalu wIsukovAli? 
bAvilo klorin kalapoVccu. 
oVkAmeVku meVlYakuvulu nerpAli. 
klorin bAvilo kalapadaM AmeV pani. 
ayiwe ixi koVMwamerake pani ceswuMxi. 
oVka woVttilo nIlYlu wodi aMxulo klorin kalapadaM marI maMcipani. 
nIlYlalo inumu, PlorEd_lAMtivi uMdoVccu. 
ivi maMcivi gAvu. 
vItini kUdA sunnaM, patika kalipi woVlagiMcukovaccu. 
bAviki bAgA eVMda wagalAli. 
xInivalla nIlYlu SuBrapadawAyi. 
klorin kaMteV ixi melu. 
bAvini SuBraMgA uMcukovAli. 
xIniki marinni jAgrawwalu avasaraM. 
bAvi eVkkada uMdAli? 
: ilYlakU, leVtrinlakU kanIsaM15 mItarla xUraMlo bAvi uMdAli. 
meVrakalo uMdataM marI maMcixi. 
kanIsaM25 mItarlalopala eVvvarU xoVddikigAnI, oVMtikgAnI pogUdaxu. 
godalaku pUwa: bAviki nItimattaM xAkA itukalawo, rAlYlawo goda kattAli. 
xAniki simeVMtu pUwa pUyAli. 
kAMkrItu varalu kUdA maMcixe. 
kiMxinuMci wappa nIlYlu pakkalanuMci godala xvArA rAkuMdA jAgrawwa padAli. 
bAvi cAlA pAwaxEwe godalu pagulYlu bAruwAyi. 
A pagulYlaku simeVMtu pUyAli. 
riperulu ceVyyAli. 
nela mattAniki2,3 adugula pEnuMci simeVMtu pUwa bAgA maMxaMgA uMdAli. 
wakkuva lowu bAvayiwe goda cuttU lopala rAlYlu, isuka kalipi poVyyAli. 
appudu bayatanuMci vacce nIlYlu vadakattinattu SuBraMgA vaswAyi. 
iMwa jesinA I nIlYlu pUrwigA SuBraMgA uMtAyani ceVppaleM. 
aMxuvalla marikoVnni jAgrawwalu wIsukovAli. 
pittagoda: kanIsaM3,4 adugula pittagoda uMdAli. 
xInivalla bayati nIlYlu bAviloki povu. 
pillalaku rakRaNagA uMtuMxi. 
captA( gattu): bAvi cuttU simeVMtuwo kattina captA uMdAli. 
kanIsaM ixi oVka mItaru veVdalpu uMdAli. 
I captA vAlugA uMdi murikinIlYlu bayataku povadAniki vAtaMgA uMdAli. 
murugukAluva: vAdina nIlYlu iMti wotaloko, gowiloko poyelA kAluva uMdAli. 
I nIlYlaMwA alAge vaxileswe vItilo Igalu, xomalu gudlu peVdawAyi. 
aMwegAxu! nIlYlu lopaliki iMki bAvinIlYlanu muriki ceyavaccu. 
aMxuvalla gowini kanIsaM15 mItarlu xUraMgA wavvukovadaM maMcixi. 
murugu kAluva kUdA rAlYlawo, simeVMtuwo kattukovAli. 
bAvi mUwa: simeVMtu palakawono, kAMkrItu baMdawono bAvini mUsiveyadaM maMcixi. 
cewi paMpu: dabbu, paniwanaM uMte bAviki oVka cewi paMpu peVttukovadaM eVMwEnA maMcixi. 
cuttuprakkala SuBrawa: kanIsaM bAviki15 mItarlu cuttU muriki cerakuMdA cUcukovAli. 
xoVddiki pokuMdA, mUwraM poVyyakuMdA, paSuvulu peda veVyyakuMdA, ceVwwAceVxAraM veVyyakuMdA cUcukovAli. 
murikinIlYlu nilavuMcagUdaxu. 
cewi paMpu( boriMg) nIlYlayiwe: raMgApuraM paMcAyiwilo kAvalasinanni boriMgulunnAyi. 
ayiwe A UlYlo kUdA pillalaku mAtimAtiki nIlYla bexulu vaswuMtAyi. 
ilA eVMxuku jaruguwoMxi? 
eVMxuku jaruguwoMxaMte, mAtimAtiki I cewipaMpulu ceVdipowuMtAyi. 
vAtiki vArAla warabadi, neVlala warabadi riperu ceVyyaru. 
aMxuvalla janaM eVkkado oVkacota nuMci nIlYlu weVccukovalasi vaswuMxi. 
A nIlYlu SuBraMgA uMdavu. 
aMxuvalla nIlYlabexulu pattukuMtAyi. 
ippudu manaM I cewipaMpulu eVMxuku ceVdipowAyo, vAtini eVlA bAguceyAlo weVlusukuMxAM. 
1. 
cewipaMpu sulaBaMgAne kaxuluwuMxi. 
ayinA nIlYlu rAvu. 
alAMtappudu eM ceVyyAli. 
xIniki kAraNaM nIlYlu pEki eVkke peVxxa goVttaM ceVdipovadaM, lekapowe nIti mattaM sileVMdaruku aMxakuMdA adukki waggipovadaM. 
PUt_vAlvu kaMteV nIlYla mattaM waggipovadaM valla kUdA nIlYlu sarigA rAkapovaccu. 
appudu mattaM varaku goVttAnni poVdigiMcukovAli. 
sileVMdaru wolu bakkeVt xeVbbaxinadaM jarigiwe xAnni mArcukovAli. 
lexA saricesukovAli. 
kaneVktiMgu kammi jAyiMtu UdipovadaM vallanEwe jAyiMtu cesukovAli. 
vAlvu sItlu xeVbbawinadaM valla kUdA nIlYlu rAkapovaccu. 
alAMtapudu vAtini mArcAli. 
paMpu siliMdaru pagilipovadaMvallanEwe xAnni mArcAli. 
2. 
nIlYlu sannagA rAvadaM _ AlasyaMgA rAvadaM siliMdaruku adugunuMde ceVk_vAlvu lIkejIvalla ilA jaragoVccu. 
alAMtapudu siliMdaru mArcAli. 
jAyiMtu cesina pEpulo lIkeji uMdoVccu. 
appudu nIlYlu pIlce goVttaMlo lIkejI avuwunna BAgAnni mArcAli. 
3. 
nIlYlu koVttetapudu goVlusu madawa padataM. 
xIniki kAraNaM sarigA goVlusunu amarcakapovadaM. 
alAMtapudu goVlusu poVdavunu sariceyAli. 
vARarlu siliMdarulo irukkoVnipovadaMvallanEwe siliMdaru SuBraM cesukovAli. 
wolu bakkeVt mArcukovAli. 
4. 
paMpu vAdukoVnetapudu peVxxagA SabxaMrAvadaM. 
xInikkAraNaM PlAMjini sarigA amarcakapovdaM kAvaccu. 
alAMtapudu xInni saricesukovAli. 
kaneVktiMgu kammi vaMgipovadaMvalla kAvaccu. 
alAMtapudu xAnni mArcAli. 
5. 
hAMdilu itU atU kaxaluwuMdataM. 
hAMdil Agjil mara sarigA bigiMcakapovadaMvalla ilA kAvaccu. 
alAMtapudu maranu gattigA bigiMciwe saripowuMxi. 
bAl beriMgsu xeVbbawinadaMvallagAnI, spesar xeVbbawinadaMvallagAnI kUdA hAMdil paguluwuMtuMxi. 
apudu vAtini mArcAli. 
ayiwe boriMgu eVMxuku ceVdipowuMxo weVlusukuMte saripoxu xAnni riperu ceyadaM eVlAgo kUdA manaM weVlusukovAli. 
nercukovAli. 
UlYlo mugguru naluguru yuvakulaku boriMgulu bAguceyadaM nerpAli. 
koVnnicotla AdavAlYlU muMxuku vacci boriMgulu bAguceyadaM nercukunnAru. 
vAlYlu axBuwaMgA nercukovadamegAxu eVppudu avasaramEwe appudu riperlu cesukuMtunnAru kUdA! mana UlYlo mAwraM manalo koVMxaraM eVMxuku nercukokUdaxu? 
ippudu manaM boriMgunu eVlA jAgrawwagA vAdukovAlo kUdA weVlusukuMxAM. 
1. 
paMpu hAMdil_nu pEnuMci kiMxiki pUrwigA koVttAli. 
nIlYlu vegaMgA vaccetattu koVttAli. 
2. 
hAMdil goVlusuku grIsu pUswuMdAli. 
3. 
boriMgukuMde boltulu, nattulu eVppudU lUjugA uMdakUdaxu. 
gattigA bigiMci uMdAli. 
4. 
paMpunIlYlu boriMgu cuttU cerakUdaxu. 
avi xUraMgA poyeMxuku kAluvaluMdAli. 
muriki guMta erpadakuMdA cUcukovAli. 
cuttU simeVtu captA uMdAli. 
5. 
paMpu cuttuprakkala SuBraMgA uMcukovAli. 
annitikaMteV avasaraM eMtaMte manaM mana vAdalone uMde boriMgunu jAgrawwagA kApAdukovAli. 
xAnni ceVdagoVttakuMdA cUcukovAli. 
pattiMcukovAli. 
ayiwe boriMgu riperu, xAnni vAdukonadaM weVliswe cAlaxu. 
boriMgu kUdA oVka bAvilAMtixe! manaM bAviki e jAgrawwalu wIsukuMtAmo avannI boriMguku kUdA wIsukovAli. 
muriki nIlYlu boriMgu cuttuprakkala ceri nelaloki sulaBaMgA xiguwAyi. 
ivi40 _50 adugula xAkA sulaBaMgA xigagalavu. 
kanIsaM cutuuprakkala70 _80 adugula xAkA SuBraMgA uMcukovAli. 
boriMgu lowugA uMte koVMwavaraku maMcixi. 
ayiwe bAviloki xiginatle kanIsaM70 _80 adugulu cuttuprakkala SuBraMgA lekapowe boriMgu nIlYlu kUdA ceVdipovaccu. 
aMxuvalla captAwopAtu cuttU SuBraMgA uMcukovadaM kUdA cAlA avasaraM. 
murikinIlYlu xUraMgA poyeMxuku kAluva wappanisarigA avasaraM. 
koVnni UlYlalo maMcinIlYlu marorakaMgA kUdA saraParA avuwuMtAyi. 
boriMgu xiMci motAruwo nIlYlu wodi eVwwEna tAMkuki niMpuwAru. 
akkadakkada peVxxa peVxxa woVtlu katti vAtiki kulYAyilu bigiswAru. 
tAMku nuMci I woVtlaloki nIlYlu goVttAla guMdA vaswAyi. 
I nIlYlu SuBramEnavenA? 
SuBramEnavani ceVppadaM kaRtaM. 
eVMxukaMte boriMgu eVkkada xiMci unnAro manaM cUdAli. 
xAni cuttU SuBraMgA uMxA? 
paSuvulu peda veyadaMgAni, manuRulu xoVddiki povadaMgAni A boriMgu cuttupakkala jaruguwoMxA? 
lexA? 
anexi cUdAli. 
boriMgu xiMcina cota cuttuprakkala SuBraMgA uMte kUdA saripoxu. 
tAMku SuBraMgA uMdAli. 
woVtti SuBraMgA uMdAli. 
vAtiki mUwaluMdAli. 
I woVtlanu rojU SuBraM cesi warvAwa mAwrame nIlYlu niMpAli. 
nIlYlalo blIciMg kalipi krimulu lekuMdA ceVyyAli. 
tOnlalone gAxu grAmAllo kUdA ippudu cAlAcotla koVlYAyilu vacceSAyi. 
vItikosaM lakRalu, kotlu prawi saMvawsaraM Karcu peVduwunnAru. 
I nIlYlu eVkkadanuMci vaswunnAyi? 
oVka ceVruvu nuMco, madugu nuMco, naxi nuMco I nIlYlu eVwwEna tAMkuloki vaswuMtAyi. 
boriMgu xiMci, motAruwo nIlYlu wodi, nIlYlu tAMkuloki eVkkiswuMtAru. 
koVnnicotla ilA ceVruvulu nuMci, madugula nuMci, naxula nuMci boriMgula nuMci wodina nIlYlani vadaposeMxuku erpAtlu kUdA uMtAyi. 
koVnnicotla nerugAne vadapowa lekuMdA paMpulloki vaxuluwuMtAru. 
emEnA I nIlYlu kUdA e krimulu lenivani manaM ceVppalemu. 
eVMxukani? 
iMwakumuMxu ceVppina kAraNAlannI ikkada kUdA saripowAyi. 
1. 
nIlYlu eVkkadanuMci tAMkuloki vaswunnAyo akkada SuBraMgA uMxA? 
aMte A madugo, ceVruvo, naxo manuRula malaM, paSuvula peda cuttupakkala lekuMdA unnAyA? 
ivi uMdakuMdA cUdAli. 
2. 
vIti nuMci woduwunna nIlYlalo krimulu lekuMdA cUcukoVAli. 
uMte vAtini nASanaM cese erpAtu uMdAli. 
3. 
nIlYlu BUmilopala uMde goVttAla xvArA koVlYAyilaki vaswAyi gaxA! A goVttAlaku akkadakkada cillulu padavaccu. 
A cillula guMdA krimulu maMcinIlYlaloki ceravaccu. 
alAge I goVttAla prakkane murikinIlYla pEpulu, kAluvalu uMtAyanukoMdi. 
I muriki nIti goVttAla nuMci, kAluvala nuMci maMcinIti goVttAlaloki murikinIlYlu eVkkuwAyi. 
ixi maMcinIti goVttAllo nIlYlu lenappudu, nIlYlu sannagA vaswunnappudu jaruguwuMtuMxi. 
xInivalla koVlYAyi nIlYlu eVMwo ceVdipoye vIluMxi. 
oVkkosAri tOnlalo, peVxxa peVxxa grAmAllo kUdA vaMxalAxi maMxiki oVkesAri kAmeVrlu, tEPAyid vaMti jabbulu vaswuMtAyi. 
ixaMwA ilA nIlYlu ceVdipovadaM vallane jaruguwuMtuMxi. 
ayiwe Uru cAlA peVxxaxEnappudu, tOnlu marI peVxxavEnappudu goVttAlu BUmilopala unnappudu, eVkkado oVkacota ilA muriki nIlYlu maMcinIti goVttAlaloki eVkkavaccu gaxA! vAtiki manaM eM ceyagalaM? 
ixi cAlA peVxxa samasya. 
ixi manavalla ayye pani kAxu. 
peVxxa peVxxa iMjinIrlu xIniki kAvAli. 
vAlYlu mAwrame xInni sariceyagalaru. 
madugula nuMci, ceVruvula nuMci, vAgula nuMci, naxula nuMci nerugA nIlYlu vAdukoVnetappudu vAtini BArI eVwwuna vadagattukune erpAtu uMdAli. 
xInikosaM paMcAyiwI soVmmu vAdukovAli, lexA gavarnameVMtu sahAyaM adagAli. 
lekapowe cinna Anakatta kattukuni aMxulo maMci nIlYlu niluvuMcukune erpAtu cesukovAli. 
karNAtaka rARtraMlo oVka UlYlo janamaMwA kalisi oVka cinna Anakattane kattukunnAru. 
ilAMtivAtini wakkuva Karcuwo cesukone paxXawulu koVnni unnAyi. 
vAtini manaM weVlusukovaccu. 
manaM UlYlo maMcinIti kosaM emi erpAtu cesukovacco manamaMwA kUcoVni nirNayiMcukovAli. 
ixi mana Uri parisWiwulanu batti uMtuMxi. 
A warvAwa I erpAtukosaM xAri veVxukkovAli. 
iMtlo nIlYlanu SuBraM cesukovadaM eVlA? 
muMxu ceVppinatlu bayata eVnni jAgrawwalu wIsukunnA manaM wAge nIlYlu SuBraMgA unnattu ceVppalemu. 
vAgula nuMci Uta bAvula nuMci nIlYlu weVccukovalisi vaswe vAtini iMtlone SuBraM cesukovalisi uMtuMxi. 
oVkkosAri nIlYla nuMci vacce jabbulu kalarA lAMtivi UraMwA sokuwuMtAyi. 
alAMtappudu manaM soVMwaMgA iMtlo jAgrawwalu wIsukovAli. 
nIlYla xvArA I jabbulu mana kutuMbAlaku rAkuMdA cUcukovAli. 
iMtlo manaM nIlYlu eVlA SuBraM cesukogalamo ippudu cUxxAM! maragakAyadaM: annitikaMte maMci paxXawi nIlYlanu maragakAyadaM. 
nIlYlu kanIsaM20 nimuRAlapAtu weVrlipoyelA kAyAli. 
vItini SuBramEna pAwralo niluva cesukovAli. 
A pAwraku mUwa peVttAli. 
nIlYlu wIsukunetappudu cewulu muMcakUdaxu. 
ayiwe manaM oVkesAri cAlA eVkkuva nIlYlu kAcukuni niluva cesukoleM. 
kAcukovadaM koVMwa Karcuwo kUdina pani kUdA. 
eVMxukaMte katteVlo, boVggulo kAvAli kaxA. 
koVMwamaMxiki I Karcu BariMcadaM kaRtaM kUdA. 
blIciMg kalapadaM: blIciMg kalipi nIlYlu SuBraM cesukovadaM cAlA sulaBamEna pani. 
ayiwe nANyamEna blIciMgu pOdaru mAwrame upayogiMcAli. 
blIciMgu pOdarunu wuppu pattani dabbAlo niluvuMcukovAli. 
eVMdaku wagalakuMdA callati, poVdi praxeSaMlo uMcAli. 
mUdu nuMci Exu milligrAmula blIciMgu pOdaruwo oVka lItaru maMci nItini SuBraM cesukovaccu. 
citikeVdu poVdilo( aMte aravE numci100 millIgrAmula poVdiwo) oVka bakkeVttu nIlYlu(20 lItarlu) SuBraM cesukovaccu. 
oVka drammu nItiki(200 lItarlu) sumAru sagaM spUnu blIciMgu pOdaru saripowuMxi. 
paxivela lItarla tAMku nIlYlaku paxi nuMci iravE tI spUnla blIciMg pOdaru saripowuMxi. 
oVka viRayaM manaM gurwuMcukovAli. 
nIlYlu niluvuMcukunetappudu, koVnni jAgrawwalu wIsukovAli. 
xAniwopAtu vadagattukovadaM kUdA cAlA avasaraM. 
nIlYlu bAgA maddigA purugulawo niMdiuMte blIciMgu pOdaru kalipinaMxuvalla peVxxagA uMdaxu. 
asalu manaM kalipina blIciMgu pOdaru saripoyiMxA lexA ani weVlusukoVnexAniki oVka paxXawi uMxi. 
xInni mI Arogya aXikArini adigi vivaraMgA weVlusukoMdi. 
vadapowa: nIlYlu vadaposukovadAniki cAlA paxXawulunnAyi ayiwe vadapowaku muMxu nIlYlanu wetaparcukovAli. 
maddigA, buraxagA uMte patikawo wetaparcukovaccu. 
ilA wetaparcukunna nItini eVlA vadaposukovacco ippudu mUdu paxXawulu cUxxAM. 
vadaposukunna warvAwa blIciMgu kUdA kalupukovAli. 
vadapowa valla manaM krimulanu caMpalemu. 
vadaposina nIlYlanu jAgrawwagA niluvuMcukovadaM jAgrawwagA vAdukovadaM kUdA eVMwo avasaraM. 
1. 
boVggu, isuka, gulakarAlYla vadapowa paxXawi:2. 
reVMdu kuMdala paxXawi:3. 
isuka vadapowa paxXawi: ilA e paxXawilonEnA nIlYlu vadaposukovaccu. 
ayiwe ivannI koVnni parisWiwulapE, kAraNAlapE AXArapadi uMtAyi. 
avemaMte1. 
manaM wAge nIlYlu eVkkadivi ane xAnni batti. 
2. 
manaku aMxubAtulo uMde vadapowa avakASAlanu batti. 
3. 
BariMcagala soVmmunu batti. 
4. 
grAmaMlo prajalu eVMwameraku kalisi, kaxili vaswAru anexAnni batti. 
5. 
prajalu eVMwameraku I samasyanu gurwiMcAru anexAnni batti. 
6. 
I samasyaku manaM cUpe pariRkAraMpatla janaM aBiprAyAlu eVlA unnAyi anexAnni batti. 
prajalu pUnukuMte emEnA ceyavaccu. 
oVka UlYlo janaM madugu nuMci nIlYlu weVccukuMtunnAranukoMdi. 
akkada oVka boriMgu vesukone avakASaM uMdavaccu. 
xIniki ememi kAvAlo, e paxXawilo ixi sAXyamo prajale welcukogalaru. 
ayiwe prajalni A vEpu manaM malYliMcAli. 
vAlYlaku sarEna samAcAraM aMxiMcAli. 
pracAraM ceyAli. 
prajalu wamakixi kAvAlani adagadAniki muMxuku rAvAli. 
prajalaMxarU ummadi aBiprAyAniki rAgaligiwe, ekamEwe avasaramEna dabbu kUdA sAXiMcukovaccu. 
*** 
mana Uru cAlA cinna Uru. 
manamaMwA peVxXolYlaM. 
mana Uri ammAyi. 
pexiMti ammAyi. 
ASa puttAka vAlYla nAnna UroVxili pAripoyAdu. 
eVkkadiki poyAdo eVvarikI weVlIxu. 
ASanu vAlYlamma peVMciMxi. 
A pillaMte vAlYlammaku prANaM. 
eVMxuko mari ASa gAbarA gAbarAgA uMtuMxi. 
prawi xAniki BayapaduwuMxi. 
A ammAyilo XEryaM wakkuva. 
BayaM eVkkuva. 
A BayAnni pogoVttAli. 
AmeV weVlivEMxe. 
ayiwe eM lABaM?

avunaMtArA?

ceVlleVlu lAMtixi. 
edelYla ASa _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ ASa pexaxe. 
ayinA A pillaki caxuvaMte iRtaM.

o pillavAdi peVnsil_nu eVvaro xoVMgiliMcAru. 
ASa aMxarikannA pexaxi. 
xAMwo paMwulugAriki AmeV mIxe anumAnaM vacciMxi. 
paMwulugAru ASanu koVttAru. 
AmeV xeVbbalu wiMxe gAni mAtlAdalexu. 
peVnsilu eVvaru xoVMgiliMcAro AmeVku weVlusu.

eduswuMxi. 
ayinA A kurravAdi peru ceVppaxu.

woVmmixelYla ASa _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ ASa wotivAlYlawo kalasi AdukuMtoMxi.

sIwAlu kUdA kalupuku kowalaki veVduwuMxi. 
nIku poVlaM uMxikaxA. 
iMkA kUliki veVlYlataM xeniki ani. 
yAxagirini adigAdu nAgulu. 
somariwanaM maMcixi kAxu. 
somaripowu BUmiki BAraM. 
opika unnaMwavaraku pani ceVyyAli. 
nAlugu pEsalu saMpAxiMcAli. 
koVMwa xAcukovAli.
nAgulu bAgA AlociMcAdu. 
yAxagiri mAtalu naccAyi. 
wAnu kUcuni winataM naccalexu. 
poVlaM pani alavAtu lexu. 
kUlipani cewakAxu. 
eVMwa kAlaM Urike kUcovAli. 
nAgulu AlociMcAli. 
exannA pani cesukoVvAli. 
wAnu kUdA bAgupadAli. 
anukunnAdu. 
nenu peVxxagA caxuvukolexu. 
nA caxuvuki nOkarI rAxu. 
poVlaM pani cewakAxu. 
exayinA vere pani cUpiMcu. 
ani yAxagirini adigAdu nAgulu. 
yAxagiri AlociMcAdu. 
UlYlo oVka yuvajana saMGaM uMxi. 
oVka vAlaMtIru unnAdu. 
peru SaMkaraM. 
yAxagiri, nAgulu awani vaxxaku veVlYlAru. 
SaMkara upAXi paWakAla ceVppAdu. 
nAguluku upayogapadevi ceVppAdu. 
nAguluku sEkilu riperu paWakaM nacciMxi. 
mUdu neVlalu SikRaNa uMtuMxi. 
ceramani SaMkaraM iccAdu. 
nAgulu sEkilu riperu weVlusukunnAdu. 
yAxagiri hAmI iccAdu. 
byAMku ruNaM vacciMxi. 
nAgulu sEkilu RApu weVricAdu. 
nAlugu axxeV sEkilYlu unnAyi. 
riperulo kUdA nAguluku maMci peru vacciMxi. 
dabbu kUdabeVttAdu. 
iMtimIxa cesina ruNaM wIriMxi. 
neVlaneVlA byAMku ruNaM wIruwoMxi. 
sIwAlu nAguluki saMbaMXaM cUsiMxi. 
pilla yAxagiri bAbAyi kUwuru. 
ippudu nAgulu somari kAxu. 
panimaMwudu. 
maMcivAdu anipiMcukuMtunnAdu. 
pEsalu xAcukuMtunnAdu. 
nAgulu ippudu mArina maniRi. 
nA peru nArAyaNa. 
A kanipiMcexi mA Uru. 
mA Uri peru nadikuda. 
mA Urini Anukuni oVka koVMda uMxi. 
A koVMdanu rAmagiri koVMda aMtAru. 
koVMdapEna oVka gudi uMxi. 
edAxikoVkasAri koVMda mIxa jAwara jaruguwuMxi. 
mA Uri janaM Exu velamaMxi vIrilo cAlA maMxi poVlaM panulu cesukuMtAru. 
koVMxariki soVMwa poVlaM uMxi. 
mari koVMxaru kUli pani cesukuni bawukuwAru. 
pani lekuMdA koVMwamaMxi wiruguwuMtAru. 
vIriki pani ceyadaM cewakAxu. 
rAmagiri koVMdanu Anukuni oVka eru pAruwuMxi. 
eVMdAkAlaM mA Uri ceVruvu eVMdipowUMxi. 
aMxukani koVMxaru maMci nIti kosaM etiki veVdawAru etinIru poVlAlaku peVdawAru. 
etiki ewaM vesi wotalaku nIru peVdawAru. 
koVMxaru etilo vala vesi cepalu kUdA padawAru. 
mA Urilo oVka gudi uMxi. 
axi rAmulavAri gudi. 
gudi muMxara oVka koneru uMxi. 
A koneti nIru wAgatAniki panikirAxu. 
koneti nIru Aku pasaru raMgulo uMtuMxi. 
aMxukosaM A nItini eVvarU vAdaru. 
gudilopala oVka gilaka bAvi uMxi. 
axi maMci nIti bAvi. 
gudi eVxuru xukANAla varusa uMxi. 
xukANAlalo iMtiki kAvalasina sarukulu xoVrukuwAyi. 
kUlinAlI cesukunevAru. 
e roju kAvalasina sarukulu A roje koVMtAru. 
koVMxaru vArAnikoVkasAri sarukulu koVMtAru. 
aMxukosaM gaMgApuraM saMwaku powAru. 
AxivAraMnAdu gaMgApuraMlo saMwa jaruguwuMxi. 
mA Uri civara oVka badi uMxi. 
A badilo paMwulugAri peru sIwArAM. 
badilo waragawulu ayixayinA gaxulu reVMde. 
aMxukosaM paMwulugAru mExAnaMlo pATAlu ceVbuwAru. 
vAnAkAlaM badi jarugaxu. 
pEna peVMkulu pagilipoyAyi. 
aMxukani badaMwA wadisipowuMxi. 
mA Uri bayata oVka mAmidi wota uMxi. 
A wota gaMgApurAniki xArilo uMxi. 
gaMgApurAniki poyevAru A xAriguMdAne povAli. 
A mAmidi wota mA Uri rAmudugArixi. 
A xAriguMdA poyevArikI A wotalo maMci nIda xoVrukuwuMxi. 
mA Uriki padamara oVka wAti wopu uMxi. 
mA Urilo wAtAku pAkalu bAgA kanabadawAyi. 
koVMxaru wAtAku pAkalu vesukuni uMtAru. 
mari koVMxaru wAtAku pAkalu vesi paSuvulanu aMxulo uMcuwAru. 
wAti muMjulu oVMtiki calava. 
wAtAkulu iMtiki calava. 
eVMdAkAlaMlo koVMdamIxa jAwara jaruguwuMxi. 
A jAwaranu kowula nadama jAwara aMtAru. 
eVMxukaMte koVMdapEna kowulu bAgA uMtAyi. 
A kowulu eVvarini emi anavu. 
janaM kUdA vAtini emI anaru. 
eVMxukaMte koVMdamIxa oVka gudi uMxi. 
axi hanumaMwuni gudi. 
kowulanu emEnA aMte hanumaMwuniki kopamavuwuMxani aMxarU anukuMtAru. 
meVxaknu pUrvaM meVwuku xurgaM anevAru. 
kAlakrameNA meVxuku ayiMxi. 
meVxuku..
meVxak ayiMxi. 
meVxak wAlUkA praXAna keMxramaEina meVxak patnaM valla I jillAku meVxak ane peru vacciMxi.

SUnyavAxAniki mUlapuruRudu, bOxXamawAvalaMbi ayina AcArya nAgArjununi peru I prAjeVktuku peVttAru. 
cariwra pariSoXanalo xarSiMcaxagina praxeSaM. 
rAvakoVMda: nalgoVMdaku64 ki. 
mI xUraMlo gala I UrinaMxu pattABigattu yaMxali xevAlayaMloni SilpAlu prawyekiMci xaSAvawAra xqSyamulu goVppa cAriwrAwmakamEnavi. 
nalgoVMda nuMdi viviXa prAMwAlaku gala xUraM( ki.

varaMgallu jillA I jillA praXAna keMxraM varaMgallu avvadaMwo varaMgal jillA ane peru vacciMxi. 
I jillA1719-1836 uwwara akRAMSaMpE,7849-8043 wUrpu reKAMSaMpE maXyalo uMxi.

kAni Avunu oVka adugu kUdA kaxalcalekapoyAru.
